Name: Katie
Review: Cool setup and views. The service was terrible and bland. They forgot to put in my food so my order finally came out when everyone was done. They were not busy.

Name: Mark
Review: The  Christmas decor is not what it used to be nor what is advertised on the website.  Ordered the boozy hot chocolate and it was delivered at same time as the bill and was cold.  The food was also cold and average at best.  Overall, what used to be a great brunch has turned into a really poor experience.

Name: Alisha
Review: Had a reservation and was seated promptly. Service wasn’t great- slow and did not return many times to check in. Forgot one of the items we ordered. Food was average for the value. Would only come here for drinks in the future. Ambiance was cool

Name: Kristen
Review: All pictures show that it is decorated in all pink and over the top decorations for Christmas. Barely decorated pictures online we nothing like what is actually there.  Very disappointed.

Name: Paul
Review: Great area for a brunch. Awesome service and solid all around.

Name: Jill
Review: So disappointed. We have gone here for years and loved everything! However, today…the pancakes are no longer pink, there were no decorations (not even for Christmas), they had most of the dining rooms shut off, and our waitress maybe came to our table twice. So unfortunate. And pastry basket was hard and dry,

Name: Tobias
Review: Im Sommer vielleicht ganz nett. Personal am Einlass macht einen riesen Affen wegen nichts. Da ist jeden bar im EG besser. Essen Fehlanzeige

Name: Maria
Review: Went here for my birthday. Called the night before and asked about the indoor and outdoor of the rooftop, they said both were open and seating would depend on availability, they also said there is a DJ. We got there, they sat us in a dark corner behind the bar, the dj was on the other side of the whole rooftop and the music was very distant. We were 5 people and got squished in a corner table meant for 3-4 people. When we expressed that we werent happy with our seats due to the comfort, ambiance, and the fact that we were so far from everyone else to the hostess, she said theres nothing she can do except bring us an extra little LED candle for the table. We pointed to seats that were empty that we would be much happier with and she said they were all reserved (I had a reservation as well and was told you cannot reserve where exactly you would like to sit) The hostess was not helpful or friendly, the server was not attentive and we were overall very unhappy. We ordered 1 drink and booked skylark rooftop 5 mins away while we were there and just left. Looks nothing like pictures, extremely underwhelming, save your time go somewhere else.

Name: rhina
Review: My husband and I both got sick after eating there last night.

Name: Kami
Review: I have been here many times and always had an amazing time except for last night. No seasonal decorations no seasonal cocktails and the side with the carousels closed.

Name: Ann
Review: The music was way too loud for Sunday brunch. The playlist and the volume were not a Sunday brunch vibe

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very nice experience. Good food and friendly staff.

Name: Hannah
Review: even though it was pouring rain, this was great for after work team drinks and light bites!

Name: Melissa
Review: Great for my birthday brunch party! Great views too!

Name: Tony
Review: Drinks are too sweet. We ordered two speciality cocktails, and they were unbearable sweet. Then we asked for gin and tonic which seemed to be made with a flavored seltzer, also too sweet. Music was not good, very 2010s, but not well blended. Music was very loud for a place without a dance floor.

Name: Marina
Review: They never offer the happy hour option, just when I asked. The waitress warns us that if we wanted to keep the table we must orden food, we couldn't stay just ordering drinks, it was only 17.30h and some tables where still empty...

Name: Delaney
Review: It was advertised that there was happy hour but then when we got there they said it was only at the bar and we were discouraged by the server to move to the bar. We were expecting great views on the city and Empire State Building but because the rooftop was covered, there was no way to see any type of views. Also, all drinks came in plastic cups. If I’m ordering a $16 glass of Prosecco, you’d think it would come in a glass at least.

Name: Geraud
Review: Very noisy place, hard to have a conversation. More of a club vibe, even early.

Name: Martine
Review: I made a reservation here based on a fantastic experience I had a few years ago.  The place was beautifully decorated, a warm and inviting environment with a gorgeous view.  Last night we showed up, there was zero decor, the bar was dark and so loud we couldn't hear each other, and we decided to leave before ordering.  I had seen gorgeous ads for Magic Rooftop a few years ago that matched our experience then, and I expected the same this time.  It looked like an entirely different place, just like any bar you could walk into off the street.  Disappointed.

Name: Lerato
Review:
While the food was okay, I had a bad experience while dining on my birthday with my friend. On two occasions two separate attendants came over to my table and started to pick up plates, glasses etc without asking if we were finished. We were still eating and I was shocked at this behavior.
It is proper courtesy for attendants to enquire from guests if they are finished before clearing their table.

Name: Sharleen
Review:
Had a great first experienced 
The view was Amazing 💕💕💕💕💕

Name: Michele
Review: Such a great roof top bar. Food was great and service also . Loved the view !

Name: Shawn
Review: Wack terrible drinks and shots and vibes. Don’t ever come here

Name: Ashley
Review: Celebrated my cousin’s 21st birthday and had a great time! The waitress was very attentative and manager was very welcoming !  Everyone was super friendly. The birthday shot tower was super cute! Overall a great time making my cousin’s big day special!

Name: Asha
Review: Great food and service , will visit again. Lovely place

Name: Margaret
Review: Had high hopes and fell short. The entrance was cool. But our service was lacking and they were out of two of the drinks we tried to order. Food was definitely not quality very cheap bar food. It was also decorated like summertime at the end of October, which was a let down.￼

Name: Bev
Review:
Great being able to make a reservation online, staff miserable upon arrival, very hot in foyer and lifts before going to the rooftop. 

Rooftop great and decor, staff gave us drinks menu, no table service offered or happy hour drinks  explained. 

Toilet attendant polite and helpful. Staff appeared miserable and not welcoming. Asked to take group photo, they suggested another bar for better views.

Name: Omar
Review: Looks better in pictures, not bad but not wow………..

Name: Jaimy
Review: I come here every year for my bday and the always have the best Halloween cocktails

Name: Walt
Review:
We had an event on the rooftop and it was fantastic for all of our guests.  Especially the Bar Service by Michelle, she was so attentive and friendly and she made the whole even better.  

Thanks, Walt Paskowski

Name: Lauren
Review: Bad atmosphere and service. Will not return or recommend.

Name: Rob
Review: Overpriced and chaotic. $20 for 2 small tacos. Ordered a beer and it didn’t come until the food was finished. Total waste of money. Plenty of other rooftop dining for way better value that comes with far superior service

Name: Lori
Review:
It was great and the view of the Empire
State Building was incredible. Very friendly staff as well.

Name: richard
Review: too loud to talk at 7pm  I understand they want to have a club theme but can we have dinner first?

Name: Mary
Review: We went for the Halloween decorations, and it was still decorated for Cowgirl Summer- even though Halloween was 2 weeks away and it was 50 degrees outside. Disappointing - we led immediately to find a better place.

Name: Marisa
Review: We checked in with a host on the street level, waited 10mins for elevator to restaurant, checked in with a second host on the restaurant level, only to be asked by our waitress if we were aware hot food would not be served that day due to a gas issue.

Name: Dawn
Review: Complete joke.  They shouldn’t even take reservations! We were sat and no one came up to us we tried to flag people down, go to the bar… NO ONE helped us. No drinks, no food… the only person who ever spoke to us was the gentleman at the elevator.

Name: Tee
Review: I made a reservation for my 8 year anniversary and I would have appreciated either a call from the restaurant or before being seated telling us that the gas was off so they would not be serving any food. I was so upset and did not even get to enjoy my time there we left right away

Name: safire
Review: Nice vibe with pretty good drinks. Great place to have drinks and hang out. Dj was pretty good and played a nice mix of all genres.

Name: Simone
Review: The gas was not working so they could not serve hot food at all.  We left.

Name: Linda
Review: There was no food and they had only watermelon and cold food the service sucks only good for pictures

Name: Camilo
Review: Beautiful place, well located, but people isn't nice

Name: Victoria
Review: Another over rated TikTok hype. Needs improvement on food menu, prices cannot be justified.

Name: Brett
Review:
Way too loud for a 6 PM service time. My partner and I couldn’t even speak to one another.

Great food, and service was OK - food came out fast but wish our waitress came over more than two times total during our meal.

Drinks good, fair prices overall. Would recommend for brunch or quick bites before MSG.

Just be ready for an over the top entry process.

Name: Doron
Review: Good view and okay food and good drinks……………. ……………

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Amazing ambiance... such a fun environment with great drinks & the best food!

Name: AJ
Review: Went for drinks with my wife and we thought it was lame.

Name: Jennifer Mary
Review: My birthday was extremely fun, organized and heartfelt due to the incredible staff at the Magic Hour! Thank you.

Name: Francis
Review: Great service; the waiter was very nice and the brunch was amazing

Name: Jules
Review: Waitress never checked on us. Drinks were terrible. Food was good

Name: Michelle
Review: The food was terrible and cold. They charge $50.00 for pancakes that aren’t edible.

Name: Bibi
Review: Unfortunately the service and the atmosphere was really bad. Place is great and some of the views but the tables and especially staff were pretty bad and rude.

Name: Nicole
Review: The atmosphere was fun and we had wine and shrimp tacos at a table for the happy hour rooftop! Server was knowledgeable and on point. Overall great experience!

Name: Dr Julie
Review: Very loud party scene no views nothing like pictures note like an after work hangout with spring break vibes

Name: Tony
Review: Fun vibe! Great views! Perfect for groups &bottle service. The staff was on point too

Name: STEPHANIE
Review: What a fun place to go with your girlfriends! Very fun vibe!!

Name: Dawn
Review:
We thoroughly enjoyed our time at Magic Lounge. Reservation was easy to make, and our table directly faced a TV. A kind young man put on the Hiants game and we had a great time. Good was good. We sat close to other tables but never heard their conversations. 
We will return!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Beautiful restaurant, service and vibe great!  Overpriced, food portions small and not that good.

Name: Nakia
Review: I was disappointed with the food it was pricey and little.  The drinks were costly and the decorations were poor and disappointing for my daughter 15th birthday.  We were expecting a better vibe.  This is a pass for me in the near future.

Name: Jennifer
Review: Service was a little slow and not attentive, but we did spill our drink, and the waitress was kind enough to give us a new one for free. The atmosphere is great. Music is good and energetic.

Name: Ashanti
Review: Overall ambiance was good. There was hair in the food ( enough said).

Name: Carmen
Review: Honestly the sound levels here were off the charts. I couldn't actually have a conversation with my sister who I was there with as I couldn't hear her! We just really sat there and had 1 drink each and some food, we had plans to stay, but it was not a vibe when you can't hear anything but the tunes. We left and went elsewhere. Quite disappointed, especially as we were only in NYC for 3 nights.

Name: Alexandria
Review:
Magic Hour Rooftop Bar and Lounge was such a great time and vibe. It was our first time there and we were celebrating our friend, who is getting married soon. Everyone from the woman who checked us in outside the building, to the people we met when we got off the elevator. The bartenders were cool and answered our questions as first timers, with the 2 hour bar pass, and our waitress (I believe was Melody), was great (and her curls were poppin'!).

We had a low bar set for food, and even planned where we could grab food after, but the food didn't disappoint and was really good and fulfilling. 

Didn't get to experience the venue after dark, but will definitely visit again to be able to.

Name: David
Review: We were visiting from Texas with friends. Got there at 9:30 pm on a Friday night. We were sat right away and had someone stop by in less than 1 minute to check on us. The waitress was extremely nice and came by often. Ordered drinks and food at the same time but food hit the table first.  Ordered the suggestions of some of the signature drinks and specialty drinks. They were ok but we were there to have fun and we def did. The place is gorgeous. Soo many opportunities to take pictures for everyone. The backdrop of the city are spectacular on all sides. Would def suggest it to friends and family

Name: kayla
Review: The bouncer was so rude and ruined the whole experience. The wait staff was not any better so we just left as soon as we sat down.

Name: Teresa
Review: Food and drinks were overpriced.  Chips stale with guacamole appetizer.  Pretzel was really good however.  Good place for a quick drink before moving elsewhere.

Name: Hugh
Review: Excellent experience all round. Great vibe and an awesome view.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great place to have some drinks with a view of the city.

Name: jacqueline
Review: We came here for brunch for my daughter’s birthday. The service was good in terms if checking in and short wait times. The food was terrible. We had the pancakes and the taste was bland. The cotton candy on top tasted like cough medicine. The pancakes are really big and the waiters provide really small plates. We ordered sides such as bacon and home fries and the portions were very small. The chicken tenders seemed like they came from a frozen package that you buy at a supermarket. There’s lots of picture opportunities so if you want “instagrammable” pics for over priced bland food then this is the place for you. I will not be returning.

Name: James
Review: Cool vibe. Good place to grab a drink. Not a good place to eat.

Name: Ana
Review: Went for brunch @11:30 it was so so quiet and relaxing and the weather was perfect. The rooftop was open, and it was cloudy with a little mist and a perfect view. Couldn’t dream of going at a better time. The service was great, The girl who took our order was smiley and so friendly. Our order food and drinks was super quick then again we were only three of a few people there at the time. The whole place was an absolute dream Would recommend to anyone!

Name: Delcie
Review: Fun place for cute drinks, music, and bar snacks. Very Instagram ready 💛

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: This place is a VIBE!! I had so much fun dancing and the drinks were delicious & strong! The DJ knew the assignment. Now the food, I understand it’s “bar bites” but the bites need to be more big. The street shrimp tacos were so damn good but it only came with TWO. And the chicken tenders were a small portion as well. Other than that, it was a great place to be on a Saturday night!

Name: DesiGal
Review: Great ambience!! Good food and drinks. Lively environment with great music.

Name: Haley
Review: Very cool atmosphere, with views of the Empire State Building. Pamela was great!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: kids menu literally , margaritas way to sour basically fake lime , 85$ a pitcher sjould be real lime, food was good but simple kids menu motzarrella sticks  quesadilla was good but again  basic food , sliders 2 per order just

Name: Waleska
Review: I love everything about this rooftop. Wish if the have more food options in the future. I truly enjoy every single corner. Such of great experience and good vibes.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very nice and cute environment, however, too hot, they should have at least a fan in there, also, they were kids running out of control, they should have rules in the place to put in control this behavior.

Name: Daphne
Review: The pancakes were not good and the serving was too much, they wouldn’t accommodate with only pancakes as a side order. Service was okay, it took 30min for my party of 4 to receive water. I wouldn’t not return for brunch again.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I had a really good time. The food was good and the variety of music was good too.  Just enough of energy for a Saturday evening . I will go again.

Name: julieta
Review: hermoso. !!! experiencia muy linda un lugar hermoso

Name: Kenneth
Review: Had fun and if was comfortable. Service was good and any issue was resolved

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Loved the experience!! We got the big af croissant and the name is accurate. The drinks were great and the ambiance was beautiful. Loved the surf club decor and the staff was amazing. Will be going back

Name: Aldo
Review:
Terrible service.

I booked this place for a birthday celebration, and we agreed multiple times via email that they would accept the cake delivery. In fact, they even offered to buy the cake elsewhere and have it delivered to their premises. However, when the delivery driver arrived, they refused to accept the cake.

After some effort, I finally convinced them to take it, but when I arrived at the venue, they never served the cake as agreed. I waited for a long time, and the staff had no idea what I was talking about.

I ended up spending even more money going to a different place.

The music was also incredibly loud.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Need a little more food selection, and either bigger dishes or lower the price a bit.

Name: shrecchi
Review:
Service was great.
It was not like what I expected "fancy & fun" "Instagram worth" kind of place

Name: Carla
Review:
We walked up and the hostess was very rude, looking down at her phone rude and acting like she didn’t see us standing there. It was our first time there so we were excited and that instantly gave us bad vibes.  After we got off the elevator, we were walking around and no one was really helpful or letting us know where to go. Another group of people we rode the elevator with said the same thing- very unhelpful staff before you actually got to the bar. 
Once inside the rooftop, service was great and the  ambience, food and drinks were top notch though.

Name: Christopher
Review: We sat down at our table, and the waitress knew little to nothing about the menu. After ordering the waitress came back and told me that my food choice had been taken off of the menu and they just didn’t fix it yet. I said “ok, no problem, I’m going to just have the round of drinks that we selected and then you can bring me the check”. I was then told “but I already put the appetizers in, and how do you want to handle that?” She then told me that they needed to hold my card for the tab. The drinks were terrible, the shrimp tacos were okay. That was my first and last time going to Magic hour. There was nothing magical about it. If you’re looking for good photo opportunities then I would say go, but don’t go hungry or expect much quality of service because it was terrible.

Name: Orlando
Review: Excelente lugar y ambiente. Los cocteles fueron muy buenos!

Name: Michael
Review: The whole reason we tried to go to Magic Hour was to shoot a nice video for Instagram.  The website called it “the most Instagrammable spot in NYC!”  When we got there, we were told there were no cameras of any sort allowed and were asked to check all of our belongings.  We simple turned around and left!  I won’t be returning!

Name: Amy
Review: Beautiful rooftop with really fun photo ops. Wait staff was very nice. Very hard to eat anything but finger food as half the restaurant is low coffee tables, and the plates/utensils did not match the needs of the food. Most food was very good, but the ice cream sandwich was neither ice cream nor a sandwich. It was rock hard sherbet with a thin weird chocolate wafer.

Name: Maura
Review: Doesn't hurt that it was a nice day and I was in good company, but the staff was extremely pleasant and the brunch food was excellent.  One of our guests was late and the staff didn't rush us at all.  The music and the decor was fun.  A good time was had.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very nice place to brunch and dinner the carousel was amazing

Name: WendyA
Review: We had a great time going here on my birthday.   Drinks and food were really good and our server was very attentive.  Great atmosphere too.  Highly recommend.

Name: Sparkleboy
Review: A very cool pic worthy experience. The food and drinks were tasty. The down fall was the uncomfortable benches at every table outside, I know it’s outdoors but maybe a cushion please?

Name: Rebecca
Review: If you are looking for a place that has cute, social media ready decor, this is for you. Unfortunately, they don’t have much going for them besides that. The tables are round and awkward, making group interaction difficult. The service was subpar. Once we ordered our first round of drinks we kept having to flag them down because they never checked in. The price of the food was outrageous considering it was a step above fast food. I’m a native NYer so I expect that in midtown Manhattan. The drinks were good so I’d recommend a quick stop if you must for happy hour and forget the food. Not worth it.

Name: Gremaris
Review: The food was pretty good, drinks were delicious and ambience was good. It was a fun place to be with friends.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: This was definitely a place that looked better on social media than in person. Food was okay, drinks are over priced for what you get.

Name: Kayleigh
Review: Hospital cafeteria food would have tasted better, service was lacking, drinks were watered down

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Cute atmosphere, food was tasty but very expensive for what you actually get. Drinks were also very pricey.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Way too loud
Not enough good options
Poor seating designs

GREAT coffee

Name: SuzK
Review: We arrived early for an 11:45 reservation and were able to be seated.  Rooftop was almost completely covered so  more like top floor.  Music was incredibly loud and not in a 'get up and dance' way, just loud.  We ordered two manhattans that were well made with a total cost of $54 with tip.  Will not revisit.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Was great music and views were killer from rooftop.

Name: SoniaF
Review: We wanted to have a drink on a rooftop for my husband's birthday. This location did not disappoint. A great view of the Empire State Building. The service was AMAZING.  The food was good and the Mr. Pink was fabulous.  Great music and the vibe was just what I expected.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
It wasn’t bad but it wasn’t that great . Portion size was more like a tapas bar so small plates
I would say it’s average

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Eat place for a group. Great place for some fun pictures

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was cute rooftop a little overpriced and chips and guacamole was more like a tasting size (small)

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Too expensive honestly …. Not enough food on the menu

Name: MariaV
Review: We were hanging out by the bar and it took over 45 min to get our table set up.   Food was mediocre.   It was a client meeting so it fell below expectations

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: This place is a great rooftop spot. I keep returning here because I love it so much. Service is usually sub par but I have to admit… I have yet to find a bar/restaurant in NYC that had good service.

Name: NicholeW
Review: I made a reservation and was sat at my table by the hostess. A server never came by. When we flagged a hostess down, she said that we had yo go to the bar and order because our reserved sign was still on the table. After I explained, we had a reservation, she stated she would take our order. We asked for water and ice and never received it. We left and didn't get a chance to eat.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Waitress was not attentive at all. We walked in and waited for service at table. Waitress only came 1 to see if we were fine then took so long for the check to arrive. Will not be revisiting

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Best brunch in Times Square!  Great music , food and vibes

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The food and drinks are so expensive ! Two tacos for $16? A cocktail $20 the only nice thing about this place is the views and the staff is nice

Name: NickiD
Review: Pam was our server and she was amazing. Loved her nails as well. Food was good, loved that we ordered a pitcher and our cups were still decorated. Drinks were tasty and gave us a little buzz. Love the decor as well

Name: LauraM
Review: Friendly staff and beautiful atmosphere. Would go again

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Nice place, good food, but the music was too loud.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Food was not the best. Rooftop was beautiful but we ate on a very hot day

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Food was great. Environment was amazing. Decor was cute!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
The bartenders were top notch and the hostess was helpful. I had a hard time finding the hostess at first but it all worked out. 

The ambiance absolutely exceeded my expectations and magic hour is definitely one of my new favorite spots now.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Loved going here it was a great time and great atmosphere

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Nice cocktails, good prices. We like it!! Beautiful views of Empire States.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Definitely a tourist trap. Music was not great. They played a bunch of outdated pop songs. Drinks were extremely expensive even by New York standards. Couldn’t even hear the music throughout the venue just in a certain section. Highly don’t recommend.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: This place was soo awful for several reasons. To start, we didn’t feel welcome at all. This place is like a jail they’ll have you walk through all these dark halls and if you walk the wrong way they’ll yell at you even though the place is empty. As soon as I walked in the bag check lady immediately yelled at me to check my bag in. She had a god awful attitude from miles away I didn’t even trust my bag with her she seemed very off and miserable. Then after 10 mins of waiting for the elevator and being redirected and yelled at we finally catch the elevator upstairs. You’d think it would get better right? Absolutely not. There was no hostess whatsoever up there to seat us. We asked 3 different workers where the hostess was and they all guided us different places and ironically none had a hostess to be found. Why treat us like prisioners, make us check in our bags, follow specific directions how to get through the tiny building to make it seem mysterious. The place was so empty there was no reason for us to get treated like that. Terrible terrible terrible place we immediately left. NEVER come here if you want to get treated like you’re back in preschool. Would love to sit down with the manager and question why the hell he hired half the people there. So rude never coming back. We immediately went to 230 rooftop and it was sooo much better. Magic hour was just such a bad vibe it’ll put you in a bad mood because everyone there is so cranky and wants to have the one up over you even though the place is empty and garbage. Bad place if a hostess can’t even sit you and they’re no where to be found… got so tired of waiting and being mislead by workers we left

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Impossible to enjoy with tremendous heat, On summer need fans or something to cool

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The only thing that we enjoyed at the ambiance.  It took 15 min just for the server to come to our table even though she passed us several times.  Our mozzarella sticks came out almost instantly after we ordered them and were not the greatest at all.  We all ordered soda and it tasted like the bar gun was dirty.  The soda tasted spicy.  I was definitely not somewhere we would go again.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The staff was great, vibe was energetic and welcoming.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
For our anniversary we decided to go there and we were happy with the services and they made sure you could take pictures with your loved
Thank you so much we had a great time 😘😘😘❤️❤️

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The vibe was awesome but there are no vegan options, and for what we paid for an “avocado toast” was just not worth it.

Name: AshleyM
Review: Too young of a crowd. The Photo Booth took too long to print, so we didnt get our pictures. The bar was crowded so even with reservations we couldn’t really get service. Would maybe try again on a week night

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The service took forever and 4 people to be acknowledged and get water.  Food came before drinks.  Drink came out wrong because the one I ordered from the menu was “no longer available”.

Name: AmadaA
Review:
The service is quite terrible. The host at the entrance is not at all friendly. Once we finally got in despite having reservations, you go up in am elevator and it’s a maze to get to the check in spot. There was no one available to check us in but we also didn’t know what to do as there was no one to guide us.
We finally encounter the second host that took us to our table.
The drinks were mediocre, the DJ was great. The food was terrible. It’s Tao restaurant so very surprising that it’s this bad!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Our experience at Magic Hour was amazing! Thank you so much to everyone involved last night making us feel special.
The ambiance and decoration of the place for this summer is beyond what we expected and we had a lot of fun taking pictures with the props.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Dingy chachi and overpriced. Was looking for a pretty place to sip some happy hour drinks before a show and got met with stains and “happy hour is only if you are sitting at the bar”. Not cute.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The drinks we had were horrible and hard to drink.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was the first time attending Magic Hour. We chose this place to celebrate my husband’s birthday. However, that day July 25th, half of the place was closed off for special events which didn’t allow us to have the full experience of all parts of the bar and lounge so it was a little disappointing but we made the best of it since we were already reserved to be there. It would be nice that they inform people when this happens.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Food and drinks were just ok and the aesthetic section was blocked off for an event. Food took a long time to come out but a highlight was that our waitress was great!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very lively spot especially on the weekends.  Has great views of the Empire State Building and the skyline.  The food and drinks were excellent.   The bartenders were fast and very good but the table servers didn't check on you often enough.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Everything was perfect but some people got drunk, I was sitting in the middle and a lot of people were touching me.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We had our friends bachelorette party and we had an amazing time! The drinks were good the music was fantastic

Name: KristenI
Review: Such a vibe! Good music, amazing burger sliders, and such pretty decorations! Had a blast

Name: Michelle
Review: Food is overpriced, bland, and portions are tiny. Good spot for 1 drink and photos. That’s about it.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: First off, drinks are overly priced and the woman working at the bar was super indifferent!!! You’d think she was doing me a favor when taking my drink order. Overall, not a friendly place at all and I’ll never go back. Fine for tourists but as a NYer I felt totally disrespected. One of the hostess was super sweet but the vibe wasn’t working for me.

Name: LisaY
Review: Cool rooftop spot. Staff was friendly at entry & wished my husband and happy birthday. Upstairs no recognition or happy birthday “surprise”. I finally asked and said I can order something for him. I said sure, then was advised the kitchen was closed. 🤯.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
We didn't have food so can't rate the food. The drinks were fabulous and the bartender was wonderful and friendly.
However, the hostess, the waitress on the 18th floor, and everyone we met between the sidewalk and exiting the elevator on the 18th floor were unprofessional, not helpful and downright rude.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Our server was attentive and the drinks were delicious. We definitely recommend this spot

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Poor Quality Bar Food.    Tasteless and over cooked

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Usually a great experience. Looks like the menu shrunk and we were served under cooked chicken. Drinks were good

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Truffle fries delicious. Had the bubbly berry — loved it! Such a cute venue great for taking Instagram worthy pics!

Name: EddieMac
Review: Great view and vibe was cool. Wish rooftop opened a bit more…was hot where we were seated, and bar bites  menu was limited but overall very nice and good value.

Name: Margie
Review: We came along for an NYC rooftop experience and left disappointed.. We were seated inside with no rooftop view. It was basically just another bar. The drinks were served in plastic glasses and the corona was served in a can. I would not recommend.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Everything was perfect, I came here to celebrate my anniversary with my girlfriend and we had an amazing time. The energy, vibes, food, drinks, were well worth it. The waitress went above and beyond. From beginning to the end of our dinner. I would highly recommend this place. Thank you to the wonder staff, for making it a special one for us.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
TLDR: the worst service I have had anywhere in the world. Overpriced. Can’t really see anything anyway.    . 
Awful service from staff throughout, starting with the rude hosts on the street: “Name!” “Bag!”. Rudeness continued by elevator host who couldn’t even manage to look at you while barking orders at you. This attitude was not just to us, but also to other guests who had arrived at the same time as us. Upstairs the host doesn’t welcome you on arrival and you’re stood waiting unsure where to go. Then they’ll arrive and again just say ‘name!’. I genuinely thought about not even sitting down and ordering but the upstairs host was a bit cheerier than downstairs and felt optimistic. For those from the UK like myself: $70 for the equivalent of echo falls. Food was mediocre and tacos were cold. No staff around to mention this to once you have ordered as they tend to stay clear of you when you’ve ordered. I really wouldn’t bother with this location! You can barely see anything from the rooftop anyway which is really why you want to go. Just not worth it!! 0/10

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Everything was lovely. Only thing I wish they had more food options!

Name: misspensacola
Review: We had a group of 25 on a girls trip and we were sadly very disappointed. All of the fantastic social media posts built such incredible hype that it was supposed to be the highlight of our five days in New York City. It seems most of those amazing pictures and videos are from past seasons. We had multiple reservations and all dressed in pink expecting to have a pink Wonderland that would make amazing pictures. We were disappointed. they were nice enough to let us cancel without a fee, but most of us ended up having brunch that day.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Was under the impression it would be absolutely beautiful inside due to all the pictures and videos. Absolutely horrible. No decor whatsoever. The bunny put put was cute, the bears were cute, and the chandelier with greenery and disco balls, but that was about It.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I'll be back! Love this place. Food and drinks good, waiters friendly and beautiful scenic. Thanks

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Wouldn’t go back. Touristy, loud, overpriced for what it is

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
We showed up for a reservation and were told there was no seat for us available. For a party of 3, I was surprised since this venue encourages large party walk-ins. 

Bartender saved the day, but overall pretty disappointing venue.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It definitely was not what we expected limited menu. The views were not spectacular and limited tables

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Amazing!! Rooftop super top!! Perfect for the birthday

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The ambiance was the perfect NY rooftop vibe.  Great food! Great drinks! Great atmosphere!

Name: Anika
Review: I went with two girlfriends to celebrate my birthday. Upon arrival I was told that the only table option for us was on the rotating tree. As we made our way upstairs and onto the table, I started to get dizzy on the rotation table and asked the waitress to please move us. She then went to ask someone else who asked someone else. 30 minutes later they come back and tell me there's a table and she's going to wipe it down. Another 15 minutes go by and no one is back to update me while mind you the waitress told us not to order yet. so we couldn't even eat while we waited. I ended up leaving and making another reservation elsewhere! Total waste of time and horrible service.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was okay very good ambiance but the food could use a little work

Name: Shwin
Review: Really neat place with a great view.  Drinks were well made.  DJ was very good and energetic.  Ambiance is what will bring us back.  However, service was sketchy though, the "hostess" stand is not apparent and the restaurant is split into two sides so you're left wandering from side to side trying to figure out where the hostess stand is to check in.  We didn't know where to check in after wandering around for over 5 minutes with staff on both sides of the restaurant telling us to go to to the unmarked hostess stand in the connecting hallway that looked like a random table against the window.  Eventually we walked past a woman with her head down in her cell phone walking through the crowd who happened to overhear us say we didn't know where to go.  She was the hostess, not at the hostess stand for the entire duration we walked around the bar.  She had no name badge or uniform, she looked like another other patron.  We had two rounds of drinks and an order of food, sitting with empty drinks before the server came back to take our order and then it took over 20 min to get our bill and watched as party after party did the same wandering around the restaurant trying to figure out where was the hostess and a party next to us ended up walking out because the server never came.

Name: Erica
Review:
The aesthetic is very cute and picturesque, perfect for a catch-up with my girls. However, on a hot summer day, I just want good food and cold water. We had to ask our waiter multiple times for water, which should be the first thing they bring out without us having to ask. She brought my friend's alcoholic beverage before our water.

The food came out very quickly, but it was average. We had the crispy chicken sandwich, which needed more seasoning in my opinion. The fries were great. We also had to ask for utensils with our food. Once we finished eating and continued to catch up, our waiter asked multiple times if we were okay, even though we no longer needed anything but was hard to catch when we needed things. 

Minor improvements to customer service could enhance the experience. NYC restaurants often focus on aesthetics over customer service, and this place should work on that.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I booked the place for the installation. They didn’t have the installation ready for summer.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Waitress was horrible looked me dead in my face and over charged me and my guest for our fries! We ordered REGULAR FRIES they came on a white cone shaped container she charged us for TRUFFLE FRIES and I asked her specifically if it was a price difference and she said no they were the same price and I knew she was lying because why would house fries be the same as fries with Parmesan cheese and truffle oil?! Then I asked for a Berry bubbly but without the Tito’s vodka and she said the drinks are pre made so I said so what you are saying is it’s 2:00pm and if you run out of this drink it will not be anymore bottles of Victorious pink sparkling rose’ or raspberry Liqueur opened until Sunday to make another batch?! That’s how The Moxy do things because that’s not how Philly do things?! I’m from Philadelphia and if I want a drink made a certain way a REAL MIXOLOGIST can simply add or SUBTRACT the ingredient! So thanks for the pictures but I will certainly not be returning again! The Moxy was definitely overRATED! I gave her a tip not because she deserved it BUT because it’s the right thing to do! The food was just ok! The vibe is beautiful but the waitress with the curly hair(black girl)was awful! She needs and attitude adjustment! Also if that is true that drinks are pre made y’all need to change that…that is nasty it still would not justify me having a drink being made the way I want if I’m paying the price!

Name: Emvas
Review: Complete catfish! None of the decor advertised online, saw many guests dressed up to match the advertised “theme” and they are all sorely disappointed. Food is mediocre at best. We left very disappointed and underwhelmed.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Best sliders my entire group has ever had. Lots of great music! And the view!!! WOW!
Also a lot of cute photo ops inside the restaurant.

Name: PrimaDiva
Review: always a great time weather permitting and the sliders are amazing

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I had high expectations about this place. On their social media they over hype this place and its not how it seems.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Really nice rooftop. We went for some drinks at 21:30, the only bad thing was I cannot eat with gluten and there was not any single option I could eat.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great place to hang for an energetic fun evening. Brunch is also great. The music is modern and great to listen to. The hostess was extremely friendly and the food was great.

Name: Raul
Review: Music was a bit too loud, but overall everything was really nice.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very disappointed in my experience at Magic Hour after wanting to visit for so long. There was ZERO ambiance which is why most people come here for the pink “instagrammable” moment. The food was NOT good an overpriced for no reason. I had the salmon Cesar salad and my salmon was under cooked pink and raw inside, no seasoning and zero taste.  I couldn’t even finish it. The manager did take one of the salads off our bill and sent us some “free fries” to try to compensate for the terrible food. It was hot and muggy and their ACs really didn’t make much of a difference. The seating is also unleveled as if you’re sitting on the couch and the person sitting across from you is sitting on a chair, you’re literally looking “up” at the person you’re dining with smh! The hostess at the ground level entrance was anything but inviting as she seemed to have an attitude and there was no hostess at the front upstairs upon our arrival leaving customers to try to figure out if they should go right or left to find their table. Overall my experience was underwhelming and I definitely will not be back. Completely disappointed!!!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Loved this place from the music, to service, drinks, views & vibes! For food we got the sliders & fries which were yummy and drinks we got a pitcher of “The Diplomat” so delicious if you love fruity drinks!
IAMDJEONE played bangers back to back. Had so much fun moving our bodies last night. Highly recommend! ☺️

Name: Nixdad
Review: Went for a bite and a drink for lunch before a broadway show. Nice rooftop atmosphere.

Name: JosephS
Review: Not awesome

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Adorable rooftop bar! Menu is very limited and the frozen drink machine was broken… but it was a fun time!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Expensive food but nice location. Noise can be toned down though.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Nice place with an excellent view! I should recommend the happy hour, prices are a little bit high but i guess overall is worth it.

Name: AlfyFishbag
Review: the lounge was really slow, not busy at all but, the service was non-existent and we were seated in a dark corner and were ignored.

Name: Burgameister
Review: For all of the high security trouble they put you through to get into the place, you would think they would put more effort into making it worth your while. Didn’t have any of the drinks that I wanted (no single malt scotch) and the food options really suck. Service was not particularly attentive and our server didn’t know what a single malt scotch was. Crowd was mostly on the younger more pedestrian side, which might explain the food and drink options. Nice rooftop though, but that’s about it.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Dinning was NA. Music is like in club. We were given a table next to the speakers, dark hidden, no view. Decided to leave

Name: BlancaQ
Review: Hostess was very rude.  Felt like the nicer room with the spinning bench was for reserved more for non-minorities people and the other side was reserved for minorities.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The rooftop itself is cool with great views. But the music was so loud I could barely hear my husband or the server talk. We wanted to leave right away but decided to stay for a drink and bite. The French fries were ok. But the pink cozy cupcake was awful. The frosting was really gross (like it didn’t even taste like frosting). And the cupcake itself was really dry. The server let us send it back - which was nice. But I won’t be going back.

Name: CynthiaM
Review:
I recently dined at magic hour rooftop , and unfortunately, my experience was far from satisfactory. Despite the high expectations set by its online presence and glowing reviews, the ambience of the restaurant was a significant letdown.

From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere felt chaotic and poorly managed. The lighting was harsh and uninviting, more akin to a fast-food joint than a supposedly upscale establishment. The seating arrangement was cramped, and I found myself constantly bumping elbows with the diners at the next table, making for a very uncomfortable dining experience.

To add to the discomfort, the décor was outdated and mismatched, failing to provide the elegant and sophisticated atmosphere one would expect from a restaurant of this caliber. It seemed like no real thought or care was put into creating an enjoyable dining environment.

Overall, while the food might have potential, the poor ambience overshadowed everything else, making it impossible to enjoy the meal. I would not recommend if you’re looking for a pleasant dining experience. There are far better options available that provide both great food and a welcoming atmosphere.

Name: RachelS
Review: The place looks nothing how it was adverstised on social media.  It has no pink in the place, was "between seasons" so there was zero decor which was unacceptble. Serivce as horrible and slow and unaware of needs of party.  Tables are low, tiny meanwhile their food is massive (no where to put anything).  This place is a gimmick and so overrated for what it claims to be.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We had a great time when we came for our girls trip, Food was ok but the atmosphere was great!

Name: AlanaF
Review: The rooftop has unique surroundings with a great atmosphere, ambiance, great food, and amazing service. The unusual size of the pink croissants and pancakes impressed us!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We stayed at the Moxy for a 21st birthday party - started and ended the evening at Magic Hour and had a wonderful time!

Name: JoseB
Review: Great bar, music was vibing. Service has to step it up but other than that, everything else was on point.

Name: KG000
Review: Good vibe, good music, but was expecting a better happy hour experience. Pretty slow for a happy hour? I will add that the adult capri sun drink was awesome!! Would get that again! @the.local.blonde

Name: AmandaC
Review:
Bad customer service would not recommend 
Very disappointed after going to other rooftops this is at the bottom to recommend

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: If you’re going for pink aesthetic then they don’t have it. I did request them to add this information to their page  because most people like myself go to such places for special occasions.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Didn’t have the food, so I don’t believe it to be an accurate statement. I was bummed that it was indoor but that was because of the rain. I wasn’t impressed by their menu options given how expensive everything was. Potentially would go back on a sunnier day specifically for the view. Other than that, service was really kind.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Not suitable for a 85-year-old! Found online and CV read good things about the views but didn't quite realise it was a very loud and energetic bar!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: La verdad el lugar no llenó mis expectativas // yo pensé que Hera como en las fotos bien decorado , que iba a estar de bonito como en las fotos y la verdad muy simple y la persona que nos sentó en la mesa muy complicada para darnos la mesa que yo quería y el lugar estaba  vacío prácticamente solo unas cuantas mesas pero según ella estaban reservadas todas y casi tomo la desicion de irme pero al final nos sentó ..

Name: disappointed
Review: This is probably a fun bar at night but we came for brunch bc of beautiful photos online but when we got there it smelled like a frat house. Stale alcohol masked by cleaning product. Didn’t feel clean - no cute ambiance like the photos and the food wasn’t brunch food. They had chicken tenders … it was nothing like we expected and we left.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Beautiful brunch. Food was delicious.  Lots of photo opportunities and a great bar.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I had the greatest time.  Great food great drinks and great service.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Los tragos y la comida  correctos. La atención del personal bastante deficiente parece en todo momento que quisieran que tomes tu trago y te vayas cuanto antes. No lo recomiendo .

Name: CarlosT
Review: Over all, good experience. Hosted took me around to pick my perfect table, was great!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: False advertising! Looked absolutely nothing like the pictures! Not 1 pink decor seen anywhere! We drove all the way from out of state and was so disappointed. The waitress was also very rude,she threw our takeaway bags at us.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Service wasn’t good and was very slow, we had to ask for basic things like water for the table and napkins. It was my daughter’s birthday and they kinda took forever to bring out the birthday dessert. They also overcharged us for something on the bill as well. None of the great aesthetics and decor that I couldn’t wait to see was present when I went, I guess they were in transition so there was absolutely no decorations, it was pretty disappointing. But hopefully better luck next time I go, maybe it was just this one time.

Name: LisaS
Review: It was a very magical night. We enjoyed it thoroughly and would recommend the Magic Hour.

Name: TrueBlue
Review:
View actually very limited
Good vibe though
great cocktails

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Bait & Switch. Beware!!!! I booked this bar for happy hour in order to celebrate my daughter’s birthday with a few of her friends. 8 minutes after happy hour ended, and 2+ rounds in, I was informed by the server that happy hour “is only at the bar”. We were sitting 6 feet away at a bar table. I saw the happy hour heavily promoted with great prices for drinks and apps and booked this bar only based on this promotion. I was never told there was a restriction when seated or served. We all work in the hospitality industry and were shocked.

In addition to the fraudulent bait and switch it was a disappointing experience for other reasons. The service was incredibly slow and unprofessional(with the only exception being the very courteous hostess). We had to stand up and walk to the bar several times where outlets waitress was just chatting me with friends instead of serving tables. The quality of the drinks was also not great. We had to send the Negroni back as it came out pink and unrecognizable as a Negroni. The food was low quality for the price- no garnishes or care in plating, a surprise cake was set on the table with no instruction as to how to access the cake. We thought it was plastic. We were given no utensils. And finally had to ask what to do with the box. Server returned with a fork and knife and walked away to leave us wondering how to break open the surprise…

Extremely disappointing experience all the way around. I sent an email to management and have gotten no response. It was over $600 for 3 rounds of drinks and a few appetizers. It felt like we were sold one thing and charged for another. I will not go back and encourage others to avoid at all costs!!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: My second Time visiting this place!! And I’ll back sooner. ❤️

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Good photo opportunities. Chicken fingers were tasty but fries were dry

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Decent food, nothing special.
Glad that I went but I was underwhelmed.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: When we got there and was seated the floors where cracked and every time someone passed by us our table and seats would move . The drinks were good but the food was bad I ordered tenders that were frozen on the inside and tasted very odd . My partners food was also cold and the chicken sandwich was not cooked enough inside . The bathrooms where extremely dirty both of them & the customer service took long to even get our order in and it was not even that busy

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was great the ambiance was fruitful and the location was even better

Name: ChristineD
Review: Everything was pink and perfect.  Great brunch with great views

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Celebrated my sister’s birthday with 12 guests. Everything was on point. Perfect for looks of pics. Best item on the menu was the sliders. Even my 91 year old grandma was dancing her heart out. It was the perfect surprise. Thanks for taking good care of us. We will be back.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: El ambiente es muy de turistas teen. Fui con mi mamá por su cumpleaños para cenar, pero el ambiente era de fiesta, no podiamos hablar. La comida es de bar poco elaborada, nachos, chicken fingers etc. y no son muy buena calidad. No lo recomiendo, a pesar de que el setting se vea bonito. Ir si se busca baile

Name: LilBolivian
Review: The vibe, restaurant staff and food were amazing. I can’t wait for my next visit to the Moxy.

Name: IvanaW
Review: Great good especially for the price.  We loved the chicken and pink pancakes.  The service was awesome.  Ideal for any celebration

Name: longislandtom
Review:
Very touristy - nice place, but I guess it was the night we went
I’d give it a second chance if given

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Bellissimo…. Personale cortese e attento.
Locale molto bello… drink super.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The aesthetic of the Magic Hour is amazing and our server was pretty good also. The only issue I have is the drink/cost value. We paid for the “left the group chat” shot flight and I will say after about 4 shots between me and my friends we didn’t even feel as if we were drinking at all. Very sweet drinks and felt as if there was no alcohol at all in them. Food was ok.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Loved Magic Hour, however the menu was very limited and the restrooms were incredibly dirty.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Preordered the croissant and could barely eat it cuz it essentially was allll blue frosting. Like COATED and hardened. Disappointed.  All the other food was decent but not great as well.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: ￼ best rooftop bar in the city. Great location and great drinks.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Went there to eat recently and everything was delicious! Our server Meleny was fabulous! Overall a great experience :)

Name: TihishaR
Review: Nice vibe and friendly staff! Would definitely recommend.

Name: mariod
Review: Great experience l, cool vibe. Repeat visit. Very pleased overall.

Name: LizcC
Review:
Host could not find our reservation for more than 30 mins just had just standing there while she was helping other people finally sits us at a small corner table 
We sat there for 20 mins no server ever came we didn’t even get menus

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: A little pricey but really nice for the pictures and to have a good time with friends

Name: RickM
Review:
food is really good and not too expensive
Roof top is a bit misleading is more like a covered patio (the sliding roof was not open for us
the music is too loud to have a conversation. Volume level is fine for a club but not for dinner

Name: JaimeT
Review: Nice vibe. Was not crowded for a Sat night. The DJ could’ve been better honestly…the crowd overall had low energy due to the music. More hits could’ve been played. But my girls well had a good time.

Name: xchal
Review: Photo booth was not working and staff told us it's not their problem. service was so poor- took over 20 mins for waitress to even approach us and an extra 30 mins after that for our drinks to arrive- wasn't even busy..

Name: eugenep
Review: We had a ball. Me and my wife will probably visit everytime we visit NY.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Our first experience was great, had a fun time. We went for date night. Kinda wished they had more of a selection for appetizers because they aren’t sharing as appetizers would. Mind you the fries with param cheese, sliders were amazing!! But 3 sliders for $22 is kinda a stretch lol. The drinks are $15+ but they were worth it because they were also yummmm. I wasn’t sure what to get but i’m into sweet so i tried the Moira Rose and loved! very good. smooth. will be going back soon <3

Name: FabiolaC
Review: The food and atmosphere was amazing. Please try their parm fries and the sliders, you won't be disappointed. And the service was very quick. The wait staff was very good and you were guided throughout the lounge by bouncers. I really liked the service.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was a wonderful experience and so beautiful. It was nice to be there mid afternoon because you get to see everything. At night it’s very crowded and hard to move around and really see all the beautiful decor.

Name: JenniferM
Review: More food options; the menu is not inclusive to vegetarians, there wasn't even a seafood option.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Brunch exceeded my expectations for my daughter’s 15th bday. Aesthetically it was so beautiful. Service was great, the dj had it at just the right level to talk and enjoy the rooftop. This place is outstanding.

Name: JessicaC
Review: Such a vibe! My kids enjoyed it too! The drinks were stout and the food was creative !

Name: JenJenei
Review: My daughter had a great time. Beautiful location, good food, great service… will be visiting again soon.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Horrible experience from start to finish. Hostess ignored me twice while assisting “more important “ looking patrons. After waiting for almost two hours, I received a table only to be ignored by the waitress. Finally I was able to place and order. The waitress took over 20 minutes to put in the order causing me to miss the menu cutoff, after 10pm is only late night! I got frustrated and left! Will never come back here!!!!

Name: MCMG
Review: Perfect fancy brunch treat for my daughter’s 18th birthday!

Name: BeaS
Review: I can not recommend the place. Food and drinks are not good but pricy.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The vibe and decor is fun and that’s why we came. It was during brunch time. The sandwich I had was fine, nothing stellar, a bit dry. The omelet she had was also middle of the road. Neither was a value necessarily. The Moira Rose was a fun and tasty cocktail. Donuts were good, unique taste, a bit pricey. Didn’t see our server much. Refills of water were hard to come by for us and neighboring table.  Glad we went, some fine tuning and we would come back.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Disappointed visit!
Cupcake was all icing.
Disappointing cocktails

Name: RBMom
Review: Great experience was disappointed that they took the grilled cheese off the menu -

Name: ClaraF
Review: Super unfriendly staff, happy hour drinks not good, made for people to take pictures, not enjoy drinks.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I love my experience at magic hour I will definitely go back

Name: CristianT
Review: Amazing place and the food was very good alongside the staff was very professional and the views of Empire State Building was perfect.

Name: SuzetteB
Review: This was my 2nd time here & I can't wait to come back again. I love everything about this place. LOVE LOVE LOVE

Name: Morgan
Review: Olivia really set this restaurant apart from the others while visiting NYC on spring break. Service was quick and we were checked on often. Olivia listened to us and gave great recommendations. I hope when I return I can see Olivia again!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: To begin, we stayed at the Moxy Hotel yet had to walk outside in the pouring rain to walk through an outside door when the elevator inside the hotel went straight to the restaurant. The greeter was so confused by a large group that I think she put wristbands on everyone who continued to enter the building until I stepped in and let her know we had a reservation. Then, she didn’t give us wristbands, said we didn’t need them, which became a problem once we went upstairs. Anyone and everyone we encountered at the Rooftop Bar was disorganized and/or rude. Our table was broken and it took a few uncomfortable requests for them to seat us at one of their other *many empty tables. The QR code didn’t work on my phone or my tech savvy daughter’s. Acting completely put out, they brought us a paper version of the dinner menu instead of one for brunch. (I would have left at this point, or sooner, but my teenage daughter was very much looking forward to this pink experience for her birthday.) We pieced together ideas for our order (since no one could find a menu for us). My daughter watched as servers brought pink pancakes with giant sparklers on top. We ordered the pancakes, pink donuts, and a side of bacon. When the pancakes were brought over, I asked why a sparkler wasn’t included on ours. She incredulously asked, “You want to put it on now?” I replied that we would since it was my daughter’s birthday. (My daughter was looking defeated at this point.) Seeing how long and befuddled everyone who worked there seemed during the ordering process, I asked for the check and explained that we had a show we wanted to catch so it would be easiest to have the freedom to leave as soon as we had finished. The server could not understand why we wanted the check so soon. The food was tasty, looked amazing, as did the restaurant, but it didn’t even matter at that point. The experience was an overpriced nightmare and this restaurant is one that I would NEVER recommend to anyone else.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: A very nice location to eat and drink sometime BUT it takes too long to get the order and it’s not worth for the quality

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Food was great. Music needed to be more upbeat and modern.  Waitress was good. Overall chill vibe .

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Awesome bar with views of the Empire State Building. Will be back in the summer for the open rooftop.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Instagramable place, very nice with nice views! Recommended

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great experience, the networking team was awesome as well shout out to Alex. Beautiful place and wonderful people and 10/10 service

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: This was a really fun experience for my birthday. Loved all the pink and the donuts were delicious

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Service was sloooow. Awesome view. Fun atmosphere.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Love Magic Hour, I’ve celebrated many times here! They were very accommodating  for my group of 9,food was delicious as well as the drinks. Def recommend the Moira rose drink very addicting,  we had a great time and can’t wait to go back!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very cute brunch spot with lots of photo opportunities. I know the brunch is open to all age groups but there were groups of children running around the carousel and screaming as if they were at the playground and not a restaurant/lounge. This was not addressed and definitely took away from the enjoyment of the experience as we really just wanted to have a nice brunch experience and not feel like it was the middle of recess at a daycare center. Otherwise, service was great and I always get the same plate which is delicious

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Cute pink theme but the food was very ehhh.. I wouldn’t come back for food, just drinks and a vibe.

Name: Shopper456
Review: The check in process was extremely slow and disorganized. It was a very unpleasant experience.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Personal sehr unfreundlich ….
Extrem überteuert
Lustig erlebt zu habe, ist jedoch kein must

Name: jojo
Review: I went for my birthday! It was GREAT! Me and my husband had a good time!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The wait was longer than expected from getting seated to getting our orders taken. But food and drink were good and vibes were nice.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Ratchet club, doesn't look anything like the pictures

Name: NewYorkerLivingInLondon
Review: I unfortunately did not get to try the food, I was very surprised by the level of noise in this very small rooftop lounge, that was set up for a brunch on Saturdays and Sundays. The music was so loud, you could barely hear the host or server, did not make for a pleasant lunch on a Sunday afternoon, I and my guests left immediately after entering. Not ideal, will not be ever going back.

Name: MassielM
Review: Let’s start with the location. It’s absolutely stunning. Perfect for capturing beautiful pictures. This location is great for birthdays or bridal events. Now why I didn’t give it 5 stars? The service was absolutely horrible. We kept trying to get things and waited an hour for a glass of water. We got our food and one of friends waited half an hour for her fries. It came once she finished her entree. The food was mediocre but that is most expected when places look that good. Menu was very small and that’s fine if the food was good. The only thing I liked was my salad. Everyone else’s food was not good. A tip would be to improve the quality of the service at least and then working on the food. The best part was the photos!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Fun night out. The Food and drinks were just okay.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Hermoso lugar,  buen ambiente, comida deliciosa y excelentes cocteles.
Atención increíble 🤗🤗🤗🤗

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Coat check and elevator attendee was very Kurt and rude- made an unwelcome impression before we made it to our table

Name: ArletteB
Review: The food was not the best at all. The service was however great.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: There’s 2 areas for brunch. One is more of a lounge area and to eat food is not the best. We asked the hostess to sit us on side (right from hostess stand) where the carousel was and she told us she couldn’t. My party and I personally felt they put the minorities on the left/lounge side and the white folks on the restaurant side. I say this because after asking to be seated on the right. They told us no availability and they sat a group of white people who did not have reservations that was waiting behind us. Our waitress Maria seemed to be occupied. She never checked on us to see if we liked our food or if we needed refills on our mimosa’s. The food was yummy I had to toast, my friends has the breakfast platter with potatoes, bacon and then the sandwich. Which was super yummy. Not a big food selection if you aren’t with a group the “pink” food is a little overwhelming for a group of 4. So we did not try any of the pink brunch food.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I love this place, everything pink! The food is great and awesome customer service.

Name: Lauren
Review: Nice ambiance, cool decor, would go back again when its warmer out

Name: Notoldenough
Review: It Sucks I would not recommend it !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Name: JanaeB
Review: The place is nice an comfortable I feel like y’all should expand the menu with  more options of food

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Loved it , the ambience , music was everything as well !!! Food could be better more choices lol for late night other than that highly recommen

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Absolutely loved this experience and would definitely go back! The atmosphere was really cool and the drinks and food were great.

Name: juliew
Review: Pink AF Brunch. It was cute but meh...service was very slow, the brunch menu was limited for 'real' food. The pink food and drinks were fun but VERY pricey.

Name: Magnificent
Review: Second time always a vibe! The drinks were on point and the food and my pics came out so dope

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Overpriced, watered down, overly sweet drinks were served in plastic cups and we’re convinced they contained barely any alcohol; music was so loud our waiter couldn’t even hear us to take our order; the actual outdoor rooftop part is closed and they won’t let you out there so no good views of the city or rooftop picture opportunities. Really didn’t feel like we were at a rooftop bar, super disappointing.

Name: Rayne
Review: The food is limited. Need more different food. Drinks are good.

Name: Dana
Review: LOVE it!! Great food, decor, ambiance, and service.

Name: AnnK
Review: This is just an place to take Instagram photos.  Food poor, not  full food menu. even smores dessert is pretty but was stale n cold, n hard. Not at all a smore!!

Name: Sonali
Review: Great place to take pics and see stunning views of NYC.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Waitress was not attentive or knowledgeable. Waited a very long time before someone came over to ask us our order.

Name: JoelC
Review: Amazing drinks! Such a fun theme and the food from legasea is great.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It is a very beautiful place but we did not like the food or drinks.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Bring your niece to brunch day!!!! It was expensive but absolutely adorable, with wonderful music, and a very festive atmosphere.

Name: KristaC
Review: Rude terrible elevator man for two happy birthday girls.  Terrible food I mean worst ever!  The tables are dirty and worn out.  It's perfect for posting pictures to hype up the business but not worth any amount of money.  If you are going there to drink then this place would be great.  Not a place for brunch!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Nothing really special. Thought it would be a lot better looking at pictures.

Name: ChrissyM
Review:
The place was beautiful!!!
I was from out of town and I made reservations for the wrong time and she definitely corrected that for me which I was happy
Inside was gorgeous 
Waitress was nice
The food was ok, I got a breakfast sandwich and it was dry
My drink was awesome tho
Cinnamon roll lacked flavor and was also dry

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Seamless experience from checking in to dining experience. The ambiance was everything as well as the staff was very nice and hospitable. They even brought out a cupcake with a sparkler when I told them we were celebrating my friends birthday. For my second time being there and my friends first time we truly had an amazing time and would def come back again

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We loved the decor and the ambience and especially the view. The drinks were good and the service was nice. The food was so so and the prices were as expected for a nightclub like this overall, we had a very enjoyable evening.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Fun and pink! We enjoyed the music and atmosphere!!

Name: MaeganB
Review: The ambiance lived up to the hype, but the food was beyond what I expected! It was soooo good! And the price isn’t bad. Definitely will be back when we return to NYC..

Name: JessieP
Review: Went for brunch so my 17 year old niece could come too, I was worried it was a tourist trap and the food wouldn’t be good, but it was! And it’s soo cute. It’s expensive but it’s an experience

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Exactly what you expect. Food could have been better but was decent.

Name: CelineW
Review: Amazing ambiance, expected more based on what is shown on social media but very cute lounge and bar. Food menu is limited but the options available were filling and presentation was nice. Would definitely return and recommend

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: What an enjoyable night at Magic Hour! We made our reservation only 30 minutes before, showed up a little early and the host was welcoming. The entire time I was there, I kept thinking what an awesome place this would be to take the gals for brunch some time. In the evenings, it’s a great place for a girls night out too. This establishment definitely knows its target audience — the drinks are so tasty and the decorations were great for a little photo op. All this being said, I went with my boyfriend here and we had an amazing time! We got a berry bubbly, party pouch, and the fix. Our server was so kind, she was very easygoing and polite! All in all, great experience and energy from everyone around us!

Name: elphie
Review: amazing place, great food, great vibe and nice music

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The place is extremely beautiful, the experience during Valentine’s Day got even better after the lovely welcome and was more the helpful with other details.

Name: maria
Review: When we made the reservation, some very relevant points were not specified on the website. On the reservation website, each person would be entitled to 1 drink, however, when we got there we had no choice, the only option was a hot drink which we certainly wouldn't choose. The same thing happened with dessert, we couldn't choose. The dessert was cake, which wouldn't be our choice either as neither my boyfriend nor I really like cake. the main course was good but I didn't think it was anything special considering the price of the dinner. conclusion: horrible experience, we left there and went to another restaurant, we ate and drank much better for the same price. They should make it clearer on the booking website that the customer has no choice. I've never paid so much for such a bad experience, I wouldn't go back even for free.

Name: Nish
Review: We had the best time for Galentine’s Day 💕, 3 of my friends and I !!!

Name: StevieK
Review: Great decor and that’s about the only good thing.

Name: HandS
Review: Very great service friendly attentive staff would definitely return.

Name: DorothyS
Review: Fun place. IG pics worthy.. food is just ok but I think most people go for the decor which did not disappoint.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Food menu is lacking a lot. Their brunch menu does not even have coffee! They need to revamp this menu asap

Name: DiegoH
Review:
We ordered shared food, it took almost 1 hour to arrive, and it was average. We ordered calamari, chicken fingers (not fingers), and tortilla chips (it was good).

The cocktails are poorly served in plastic glassware and flavors were ok, expensive for the quality you receive over the price.

Ambient was ok, overrated for what you expect.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The staff was friendly and the decor for Valentine Day was amazing!

Name: CinV
Review: I was very underwhelmed with our experience. We brought the Galentines day experience package (the most expensive one). I noticed that the host kept asking if ppl had reservations which we did. I noticed that everyone with reservations were going to the entrance on the right, and for some reason I went to the left, which was less decorated, and everyone was more casual, which I felt overdressed. I did however, ask my server if we were able to switch sides because we did buy a package and we were here for the experience. She was lovely and let her manager know that we wanted to be seated in the other area which they were very nice and accommodated. We proceeded to tell our new server that we had a package we showed her on our phone and she went on to say that she had to check for herself which she came back and confirmed that we did indeed have a package. We asked her what it included, which she proceeded to tell us. Our drink that was included was basically champagne with a little cotton candy which was selling for $25 which was insane. We had a small plate which I got the truffle grilled cheese, tasted OK which came with the tomato soup now this is where I had the issue the menu said that it came with gruyere cheese but my cheese was yellow and gruyere cheese is white. The manager proceeded to tell me they mix cheddar and Swiss to MAKE gruyere cheese. Which should of been stated on the menu they weren’t actually using gruyere cheese which is why I wanted it and let’s not get started on the stab cake which was 90% frosting (which tasted grossed). When we did get to the cake it was ok. The experience definitely wasn’t worth the $95pp we paid. Which included tax and gratitude before the service which is possible why the service wasn’t above and beyond. Wouldn’t do another experience there again. And if you’re gonna have an experience for a certain holiday, you should up your dress code.  I’ve been here before and I’ve had a great experience on a regular night.

Name: janel
Review: My boyfriend and I had a great time. We had a chance to enjoy the scenery on the roof top and took lots of photos near the cute mini golf course. Will definitely go again🤗.

Name: InezB
Review: Fun place to go with the girls! Definitely recommend!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was perfect for a girls night out. We had a great timer and would come back again

Name: YeniferH
Review: nice view, , honestly I don’t like the food and the drinks was horrible. pretty place for pictures nothing else.

Name: Bobaperc
