Review: There’s more to this review but I can’t fit it all so all I have to say is, THERE WAS A BUG IN OUR DRINK!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: excellent place, incredible appetizer, very good attention, recommended to 💯😍😍

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: La asignación de mesas mala, servicio lento. La comida estuvo rica

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was our first time and we could not have enjoyed it more!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Perfect spot for a girls night out! Great view and fun times

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Except for the worker in the hallway entrance after the coat check by the elevators yelled and acted exasperated while ￼giving instructions on how to get to the rooftop, everything else was nice. He was working on Feb 3rd at 5 pm. I don’t think I’ll go back because of that.

Name: AquilaH
Review:
I had an excellent experience with the hostess, Bartender, Waitress and other staff. My friend and I had such a good experience.  
I am definitely coming back with more people. I also posted videos and pictures from the rooftop. Everyone been asking me about this place.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: This was my 3rd time and it’s always an awesome experience!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very neat and cute experience!! Would definitely visit again.

Name: Ale1
Review: Came back for my birthday and had a great night!!!

Name: KatieL
Review: 10/10 recommend. the servers were great, very fast. they offered to take pictures for us throughout the night. they made sure we made it to each photo op. drinks were delicious. the vibe is amazing, a must see for sure!

Name: Chrisb
Review:
The servers were not attentive—had to request water several times. The menu item was described as “home fries + vegetable + protein” but in reality was primarily a salad with a few sautéed vegetables and about 3 potatoes.
Beautiful venue and ambiance— but not for the food.

Name: Jason
Review:
Restaurant looks great and the view is amazing. Food was ok, but nothing special at all. 

That said, every bit of staff I had to speak with that wasn't my waitress or coat check person was completely terrible to interact with. The attitude of the staff was shocking especially the person who watches the elevator. I realize it was a Saturday at 7pm in NYC, but wow. I am a polite, paying customer. Yikes. Every male in this restaurant is unbelievably rude and is enough that I won't ever be returning here.

Name: KristiM
Review: Slow service. Beautifully decorated in some areas but was sat in the back like peasants, even though I made the reservation two weeks prior.￼ It may be a rooftop bar but you can’t see anything from the top. No views whatsoever. Very loud! It’s more of a young hip bar.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Amazing vibe great drinks and service. Table service was great

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The side of the bar that has the carousel was closed for a private event, so what really makes this place special was not an option during our reservation. The drink menu was unnecessarily confusing and drink options were lacking but we did like the deserts.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
It was a great experience the night we attended. Food was good. Service was okay. It wasn’t very busy the night we were there.

I was unfortunately disappointed in the way my friend was treated the following day. She went back to the establishment looking for a gift which she left on accident. Although it was her responsibility. The restaurant restricted her for even going to look for it. Like we didn’t just spend money with them the night before. That left a bad taste in my mouth. The restaurant wasn’t busy. They could’ve at least allowed her to take a look around.

Name: DianelaE
Review: I love the environment and the drinks. It has a beautiful view.

Name: VanessaM
Review: Super cute 🥰 loved the decorations. Food was good. Loved the hot chocolate. Drinks were good.

Name: Chokiepoo
Review: Small food selection but chicken from Legasea was yummy and pancakes were enough to feed a whole village. Wine bottles were 25% off that day. They forgot to give us the discount but credited us extra when we complained about it. The only real complaint I have is that the hotel guests had to go outside the hotel and around the corner to fall back in line at the same elevator we came from. You’d think hotel guests with reservations would get a bit of a special treatment, but maybe I expected too much.

Name: ShivaniB
Review: Beautiful Decor, food was scrumptious, get the Moira rose

Name: JosephineL
Review: Completely over hyped. Mediocre decor and basic food. However, staff was AMAZING and so helpful and kind!

Name: CrystalS
Review: Overall the food and atmosphere was great. However the sitting place was very close together for a large party. If you tried to get up you would bump the table next to you. Our server was missing most of the service so other people where having to assist us and most of them brought one thing and would walk off before we could get our order corrected. I would also recommend going when brunch first opens because our reservation was at two but we were being rushed to leave which was crazy to me because we didn't receive all the items that where ordered.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
everything was
wonderful  i cannot  complain. Drinks was amazing.

Name: DionM
Review: This place is a must see experience. Keep it grown & sexy.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The ambience is pretty to take photos. We didn’t get drinks but those also seemed good based on what we saw. The food was not as good as we had hoped.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: La experiencia estuvo muy buena. El personal muy amable y todo bonito

Name: MaddieM
Review: Overpriced drinks and food. My $20 gin drink had a frozen "gin" cube but gin doesn't freeze so there can't have been more than a drop in it. The server spilled some of my drink on me and brushed past it. You get a nice view of the Empire State building but there are better venues.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was good only for one visit, i wouldn’t go there again. Not so exciting as in pictures. Music was so loud that we were screaming to each other. Food didn’t try becouse my friends didn’t recommended, tried only some cupcake, not bad. I couldn’t feel alcohol in my Cocktail at all, was to syrupy. Service was really good. So its good for pictures, but otherwise not my favorites list.

Name: RosemaryD
Review: One of the best places I’ve been too in awhile. Great atmosphere and the music was awesome. The drinks and small plates were delicious. Definitely going back soon.

Name: Marielle
Review: Love this place, so fun and great atmosphere! Love the photo ops

Name: Reddyn
Review: Good place to take out of town guests. Has an Instagram vibe to it. Small menu and drinks were ok. Good place to spend an hour and take fun pics.

Name: RIdiner
Review: We went to have brunch for 2 to celebrate a birthday.   Theme was Pink AF brunch and it definitely brought the pink!  Pink decor, pink themed mini carousel, pink alcohol and non-alcohol drinks, and pink brunch items.  There was a regular brunch menu and a a menu with special pink brunch items.  The pink brunch items were over the top, including 2 of the most over the top items, in my opinion:  a super huge stack of extra large pink pancakes with pink cotton candy on top and a massively huge pink croissant.  I think a table of 5 would struggle to clean the plates of these 2 items - it is that much food!  The atmosphere was cute (and pink) and we saw several other diners get into the pink spirit with pink outfits which was super fun to see.  We ordered just the pancakes and they were very good but did not finish as there was only 2 of us.  The pancakes come with sides and my companion really enjoyed the apples. I would say the other sides were fair.  It would have been great to have real maple syrup - maybe with sparkles added!  The pink mocktail we had was delicious and beautiful.  The sever was pleasant too.  Overall we had a very nice experience.  I would note that if you have gone to other Tao group owned venues, this one is not quite as excellent as some of their other restaurant experiences - but I recommend that you keep in mind that the Magic Hour is a rooftop bar, so expectations should be adjusted for fine  dining.  It was a very fun experience and recommend going for an experience that is out of the norm.

Name: shonettao
Review: It’s a great place to go to for the aesthetic. The food was terrible. The pink AF croissant was hard and tasted nasty.

Name: ErikaA
Review: My table was in front of the door to go outside, and it kept staying open I had to stand up to close it. Also if u have a table next to the door at lease you should have a heater next to the table in cold times.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Food was terrible. We choose the “crispy calamari”, and it came soft; the texture was off. Terrible. Truffle fries: where’s the truffle flavor, guys? Like… why??????? Service was bad too, very bad; people were all over the place, rushing the orders and making no sense. Multiple serves came to the table, no knowing that other had come; it seemed to me that they don’t communicate well. I really thought I was about to have a blast in that place, specifically because their marketing is amazing online… and btw, it looks different in person. Very different.

Name: HollyV
Review: Love the vibe! Wish I could see more from the rooftop

Name: JohnF
Review: We had a good time, was a cool spot and the employees were very nice.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great place! Great atmosphere! Would definitely go back during the warmer months

Name: Dora
Review: Amazing experience, the staff is so friendly and professional! Totally worth it 10/10

Name: LeanneT
Review: Upon arrival we were shown to our table which displayed a very limited brunch menu.  I asked the waitress of this was the extent of the food available and was told yes that was it.  I had booked this dining experience with my husband and 7 year old daughter.  As I had booked for brunch and given that I had asked the question about the menu, I did not question this further.  We were disappointed in the limited choice but went with it.  We ordered the sharing pancake stack which was priced at $50.  None if us really wanted this but this was the best of the options available.  When it arrived, it consisted of a giant stack of dry pink pancakes with candy floss on top.  There were three small dishes of fruit and syrup on the side.  Despite it looking presentable, the food was barely edible.  We managed to eat half of one pancake each.  We then noticed other people ordering other food which was not on our menu.  When we asked again, we were told that we should have been informed of the other menu accessible via a QR code.  We were past ordering anything else.  We reluctantly paid the $50 plus bill and left disappointed.  We had spent an amazing 6 days in NY having travelled on New Years day from the UK.  This was supposed to be our final experience before leaving for the airport.  Very disappointing.  Would very definitely not recommend.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Setting was adorable with cute photo opps.  Food average but reasonably priced, service friendly but average.  Overall a very fun experience!

Name: JessicaT
Review: Well, we bought into the hype and it was a disappointing choice for our family of 3. The pink decor was a nice touch but al furniture was shoddy looking and it was cold next to the windows. The food was fair at best - for the price of a brunch would have expected more.  Maybe good night spot but during the day for brunch would not recommend.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: From the second we stepped up to the door and the bouncer turned us away rudely to when the server took only two of the four drink orders are our table, the whole experience was terrible. This place is made for Instagram influencers and no one else. Not a single employee had a smile on their face. So disappointed having been to other restaurants owned but my this group.

Name: GaryN
Review: Expecting a birthday celebration for my friend, so I selected the occasion as Birthday but turns out nothing came out

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Beautiful decor , yummy cocktails.  Great photo ops.  Fun place.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: jus ew. i love pink but it wasn’t worth that HELL!!!

Name: AshleyB
Review: Great spot with great service! Loved the music! Good was fantastic!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Ordered one dish, and it was cold, un-eatable. The drinks were too syrupy, we really only enjoyed the Photo Booth, but even that was a little disappointing given that it was tiny.

Name: ShirleyP
Review: I expected more from what’ I’ve seen on videos. But it was okay good. Waitress wasn’t talkative or anything. Just felt like we weren’t even there to her.

Name: FabrizioB
Review: High prices but cocktails are good. We didn't get any food so I cannot judge it. Atmosphere was fantastic, and people seemed all to enjoy it.

Name: GingerC
Review: I was totally rushed. 3pm reservation (15 min grace period) I was there at 3pm exactly and had to wait 15 mins because the hostess walked away then returned 15 mins later. I told her I was there at 3 but she said she was helping somebody else. Then they were rushing me telling me they are about to stop serving food. Then on top of that I went to use the bathroom with my 2 yr old son then I returned from the bathroom. They threw all his food away, after he only had 1 bite of the chicken fingers. There was a whole order that I wanted to take home because I knew he would not finish it. Also, they charged me for TAP seltzer water, if I were being charged I would have preferred the bottle, not tap water. Maybe good for a quick photo op because of the christmas tree, but service not so great.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: In all honesty for the first time there and I took my girlfriend as a surprise she felt so in love with it and everything about it

Name: LeahF
Review: The drinks at magic hour is really good and strong. However, the food was not very impressive

Name: IdaS
Review: We came for my niece’s 21st birthday and it was a total experience for her! Truly enjoyed the atmosphere! TOP TIER

Name: ADC111
Review: The ambiance and vibe was outstanding! Surrounded by pink the illumination offered great photos, views, and people-watching. The food arrived promptly and the drinks were fantastic.

Name: YoramR
Review: Super fun and super cute! Decor is amazing*  Didn't have that many food choices

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Vodka soda and the Moira Rose cocktail was delicious!

Name: AngelaP
Review: The vibes at Magic Hour was everything. The food, drinks, music it was all great.

Name: GenesisR
Review: So dope ! The best spot to just chill & relax plus the decorations are beautiful 😻 definitely recommend.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great service amazing food and yes the Big AF croissant is BIG 🇺🇸❤️🇺🇸❤️🇺🇸❤️🇺🇸

Name: StephanieP
Review: Food and service was good. The entire bathroom area and surroundings had the absolute worst smell like sewage. Much less crowded than last year at the same time.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We had our Christmas Eve brunch here and really enjoyed it!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It’s not a holiday bar as advertised on social media. There were very few people and servers did not come around after taking first drink order. The calamari was overcooked and not many food choices.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: This place isn’t really worth the hype (especially not for brunch) unless you’re seated at an actual table. If not they seat you at these lounge chairs where you’re basically hunched over trying to eat your steak and eggs. The drinks are good and music is good. I rated  the service low because when I asked if I could wait to be seated at the table (which I specifically reserved for in advanced) I was told they were none available as I watched people exit and enter the premises. They also took my number down and said they would call me and never did.  This place is 50/50. Go early! Or maybe don’t bother going at all unless they can confirm you can have a real table. To the right of the rooftop.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was not what i expected. Cute - but not something i would do twice

Name: SilviaF
Review: Pre Christmas celebration brunch! Some of the food wasn’t warm by time it reached our table. The big croissant was a little harder than I would have liked.  Overall I would recommend. It was fun.

Name: DawnR
Review: Very cute if you want IG photos but that is where it stops. Food and service not great.

Name: TeePee
Review: Waited too long for my first drink. When I asked about it I was told they didn’t have all that was needed to Ma it. If that was the case then dont make me wait, tell me so I can order something different. Another instance that was not great was when our waitress did a last call at 1:20am, but the bar closed at 2 pm so we had at least until 1:45am, when the other servers went around to close checks.

Name: AnnaB
Review: The ambience is wonderful. Other places with similar decor take cover, but not Magic hour! Magnificent service, great food. Easy to get in. WeI’ll be back

Name: Cat03lover
Review: Breathtaking views of Manhattan.  Beautiful rooftop. Festive and magical decorations for the holiday.  Delicious food and cocktails.  Very friendly staff.

Name: JamieG
Review:
We arrived a few minutes after our reservation time, we were told our table was not ready and that we would be contacted once it was.  We went to wait at the bar as suggested.  While at the bar we could see there were quite a few tables where our party could fit comfortably, however we were not seated until after 50 minutes of waiting.  Note, we were never contacted via text regarding our table and had to ask the staff more than 3 times when our table would be ready.  At this point we were dealing with at least 3 different individuals, there seemed to be a lot of confused over a table when, as stated there were quite a few opened / available.

When we finally were seated 1 of the individuals said she was going to comp us for our 1st round of drinks.  When we ordered food, it took forever and people who were seated / ordered long after us received their food prior to us. The food was meh, DJ was all over the place having a great time by himself not tending to the crowd.  The service was an abomination, horrible, had to ask for napkins twice, never received utensils when our food came and when we asked for them, staff appeared confused on why we would need them???  I guess we were supposed to serve and eat with our hands, without napkins!   This was such a disaster Christmas office event that the Magic Hour staff ended up comping us for almost our entire bill.  So, in the end the sit down - food & drinks were a lower price than the initial drinks at the bar.

While we appreciate the staff comping us, the Magic Hour really needs to do better.  This is NYC if the atmosphere is what they want to focus on then they should get rid of the food and the rude, unskilled staff.  The seating staff and the waiters were literally going around like chickens with their heads cut off and rudely trying to rush us out at the end, taking our drinks before we even finished and preparing the table for the next guests.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: This was a cute spot for instagramming if your into that. When we walked in though the places smelled overwhelmingly fishy and vinegary. The server was like “what smell?”  It was off putting for sure. The drink menu was ok, but I didn’t really like anything I drank. Food was amazing though. We got honey grilled cheese sandwich and omg so good. Won’t be back though

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Waitress never came back so we left after waiting 15 mins.

Name: LisaA
Review: Tourist trap; cheap decor, plastic glasses. Long wait to get elevator up and down.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Fun and yummy cocktails, very cool atmosphere and places to take fun pics

Name: HeidiS
Review: Food was good. Drinks were delicious. Service was extremely sub-par. It was supposed to be decked out in all pink but the bar was so dark you could barely tell. It was an average experience for a very above average price.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very cool vibe! Relaxed environment and lots of photo props

Name: dhp18
Review: For a place the we looked forward to visiting, the service made the visit super poor. Our server seemed she would rather spend time on her phone and avoiding eye contact than engage with our table. Simply asking for the check took 20 minutes, to which I eventually had to walk around to locate her.

Name: SarahP
Review: Not quite as expected. Service good/food good - rooftop experience ok

Name: stephd
Review: Great place to enjoy with friends and family! Love it

Name: JessicaL
Review: Such a cool place to eat & drink! Came on a girls NYC trip and was not disappointed. Even had an issue with my reservation, but the staff was awesome and made it work!! All the drinks were fantastic and the food was delicious. The grilled cheese platter was our favorite! Told the elevator escort we didn’t want to leave, so he dropped us off at the Bar on the 3rd floor where we finished the night! Can’t recommend enough!!!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The atmosphere and the food was good; service could of been more attentive.

Name: KellyW
Review: In love with the decor and the city view was great! Staff was very pleasant attentive. They were able to accommodate us early even though our reservation was at 2:30. Complimentary coat check, fun menu and lots of photo opportunities!

Name: AlyssaM
Review: We took our girls here for a Christmas brunch. They loved all of the decor and enjoyed the food. So many photo opportunities!

Name: CoralysM
Review: While I was super excited to go  I was a little dissapointed when I got there. I was able to make a reservation but I got placed on the side with the people who were walk ins. It took away from the experience I expected to have. I wish I had known I was going to get seated there before going since the other side was closed for an event. I would have rescheduled for another visit.

Name: HannahW
Review: Not as Christmas-y as advertised but fun cocktails

Name: RocioG
Review: It's not a place to eat...it's perfect for drink a cocktail with fantastic view but there isn't a variety menu

Name: lynetteg
Review: Servers were super attentive even though it was really busy and also very nice and knowledgable.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The food and drinks were sub par at best. Don’t think we would return

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Service was awful.  Menu stated 25% of wine.  I asked her just to confirm and she said no.   When I showed her she was like whatever.  We asked for water 3 times and never got it.  I went to the bar and got the water.  Honestly after the initial order she never came back.  I had to ask for the check to leave.
Spiced donuts were amazing!   Prices were as expected in NYC.  The atmosphere was really pretty and fun.  If service had been better I would have given a much better rating.

Name: NeilR
Review: Poor selection of cocktails tables to close together. Food over priced .

Name: FredI
Review: This place acts like this is a high end place. Is a roof top restaurant to pushy comes to security and only one bathroom available for men. And it’s down a dark hallway.  The view outside and set up was excellent. The food. Small menu. Huge drinks list.  This place is more of a cocktails and appetizers place.  Over priced for sure.   Is hard to find ya server perhaps under staff for that. There is plenty of other help besides servers.

Name: BunnieP
Review: The waitress was afraid to tell us the truth about this place not having a slide when we asked where the slide was. She then got the manager and lied to him about us. Worst feeling ever. She was caught in her lie and the manager did nothing about it. Changed our server and was so rude. I will never attend this place again and I would advise everyone never to go here. This place was just such trash and displeasing.

Name: ElaineM
Review: They didn’t have half the drinks on the menu and it was only 10.

Name: SarahC
Review: awful service and mediocre food, would not return or recommend to others

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I had a wonderful time celebrating my birthday! The pink pancakes with cotton candy was the best!

Name: MaryL
Review: It was so crowded in here. People were right up against our table the whole time. Placing empty/used drinks on our table. Also food was very overpriced for what it was. Overall, a pretty place and our waitress was great but unimpressed.

Name: CristinaL
Review: Disgusting food and you couldn’t access all the rooms

Name: MaryT
Review: We arrived for our 6:30pm reservations on time. They said they were getting tables ready and it would be 20-30min and we could wait in the bar. The bar was loud and we had no desire to sit in the bar so we waited by the hostess stand with another group of ladies. We specifically made the reservations to experience their Christmas themed dining room. After a bit the hostess came up to us and said follow me. She took us into the bar to a table that couldn't have been more than 2ft tall with built in sofas all around the room. It was defiantly not a dining table. We questioned her as to what this was and what were they trying to do. We had made dinner reservations a month in advance because that was when they opened Reservations for the specific day we were traveling. These were not last minute reservations.  She stated that the dining room had been reserved for a Private Party. This was not what we were told when we checked in. We told her that this was not what we made reservations for and left. Couple things...If they in fact rented the room out for a private party they should have called everyone who made a reservation to give them the choice to cancel. It felt like they just sold out for the higher price. We also felt profiled a bit. We are 2 Caucasian women who run businesses. We are not in our 20's or 30's. We were dressed nicely, smart casual is the dress code. We felt like because we didn't fit the look or age group that they want in their establishment we were pushed to the bar. Now I could be totally wrong but that was our perception.

Name: KearaH
Review: We had our table for 1.5 hours (that’s the limit, they let us know) and it took 30 full minutes to get a drink order in , another 10 to wait and order , and then the rest of our time was spent waiting for said food and drink. I was hoping the service would be better after having to reserve this place a month out. We won’t be back.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Overpriced drinks. The drinks taste like flavored water. Food is bland.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The food was horrible!!! The chicken basket was all trash I’m sorry. It’s was breaded with flour but like so think that there was no meat underneath it! The waitress came over and we told her and she even agreed and she took it off the bill. Go for ambiance NOT the food.

Name: EricaS
Review: Great night on the rooftop with some amazing cocktails! We loved to decor so much, I booked a reservation the next morning for brunch to bring a friend !

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Disappointed in the decorations. We went to experience the “over the top” Christmas pink decor - and it just wasn’t. There was one corner decorated but that’s about it.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Rude bouncers at the door, very very noisy could not talk withe the person sitting next go you

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Amazing place had a blast! Will definitely come back

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Beautiful Christmas set up! Loved it! 
Food was good but nothing special. Drinks were awesome and the desserts were beautiful!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Food was amazing (blueberry french toast was a favorite by all and can easily be a shared dessert). Price were so reasonable compared to other restaurants. We thought it was a fun venue with nice winter decorations.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Security rude and abrasive.  Seven of us thrown at cocktail table in lounge with not enough seats or any way to eat comfortably.  Server too involved with other tables.    Hype of decorations & pink theme beyond overrated, they were actually pathetic & shabby.  Food was ok

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Our initial server was trash. She saw us (we are black, but I'm not sure if that was the reason) and came by our table said we're serving brunch and attempted to leave without taking any order when I called her back. This was 15 minutes after we were seated, mind you she's been to her other tables and there's only an hour and a half window to eat and food takes time to be made. The food was subpar at best. The pancakes were really good and fluffy. The fried chicken was not great (please rate it for yourself, God bless in my Keith Lee voice) the carrot cake cupcake was not good and the regular breakfast was ok. Pink lemonade that comes with the Prosecco very tart, that is all, I hope this helps, photo ops are dope!!! Have fun!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Made reservation for how the rooftop bar was advertised and the area we were seated was not as advertised.  Very disappointed a total waste of time and money !!

Name: Luvfood
Review: Three women, we had a great time at the Magic Hour. Super cool atmosphere & fun cocktails! We would have liked to see a few more menu items, but overall loved it!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Waitress was very attentive. We could only stay at our table as it was not advertised that Christmas decorations would be put up today. Would have been great to have been able to take pictures

Name: laurah
Review: Drinks were nice and reasonably priced. Atmosphere was good, not too loud. Slightly disappointed that the room was closed so we couldn't see the view of the empire state building and the christmas decorations were in the process of being set up but we were given a free cupcake for the inconvenience. Still had a lovely time

Name: CarolineW
Review:
Honestly we were so excited to experience brunch here my daughter was having her Birthday on the day sweet 16 and my 50th.

We felt really rushed with the whole experience, once you placed your order and received the food that was it the staff didn’t give a damn.  

We then went to get some insta worthy pictures, the photos on their page must be photoshopped the disappointment of seeing it in real life I am lost for words!

Would I return again ……. Definitely not!

Name: Magic
Review: Great experience, esthetically fascinating with superb service. From: ~Magic~

Name: Rhoda
Review: We booked this a month in advance for our daughter's 16th birthday based on the outside fall decorations, listed on the website as available "through November." We visited the restaurant on November 11 and noticed there was an "adult" theme but the pink fall decorations were abundant, and so the adult theme was not obvious or we would have cancelled that day. Upon arrival on Nov 25, all of the decorations wer removed, and only noticeably was the adult themed characters which were really offensive for a group of teenage girls. The table where girls were sat did not accommodate 10 people. In fact, maybe 6 could have sat at the table comfortably. I requested another table, but the only one available was a very low table in the lounge area which was unacceptable. My daughter cried. We traveled 2 hours by train to have brunch there and were extremely disappointed.  And you can never get your 16th birtday back. :(

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Has an awesome time! Vibes are immaculate, especially with the moving table!

Name: JamieB
Review: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING! So much fun and Great Food! Professional friendly staff!

Name: Nishelle
Review: Terrible service and far too loud. I made this reservation with the understanding that it was a traditional sit down restaurant. Once I realized it’s more of a club atmosphere I let the hostess know and was going to leave but she suggested we try the “other side of the restaurant” which is a “more traditional sit down”. It was so so so loud. We had one server take our order, another run our food, another come fill our waters back up after they’d been empty for 10 minutes. We had to go to the bar where 4 servers were standing doing nothing to pay our bill. Nobody checked on us to see if we wanted more to drink, how our food was, if we wanted our bill, anything. If it is a bar, so be it, that’s fine. My issue is the lack of service after explaining to the hostess we were looking for a more traditional restaurant. All in all it was a very poor experience and I wouldn’t recommend it. We saw three other groups come in to eat and end up leaving after realizing what the vibe was. Maybe a clearer explanation on the website would’ve helped. Or, maybe just better service.

Name: LatashaH
Review: Me and my friend attended this restaurant, the server Maria sweet girl but very poor service. She forgot our utensils did not check on our table, she didn’t understand our questions. The music was sub par and low. The food menu is extremely limited. People seem to come for the ambiance of picture taking but the actual restaurant has nothing great about it which is why it seemed to always be empty, Low quality drinks.

Name: MClaudi
Review: Nice place good food and very Clean space I love it

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great place loved it, it’s a beautiful environment and the food is great

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
First of all, what is the point of a roof top bar if they cover it with another temporary roof? I’ve been here before and the views of the city and Empire State Building are amazing. But this time the entire “roof top” was covered with another roof. I get it’s cold out and people want to be warm but then don’t go to a rooftop bar. Or only put a temporary roof over half of the roof.

Besides that, we had a reservation and got sat very quickly but it took 25-30 minutes for our server to even acknowledge us and ask what we wanted. We ordered 2 drinks and they came out absolutely awful. Tasted like straight rubbing alcohol. We didn’t even finish the drinks. We paid and left. I don’t think I’d go back there again, at least in the fall/ wintertime when they have the “rooftop” bar covered. It’s just a regular bar at that point with awful drinks.

Name: Citygirl
Review: The Food was just ok. They need to revamp there menu.

Name: ChristineK
Review: First off the food was RAW. I ordered the sliders and they were very undercooked, we let the waitress know about it and she didn't even seem interested in dealing with the issue, mind you the 3 sliders were over priced! The environment was nice but everything else was not a good experience I would not recommend this place to anyone.

Name: JaniceL
Review: The experience was absolutely amazing. The ambience was beautiful and the food was great.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: El lugar es perfecto , la comida deliciosa quedé muy complacida con el servicio ♥️

Name: JohariB
Review: Had a great time here and the props for pictures were theeee bestttt!! We had the Pink AF brunch experience and the pink croissant was delicious!

Name: BryanB
Review: Would not go back.  Weak drinks.  Service was fine.

Name: Travis
Review: I wish outside seating was open. For a first date i think it was great just loud which is okay. Despite that it’s a really nice place and it was great night!

Name: FRANKT
Review: Awesome thanks for the birthday 🎂 🥳 celebration

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We had the restaurant to ourselves, the service was amazing and fast!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I made a reservation at this venue for my friends birthday. We were seated in the corner near the exit and forgotten about although there were plenty of seats available in both sections of the rooftop (that were not reserved). It was a horrible experience and ruined my friends birthday.

Name: Keri
Review: So fun! Can’t wait to go back. I am looking forward to it decorated for the holidays.

Name: JacquettaR
Review: Don’t waste your time $77 for 3 drinks and some fries.  Fries was cold.

Name: BridgetL
Review: Great atmosphere for celebrating an event. Noise levels got a bit too loud!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Food was excellent.  Drinks are worth the try, especially the "New york" drink.

Name: Steelerfans
Review: The Rooftop experience was truly memorable.  Loved the big things like the beautiful lit up view of New York and small things like the carousel and pumpkin patch.  The food was delicious and perfectly paired with our drinks.  Thank you for a wonderful experience!

Name: MaritzaA
Review: This place is really cute and drinks are so good, and good costumer service

Name: PardipK
Review: The waitress barely came to the table. We had to walk up to her every time we wanted to order something. she kept talking to other ppl or on her phone barely paying attention. 0/10

Name: SamanthaC
Review: I loved everything about this place perfect place to celebrate my birthday

Name: LumiO
Review: Took my daughter for her 16th bday, I was actually surprised to learn that sat/sun brunch it's open for all ages, so I took the rest of my kids as well. They really enjoyed their time and took a lot of pics, nice setting for pics.

Name: KARRY
Review: Unfortunately service and food was not great and our bill was $500 for finger foods and drinks. For those prices food n service should of been A1 ! This place should just stick to summer time out door happy hour ...

Name: AnaZ
Review: The experience started off odd with the hostess very rudely asking 2 ladies that were patrons of the restaurant already to move from the spots we had reserved, even though there was plenty of room, and likely a better way to have handled the situation. We spent about 2 hours here, casually talking and continually ordering drinks and food. When we asked for the check, we saw one of my friends was overcharged by 2 drinks, and when I asked to review the order log, I saw this was done on purpose - the order we received drinks at didn't match up to when we ordered. I calmly explained this but the waitress did not relent and said she'd bring out a manager, which I welcomed. In the end, no manager came and one drink was removed. We ended up requesting the rest of the food we ordered to go and did not trust to eat it because even asking to have the food packaged up was met with disdain. The place has low reviews on Yelp for a reason - can't put make up on a pig. Shame because we were having a nice time up until we were targeted to get ripped off for no good reason. Avoid this place.

Name: KarynF
Review: Had a small gathering with colleagues.  Super fun environment.  I was there in November.  The summer must be great.  View of the Empire State Building was amazing.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great experience. I was very pleased that the decorations were up because they weren’t last time. This is one spot that I bring visiting family to when it’s decorated. The food menu could be a little larger, it’s starting to feel like one would come here for the drinks only. Don’t come here hungry because you’ll leave that way. I would give this place a 9/10. The service was excellent and the staff was very pleasant. I would’ve given a 10/10 if the menu was larger. I highly recommend to anyone for a great photo opportunity, great drinks and great views.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I always love coming here for fun seasonal drinks and foods. I’ve been here a few other times. Had to come to checkout to fall decor before they changed it. The service is always amazing, everyone is nice and friendly. Great place to go to for fun with the girls or a great date night for drinks!

Name: MichelleT
Review:
This venue is OVERRATED!
the food is terrible and the atmosphere is not worth the hype.
Never Again!

Name: AdanC
Review: Great place to go, I loved the food and the service was great as expected

Name: KatieC
Review: Would not recommend! The drinks aren’t good and neither is the food. We went for brunch and they were playing music that belonged in a night club. Service was slow. Overall probably the worst rooftop I’ve ever been to.

Name: TarynT
Review:
Disappointing.
Took my daughter for her birthday. Staff were not very welcoming- had to check in a small box of chocolates bought as a gift which were in my handbag before being let in which seemed bizarre. Food was ok but all in all wouldn’t return.

Name: MzKiwii
Review: Came in from.Va to celebrate my favorite color and my birthday lol The staff was amazing..the patrons were friendly, we talked to others like we'd known each other for years:) Rain or shine (it was raining) I still went outside and took advantage of the Pink Pumpkin Patch:) They really made a girl feel special 🥰

Name: ZanetaA
Review: Little over priced but hey it’s NYC! Food was good and drinks great. Very instagramable place. We had a rainy day so sadly couldn’t see the pumpkin patch. Good place for a birthday. Croissant isn’t the best but looks good on the pictures. Waiting time was not bad.

Name: DorisN
Review: It’s was my girl 15th birthday. She and her friends love it!

Name: Dees
Review: Very efficient staff. The establishment is clean and décor picture worthy. Also great views

Name: Desi
Review:
Very cute chic bar. Lots of instagram selfie spots through out the bar. Needs better food for the price. Drinks were top tier (get the party pouch)
Lastly , needs better dj

Name: Luisa
Review: Really bad experience fr!🤦🏽‍♀️ Had to go to another restaurant 👍🏽

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I choose this place to celebrate my Birthday and I completely loved!!!

Name: Amanda
Review: Most of the restaurant is honestly pretty ugly, aside from the section where you can take photos. The food is mediocre and overpriced.

Name: CarolusJ
Review:
Bad food. Outdated
No value for money.
Do not waste your time here.

Name: MaykonR
Review: Over pricey and the quality and quantitive of the food is not worth it. Save your money if you value your pockets

Name: JennA
Review: Was seated on the carousel by the hostess, it was right after the restaurant opened so it was nearly empty. The server looked over at us multiple times, and then came over and placed the reserved sign back on our table as we were sitting there. No one acknowledged us. We sat for over 25 minutes as everyone else around us was served and we were not. Finally, the hostess came over and asked if we wanted to sit here, even though she had sat us there 30 minutes prior? And then proceeded to tell us that she is supposed to seat us and let the server know that were here, even though she did in fact seat us and no one came over. We left without ordering as it was clear no one was coming to take our order. Will not return.

Name: sharonsalas
Review: It was perfect! thanks, food, employees, everything!

Name: YvonneG
Review:
Food was limited to certain kinds of food.  I love shrimps but most people would want to order some chicken wings. 
Also the drinks were weak. I was there to celebrate my birthday and drinks tasted like juice. 
But my friends and I enjoyed the vibes and we took lovely pictures next to the pink pumpkins 💖.

Name: DavidG
Review: The crew loved the all photo sections.. food was surprising good. Great time.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Ambience was excellent!!! We took great pictures. Group of 5 dined and didn’t feel rushed to leave. The drinks where really good. We ordered several of rounds!!! The food on the other hand was horrible we were forced to eat it just to balance the alcohol intake!!  I will visit again just for ambience and drinks will eat before coming….

Name: DominiqueP
Review: The food was just okay, but the way it was served piled on top on plate bowls with hot veggies and cold salad was bizarre. There was a fly and other random stuff floating around the air. Not worth the price, much cuter than it actually is.

Name: CatherineC
Review: Great atmosphere we got to sit at the spinning table which was cool. Good drinks. Only thing I mark down for is we had to track down our server a couple of times.

Name: DianaN
Review: It’s a very stylish bar, with excellent vibe; staff is friendly but seems to be overstretched. They did not allow us to split the bill multiple ways which was frustrating. Food is truly average. Drink menu is creative but quite pricey.

Name: Dezhia
Review: Been here before but 1st time on a date for dinner, the tacos and drinks are good. It was a good time very beautiful scenery and a lot of photo shoot moments.

Name: Kate
Review: Totally overprized and overrated! The waitress didn't even pour wine into the glasses. Speaking of glasses, they were plastic! The food was over salted and tasteless! Cheap plastic decorations. Won't recommend!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We got the rotating tables with a stunning view of the empire state building they let us sit there all night the food was pretty good and the drinks were AMAZING! gorgeous floral decor and very nice ambiance

Name: AndreaR
Review: I shouldn’t come to a nice restaurant and drink out of plastic glasses.

Name: Samantha
Review: Beautifully decorated for fall season !! Love the ambiance

Name: DiaT
Review: This place is cute but have a reservation and have to wait almost half an hour for your table to realizing why. They are packed but understaffed, basically like 2,3 waiters working if that much, one bartender, and forever trying to get our order in and then waiting over an hour for the food. Drinks took forever, my friend asked for more coffee, had to ask twice only to get it cold. Food was aight. It was cute for the experience as my friend has never been to the city and is from out of town but will not be returning.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Made us wait for 3 hours, one hour to get in despite having a reservation, 45 minutes to take our order, 1 and a half hours to bring food that was stale and overcooked for a bill of $100.00. Staff was incredibly rude and preoccupied by an event that booked out half the restaurant. They overbooked their regular customers who had reservations. Horrendous experience. Drinks were the only thing that was worth it.

Name: Clarissa
Review: This place was a total vibe & great music too! My friends & I got to have dinner on the carousel so it was even better :) definitely recommend!

Name: TushShae
Review: It's very cute for a girl's night or birthday. Great places to take pictures, I wish there was some music.

Name: Jasmine
Review: Place overrated! We had reservations for 3 didn’t get seated until 35-40 minutes. The waiter then told us we had to wait another 20-30 minutes for our food. Food finally came & there was a long blonde hair in my food. I told the person serving my food. He literally took the hair off my plate, went to the back for 2 minutes and came back with the same plate. This place is overpriced to get hair in your food and the server not to care. Bill came and they tried to have me pay for my hairy burger & fries. The waitress was understanding but the person servicing food had no care in the world

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Was expecting a different experience. Great decorations

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: This was my second time at magic hour rooftop bar and we sat on the right side(not facing the Empire State Building). I didn’t really like the set up and it was easy to be forgotten by staff I felt like but I love this place and our drinks were great!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very nice atmosphere, however drinks were very limited in options which was disappointing and the food was below average

Name: JonathanD
Review: Great roof top with two sides and decorating , arrived early , stayed for a drink after waiting for ever and making the wrongs drinks , staff friendly but confused

Name: EnaP
Review: Love the decoration, food was great, service was very good!

Name: BrittanyW
Review: It's definitely a popular Instagrammable spot, but if you're looking to be able to catch-up and chat -- this is not the place. In general the entire vibe of the staff is just weird. I think that they're used to dealing with underage or a rowdier crowd. I'm not used to be treated like not an adult from a place where I am expected to spend $20 on a cocktail. Overall it' has cute photo ops, but beyond that I would skip it.

Name: CarinaB
Review: Very nice rooftop bar with delicious cocktails and a great view of the skyscrapers and the Empire State Building.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very low quality food and not welcoming installations. This is a very basic place on the roof of a hotel. Drinks, wines and everything his servers in plastic glasses, so you can guess the rest…

Name: BlndieAU
Review: The actual place itself is not really worth the hype.. HOWEVER the bar tenders were AMAZING! They were were attentive and kind. I would return just for them!

Name: Colon
Review: Nice Girls Date ,Cute Girls Day Nice Brunch Spot .

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: very nice ambience, service could’ve been better but the food & drinks were good so I didn’t mind too much. very pricey, good place to celebrate a birthday or special occasion wouldn’t come here casually

Name: BIrizarry
Review: I mean, it's all about the experience, right? Pink pumpkins, lovely decor, and sugary cocktails. Great photo-ops, for sure. Food is sub-par. The service is not the best. We literally sat and waited for 45 mins to place a drink order. There was also some confusion as to our food order. The waitress wasn't so quick to fix the issue (she was at fault) and gave us a bit of an attitude - and for that, we tipped accordingly. It was a nice time otherwise.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Wonderful time. We didnt eat for me to judge the food just yet but ill be back.

Name: DawnG
Review: What a wonderful brunch! The food is yummy & the drinks were delicious. The rooftop space is beautiful & such a great space to take photos.

Name: GenaA
Review: Amazing time at brunch.  Food was delicious and the service was amazing. Fun place to go with a group.

Name: AshleyF
Review: Great spot to have drinks at after dinner.  I would definitely go again.

Name: Kristine
Review: First time there, pretty cool, Photo Booth was disappointing.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Decorated very nice with strong drinks. Food was good and staff friendly.

Name: NnekaQ
Review: Go now!!! A must… Birthday dinner was a blast. The ambience… the food and the scenery for instagram worthy moments.Definitely in love with the “Doctor Death Drink” absolutely 💯.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Pretty location and good view on the Empire State Building.

Name: Kirsten
Review: I thought our waitress was great but the 2 bartenders were slow. Maybe they were overwhelmed with the amount of people and management should've had more people behind the bar. The tacos were gross and there was a lot of guac and barely enough chips. But the views and vibe was great and would recommend this place.

Name: KirstenM
Review: Wanted to sit outside the rooftop part , made the reservations for that but instead that was booked for a party I guess but other then that my waitress was great and she came and checked on us and fixed my drink that I didn’t like. I can’t remember her name but she was great :).

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We love it, and we can't wait to go back. dj was awesome and service was excellent

Name: JenniferC
Review: I was very disappointed. Their service was terrible. We had a week over 45 minutes to get her drink order. The food is overpriced and not worth it.

Name: Anonymous
Review: Took over an hour to serve me a drink nothing complicated just some pink fizz!

Name: FineWine
Review: The food wasn’t anything to rave about neither was the service. Go if you want to see the pretty decor, which is in a little corner to the side of the bar, it was fun but I wouldn’t do it again even when they change the decor

Name: Lisa
Review: Booked a reservation for a Saturday night which I had to set an alert for which really didn’t make sense upon arrival to an empty restaurant. The ambiance is amazing, views are stunning. Food.. not so much. My friend and I ordered the same thing, chicken tenders and truffle fries. The portions were very large which was wasteful and we definitely could have split the appetizers. Drinks were nothing exciting. Definitely worth a visit for ambiance, great photo ops, but more so for drinks and experience.

Name: Sara
Review: Unless you're an influencer, you can expect to be completely ignored and disregarded.  Will never return.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Amazing experience celebrating my girlfriend Juileas 24th birthday! Hands down recommend this place to anyone looking for a unique rooftop experience in nyc! Definitely will be returning in the future!!! Thank you again for making this day so special!

Name: NicoleBF
Review: Good drinks and food. The view is beautiful, you can see the Empire State Building.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Super cute place for pictures and drinks. The food was okay and not super pricey.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very limited menu. Food is okay… service was good. Will return for the dessert.

Name: ShaniceH
Review: The atmosphere was good my only complaint is no one answers the phone.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: This place is only for tourist and old people. Very noisy and the drink was very bad.

Name: Judy
Review: Drinks were not consistently made correctly. Service was slow and unfriendly.

Name: EmmaO
Review: They required my credit card to book a reservation- when we got there hardly anyone was there (literally maybe 3 tables taken) and they seated us the most secluded spot with no view. I also did not enjoy my $20 drink. I was really excited to go here but was super super disappointed.

Name: Soulfood
Review: Great Ambience, Very good Service. Too Loud though !

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Food was very mediocre. I would only recommend this place for a pregame

Name: WinnieT
Review: Need better food options and a new chef, food was horrible but drinks was ok.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Went for a little birthday brunch with my fiancé and it was a nice vibe! Would definitely recommend.

Name: GinaM
Review: My little girl and I had a blast at the pink bunny beach brunch and had the purple potato donuts, Cotton candy and chicken fingers… It was adorable and delicious

Name: KThompson
Review: I like the fact that for Brunch they did not make us wait for everyone in our party before would could be seated. It was a party of 4 and one stuck in traffic. The staff was nice and accommodating. The food was great and so were the drinks.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The tables are too low set to have a relaxing brunch….otherwise supper vibey trendy brunch spot with gorgeous scenery and views

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The service was bad waitress barley checked our table. My friends had to get up and ask for dessert bc the waitress wasn’t checking on us! Over all cute place for pix and catching a quick bite.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Ame el lugar, yo me hospedé el el hotel y subí por unos tragos , el ambiente magnífico, la vista el servicio todo súper ! El idioma no fue un problema, yo los visité de Ciudad de México y lo recomiendo mucho a mis conacionales.

Name: Geeya
Review:
The servers were curt and did not have a friendly demeanor. When I asked one server if he could take a picture of us friends, he simply said "No, I am busy" and walked out. I didn't mind that, but the way the message was delivered was disrespectful. 

I would love to attend there again, but considering the hospitality, I may have to rethink.

Name: StevenL
Review: Definitely a great ambiance and adult vibe. The food and service were great, the decor was perfect match for the pink/Barbie theme. My third time at Magic Hour brunch and never disappointed.

Name: Anonymous
Review: Very fun spot, definitely would go back! Good food and atmosphere was great!

Name: Mors
Review:
We didnt have reservations but were able to grab a drink and make one on the spot via phone.

There were 2 sections, one was more for photo ops while the other was more of a party

Took a bit for the bartender to greet us but I believe it was because he was the only one there at the time and reinforcements were coming

When we were sat at the table to back cushion kept falling down and moving so wasnt too comfy but doable

The food was semi good. My boyfriend got the chicken sandwich with pumpkin pesto. Chicken was dry but he said the pesto helped. I got the barbocoa tacos and there was alot of meat on it and could have been made into 4-5 tacos rather than 2. Price was high but expected of a bar just feel like they should stretch the tacos and make the chicken moist or add fries.

The drinks were good the glasses they came in were unique and my boyfriend liked the pouring the drink over the ice mold cool. My last drink I asked the bartender to make something fruity and it was great hes really good at it!

Only gave 4 star because of the portioning/food and seating but with those fixed this would be a 5 star experience.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It wasn’t as impressive as I would’ve thought it would be. The service was mediocre and there was only a few options for drinks

Name: YouessayTours
Review: ‘The unecessary ‘security’ level was both unwelcoming and unfriendly from the off & we felt a particularly bad vibe from the waitress - starting from the point of saying I’d stick with tap water.  Due to the bad vibes, we cut out brunch short & left.  I’m scouting out venues for tour packages so this venue won’t be on my list.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Menu without much food option, basic place no big deal

Name: DanielA
Review:
Very rude and unpleasant crew at the entrance on the street level. 
This made what could have been a nice experience into a negative one.

Name: RafaelaV
Review: Amazing food, place and staff! Can’t wait to visit.

Name: DomoniqueH
Review: We drove 2hours to experience Terrible service. the food was ok.. maybe the staff just didn’t want to work that day smh

Name: ColleenM
Review:
Ambience was amazing. The side of the rooftop bar we wanted to see was closed. I didn’t understand since it’s only there to look at. 

The bartender treated me like a child and ordered me to pay her bill that she wasn’t allowed to leave from behind the bar. I wasn’t aware I could t sit down and pay it. She made drinks but told me they were watered down because they sat too long. I couldn’t get up to the bar because of the crowd. It took her so very long to make the drinks to begin with. She was incredibly rude. I understand the nature of her job and clientele but I was not behaving any other way than polite. I didn’t deserve to be treated that way.

Name: JuanP
Review:
Went there having a previus reservation made some weeks before .
Came there to find some rude and non friendly people at the door ( place employees ) 
also the people who direct at the elevator . 
They made us feel like crap before even  steping inside the place . 
Such a bad experience and would not recomend this place to anyone !

Name: JazmineO
Review: Service was very slow. My group was already paying the bill and we were still waiting for 3 orders because the kitchen forgot them. I waited 20 mins for a drink to my table. Also, I paid $26 for a mediocre bacon, egg and cheese on a bun. Apart from these negatives the ambiance and photo props were great.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great service! Everyone was very nice and helpful. Food came out in a timely manner. Didn’t order any of the attractions but still enjoyed the experience

Name: ravier
Review: Nice bar and lounge but that was it . Food was trash and service

Name: JamesK
Review: Food was meh.  Drinks ok but overpriced.  Service a little inattentive.

Name: JillD
Review: The view is great. The food is amazing. The drinks are good. The music is great. The service is spotty, but not a real big deal. I would definitely go back!

Name: ZodsterDRC
Review: Completely rude treatment by the staff.  Searched like I was a criminal.  Unable to have our birthday celebration there as a result.

Name: happytravelz
Review: The views and ambiance were great.  It was rather hot, but they did have vents to keep us cool.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The worst place I have ever been to- we ordered the donuts, they came out partially frozen and freezer burnt- disgusting. The server was rude- walked away before we could order. We ended up leaving after paying for the donuts even tho they were inedible. The table next to us abandoned their table as well. The server couldn’t care less

Name: KylaE
Review:
We came when there wasn’t a theme or decorations, so totally different than what we saw online. It was still fine, as the ambience was still good and the staff were great. The drinks were delicious, and everything came out really fast. 

The food: 100% NOT worth it. It’s an abbreviated menu with things that can be shared. The chicken box was over-battered and had a weird taste to it - didn’t eat any of it after one bite. Coconut shrimp were frozen shrimp (not fresh and jumbo) and were basic. Caesar salad was drowning in everything it came with - dressing was tasty, but overkill. Tacos were ok… and guacamole was average. 

I’ll definitely go back, but only for drinks. Will probably eat before or after… I’m a huge fan of trying new places and plates, but want my $$$ to be worth the spend. And sadly, for the food, it was not.

Name: StewC
Review: Fun place for a younger crowd alot of women on birthday celebrations not so good for romantic date night

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The security at the entrance was extremely rude and very unwelcoming. I understand that security guards are supposed to be intimidating but I would expect that kind of behavior for a government official secret service agent and not from a doorman for a brunch venue.

Name: PatT
Review: Had made reservations in advance for a special occasion Sunday brunch and was surprised when we were brought to our table. It was a very low table with a very uncomfortable bench and one very low stool. We had to eat with hunched backs since the table was even lower than our seats. There was such a big hype about this rooftop restaurant/bar and I must say I would never recommend. Service was mediocre but the food was good. Never once did they acknowledge it was for a milestone birthday celebration even though it was indicated when making the reservation. There are so many other restaurant choices so I suggest going elsewhere!

Name: KarlaE
Review: It’s a really pretty place and nice customer service as well as the view

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Nice place and the food was delicious nice experience .

Name: JorgeG
Review: The place was perfect I arrived 45 min before and they have a table for us, the only that I think they have to work more is in the service idk if they were short staff but our server take so long for take our orders.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Loud, over priced fast food. I assume it is an exquisite bar -  but for a brunch, not worth the money

Name: CaraB
Review: We enjoyed this rooftop bar.  The drinks were good the atmosphere was fun and lively.  It was a great photo op for my daughter.   Service was a little slow but not too bad.   You have to get the pink cotton Candy pancakes.  They were delicious especially with the bananas foster! The pancakes literally look like a cake! So plan to share! We also had the sliders and the salmon.  It was so delicious! Glad we found this place

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Was there to celebrate a birthday, when we got there the hosted first placed us in a corner. We didn’t feel comfortable there and waited for 30 minutes for a server. I went to the hosted and asked for a different section and she was able to get us a much better table next to the bunny play ground. At the end we enjoyed ourselves and my friend enjoyed her birthday.

Name: jamies
Review: This place is trash. Run for the hills and do not waste your time

Name: Tanya
Review: Fun times at Magic Hour in NYC! Always a great vibe with fun props for social media postings. The fries and coconut shrimp were delicious!! Great music, lovely service, beautiful views. Don't forget to check out this rooftop lounge in NYC!

Name: JamionS
Review: Your coat check staff is not pleasant nor welcoming. The attitude that was given to notify us that our bags needed to be checked was awful. The elevator attendant did not advise if he was taking us up or if we were going alone and the floor to press. It was not a great first impression

Name: jennmonte
Review: Was greeted with 90 minute table reserve, after 90 minutes would have to be moved to bar, they should note this when reserving, not upon entering, set the tone for the night

Name: CassandraJ
Review: Half of the place was closed off for a private event which means we were unable to take pictures, food and drinks way overpriced, and our server just dropped the check on our table after an hour without asking if we wanted anything else. Would definitely skip this spot next time, not worth the hype.

Name: yvrtoyyc
Review: We went here to use the Bryant Photo Booth specifically but we’re hoping for a better experience given so many negative reviews. We were disappointed for the following reasons: confusing entrance with weirdly high level of security and unfriendly hosts, uncomfortable/cheap seating and tables, PLASTIC cups and shot glasses despite $20 USD for cocktails, service was terrible - had to flag out server down to get her to come over, way too loud despite the after work, middle aged crowd and the Photo Booth that we came for was closed off for a private event despite being assured before we sat down that it was available. The only pro was that it had a nice view of the Empire State Building. Would not return.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Totalmente sobre valorado. El personal de la entrada te hace sentir que vas a entrar al mejor lugar de NY. No querían aceptar nuestra identificación que es la visa con la que entramos a Estados Unidos! Que les parecía “sospechosa”… Finalmente entramos y aunque el lugar es lindo no es la gran cosa. El área de adentro de la barra estaba completamente sucia y llena de papeles tirados…

Name: Gianna
Review: I would not recommend! Reserved this for my birthday at 5pm. I was quickly seated, but no server or any staff came to us until after 20 mins of waiting. Keep in mind there was not a lot of people here at this time. Also, sat us in the sun when eyes are sensitive to light. Open table behind us and they refuse to move us. I ordered the same drink as every other table I saw and they had up to three rounds while i was still waiting for a hour for my one drink. Carousel was not decorated. Staff was not helpful and I would not come back here.

Name: BrandonS
Review: Server takes too long to check on guest , also the busboy took my order and everything was completely wrong … drinks too watered down and sweet … if I’m paying 20.00 for a cocktail I wanna taste liquor not sugar

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I came here for a birthday brunch and overall had a fairly good experience. The host downstairs was polite but wasn’t clear in her direction so I was left standing confused when we got upstairs. The servers were kind but the dinner service was spotty and dismissive (which I completely understand a busy brunch). The food tasted pretty good but its not something I would come back for. Its a beautiful space though and a really fun vibe so I definitely see myself enjoying cocktails here on a night out, but i wouldnt go again for the restaurant.

Name: christineM
Review: First we were seated in the wrong area. Then we waited for our food for over an hour.  Kept asking about our food but was told the kitchen was backed up. People that arrived after us had eaten and left. I had a Caesar salad that was very underwhelming.  Would not go back there again

Name: vish
Review: I ordered a drinks and it had an insect in it. Bartenders first tasted my drink and then gave it to me which was so unhygienic. Poor service.

Name: MissTarsha
Review: We traveled from out of town to go there. The menu was different then the one online. The waitress took forever to serve us and the food we received was overcooked. However, the vibe and atmosphere was amazing!

Name: Emily
Review: Come here for my bday every year! Always an amazing time 💕

Name: TFNY
Review: Super chill with great vibes. Dress was diverse from shorts and sneakers to sequin mini dresses. Tee shirts to button down. Pinot Noir was good. Berry Bubbly was good. Caesar salad with salmon was delicious.  Side of bacon was so good. Lots of picture opportunities. Music was good and not too loud. Overall good time!

Name: WinnieB
Review: I can confirm Magic Hour live up to the hype! I booked it as a second stop for a bachelorette group and no one left disappointed. The ambiance was fun and charming. The food was actually great (brunch menu) with good portion. The service was amazing. The staff are very friendly and accommodating. Very few restaurants can check all across the board but Magic Hour delivered an amazing experience. The Bride had a great time!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Wonderful experience with great food. Would definitely come back again.

Name: FrancescaT
Review: My best experience in New York. Loved everything about this place. Will definitely visit again.

Name: JexR
Review: Staff is super rude and the service is awful. It’s a dump.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Second time for me first time coworkers are they love it, the pink rose martini the best ever

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Amazing and unique love it, took wonderful picture and  enjoy a lot

Name: ChristinaC
Review:
After the server changed the new server never came back to the table to see if we wanted to order anything else.

The mini corn dogs were deceiving since they were in a large dish, but dish was not full because the bottom had lettuce in it. I think more could come in the order or it could be served differently.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great food. Overpriced drinks with little to no alcohol. Very slow service. Not great for large parties

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Lindo lugar, vista increíble, spots muy agradables

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Great place. Good ambiance
I love the place. Will definitely recommend

Name: HOTTIEB
Review: Hello magic, power a rooftop bar and lounge was a great experience. I just feel like it was really hot in there, it was no air whatsoever. I would never go back in the summer. It would have to be a for spring winter thing for me. so it made it uncomfortable. The food was good. The drinks were good but a little pricey but overall I would go back.

Name: Theresa
Review: Experience was GORGEOUS and MAGICAL! Server was beautiful & kind. Thank you for making me feel like a princess on my birthday!!

Name: Jazmin
Review: This is an amazing place to come out and celebrate a special occasion, definitely recommend!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: This whole lounge is def a vibe !!! Great food great music great ambiance ❤️❤️. We celebrated my wife birthday here and she loved every minute of it.. def a 10/10 and will for sure do it again!!!!!

Name: TanE
Review:
I would recommend the place but please understand if you are looking for a big meal, this place isn’t catered to that. I’m only referring to the evening appointments type of outing. 

The drinks are top notch with alcohol quality! However, the food is for a little pick me up before you start drinking. 

The ambience and crowd is very friendly. Loved the drinks.

Name: Brianna
Review: Barely any decorations. Food was not good. Alot of security for some odd reason

Name: NancyG
Review: Hotel guest weren’t directed in a proper way to access the roof top. Had to figure it out. Are you a guest? Simply asking would help not direct those outside when there is a way through the hotel as a guest. Nothing about preferred setting, not a busy time. Or introduction of what to find in the two outdoor options to be seated in. Food was okay. Overall just okay and $$ way over priced for experience. Maybe  better for a daylight roof top experience.

Name: NikitaB
Review: Most definitely recommend coming here . Place is really pretty and music was a 10/10

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Horrible service. I was charged  $600 for a table that wasn’t mine

Name: MaressaR
Review: It was an enjoyable and fun experience. Would absolutely recommend d lMagic Hour Rooftop Bar & Lounge to a friend

Name: LilyJ
Review:
I had a salad and grilled chicken. It was really good 
. Their cupcakes was good as well. The music wayyyyy to loud. Finger foods only. Only recommend this place for pictures and nothing else

Name: ErikaR
Review: We had a really good time! The ambience was good and chill, music was not too loud. The food was very good as well. Will definitely go back.

Name: LindaB
Review: It was ok. Smaller than what I expected.  Drinks were expensive and the food was ok. Instagram definitely made it look a lot bigger than what it was. But the service was great.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Not bad, just wasn’t what I expected. The pictures look better than in-person.

Name: Edelyned
Review: American food nothing special but it was tasty. Ambiance was lovely and lively. The waitress attentive and well mannered. Nice place cool vibe. The need a happy hour menu though.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Service was terrible and the drinks where even worse . Total waste of time money and experience

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Staff members in the front and check in need to work on customer service and being friendlier you walk in and they act as if they hate working there. Food was okay drinks were good

Name: Tasha
Review: This place is good for photo ops, good scenery and something to pop in and do. Eat before you go because the food was not very tasty. Our waiter was good but the other staff wasn’t very welcoming. I don’t like that the hallways and bathroom was dark with little to no air. Cute for the moment but i will never go back

Name: Lushness
Review: Magic Hour’s service was below standard. Food is mediocre. Steaks were over cooked twice & our pre ordered big af croissant was given to the party next to us. There was no attempt to resolve the issue either. It’s for the Gram only!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: THERE WAS NO FAN OR AIR CONDITIONING!!!! I was literally burning up in that place. The drink I had was horrible and the food I had was very mid 😐. I now understand why it’s hard to get reservations here, because the place is so small and there’s like 12 tables max. 1/10. It was just the ambiance that was cute, other than that will not be going again.

Name: Katie
Review:
$20 premixed cocktails served in plastic cups. 
Horrid service; we sat for 20+ mins before being greeted. Finished our first round and waited another 20 mins before the bar back cleared our table and took our water away before we were ready (we had food; did not ask if we were done) would have spent more money, but had to chase someone down just to close us out. 

Overall the atmosphere is cool, but felt lesser than others there - not worth the price or the way we felt during or when leaving.

Name: IanH
Review: If your looking for instagram worthy moments then this is the place. If you looking for anything else including quick bites, good drinks, good service then this is a straight pass. There’s nothing behind the hype!!!

Name: Shanikqua
Review: If you’re going here for the aesthetics, this is a must go spot. The service was a little bad unfortunately no server or waitress came to our table by the time someone noticed that we didn’t have a server the kitchen was closed but needless to say the manager came over and apologized, he gave us complementary shots and dessert for the birthday guest and some tickets for complementary shots for our next visit if we decided to return

Name: Berta
Review: our server didnt check on us like she should have .that was the only problem not checking on customers to dee if they need anything .

Name: LenoreP
Review: Great time!!! Food was great.  Fun atmosphere! Service was really good and the outside photo ops were really great as well!

Name: ROXIE
Review: Food was lackluster at best....did not have much vegan or pescatarian options for my guest, it took forever just to get a ketchup. The host sat us in the hottest area of the Rooftop, why would you do that? It was a maze and way too "exclusive" to even enter this Rooftop just for mediocre food and drink. This place needs to just be a venue where you take selfies

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I had a great time at the magic, our rooftop restaurant I think it was a great experience. I got to ride on a carousel and every time it turned around I feel like a star like look at me look at me it was wonderful. The service was nice. The atmosphere was nicer and you got to take pictures. Oh my God I really enjoy myself. ￼￼

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Food was not good, no flavor, they gave me a dirty plate and still charged me for the dish lol .

Name: ElisabethL
Review: Excellent place staff very professional and fast service my table was ready when we arrived,   food and drinks were very delicious 💯 recommended.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Save yourself the disappointment.
Very weird crowd, boardline uncomfortable, half empty. Drinks were terrible, tasted like out of a pre mixed box. Immediately paid and left.

Name: KeithR
Review: Nice place, food was ok, and the drinks were fantastic.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The food was blah, the drinks were amazing the view and the decor was to die for, but unfortunately I will not be back

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Not what I was expecting! Place seemed a lot bigger in photos and servers was not friendly or attentive

Name: Simsimster
Review: More food options would be nice. Magic hour roof top

Name: Gigi42
Review: I went with my 2 friends, we ordered steak tacos, fries and a drink that comes I a glass shaped like a lady. I'm not sure of the name because Melanie the waitress referred it. Both tacos and drink were good. Ambiance was beautiful, nice and cozy spot. It isn't a big spot at all.

Name: SheilaP
Review: While the place presents well, the service wasn't at its best. The lady at the front entrance was not helpful in accommodating us and she sat us under the sun and it was soo hot outside to where it did not seem humanly possible to be comfortable. We were forgotten by our waitress even though they clearly specified brunch time was 1 1/2 hours. The brunch menu is very limited and bland.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The food wasn’t the best the ambience was nice honestly

Name: LilianaG
Review: Loved this place, me and my friends had a good time at brunch!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Una grata experiencia aunque mucho control en el acceso.

Name: Edra
Review: It is very aesthetically pleasing. I wish the seating was more comfortable and they had more food options. The menu has a very small portion of small plates and majority is alcoholic beverages

Name: NikkiJ
Review:
Everything was nice, the drinks were good!
I would definitely recommend the experience and it's a great photo opportunity.

Name: Yana
Review: The food wasn’t good , the pictures on the internet of the photo opps were hard to find and the staff was very busy . It seemed chaotic

Name: JOSER
