Review: some employees are not able to deal with public! especially those at the door and in the elevator. they are rough.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Cool atmosphere for a fun casual night out. Would definitely recommend.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Staff was very helpful and attentive. From the security to the waiters and waitresses

Name: Sami
Review: Great birthday spot! Great menu and all around atmosphere!

Name: DestineeG
Review: Nice ambiance. Need more food and dessert options for dinner.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Initially I didn’t like that we were told we only have 1.5 hours. However they took us early, constantly checked on us, the food and drinks came out in timely manner, the bottle service was excellent, plenty of Instagram and TikTok opportunities here if your an influencer it’s the place to be. I took so many pics and videos people were asking me to take them for them!!

Name: LornaS
Review: It’s just from the beginning it was very rude and disrespectful it was ok a very pretty place just need employees that customers service related

Name: DanaF
Review:
ELEVEATOR: Elevator attendant was very pleasant!

SERVICE: Waitress was not pleasant, She forgot our to-go containers and had an attitude when reminded. She also didn't return the credit card used to start our drink orders. When reminded to return the card, she rolled her eyes. She sent s different waitress to our table with the WRONG CREDIT CARD, that didn't belong to anyone at our table of 8!! Instead of coming over to apologize for her error, she fumbled in the distance and sent the other waitress to our table, thankfully with the correct card. 

FOOD: Coconut shrimp had no coconut in the batter nor in the flavor--very bland.

DRINKS: good

Name: KPCT
Review: It was our first time visiting and to our disappointment the service was so poor. The security guard and host that greats you outside the building were not pleasant.  Made us feel like we bothered them somehow. Our server wasn't great, and the food was just okay. As in, the presentation of the food was more inticing than how it actually tasted. The only upside was the ambiance. Definitely would not go again but at least we got great photos.

Name: CharlesM
Review:
We made a reservation, but was unable to find a table to sit at.  Ordered drinks at the bar, wasn’t sure if there was any alcohol in them , very weak.    
Views are great 
Bar was sticky and and dirty very uncomfortable.  
Went to another bar for more drinks afterwards, wanted drinks that actually had liquor in them.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The food is not that fresh and tasty otherwise everything is awesome

Name: Princess
Review:
The food was good 
The drinks were amazing and our waitress  was nice. Great  view and picture  opportunities.

Name: Leahboo99
Review: Horrible experience. Service was terrible. Food was mediocre. Atmosphere and decor was cheap. I was excited to go after seeing the TikTok reviews but once there was very underwhelmed.

Name: SAINT
Review: Nice View of the city but over all average dinning experience and a but over priced..

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was great.  Love the decor.  The food was great too.

Name: AmandaA
Review: It was a great cut a group of 9 girls and drinks/ food was good. Very hot day but was sat where it was cool

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We celebrated my bachelorette here. The server was rude, inattentive, cared more about her style and phone instead of her guests.  Came over to tell us the night menu had begun but it was not yet 10p and we could no longer order food but it was 9:15?! Came over to the table to drop off the drinks and let us order once I spoke up about the time. Had to be combative over food at a restaurant. Make it make sense. I would understand if they closed early but no that wasn’t the case. Mind you made this reservation a month in advance and added a note on it being s special night. She Dropped the food off  and never returned. Had our orders wrong, and then charged us for food that was never delivered to our table. We had to grab our check from another server. The music was low, and overall expensive for no reason. Would not recommend.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Good vibes, picturesque, great atmosphere. Must come back again

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Love our time celebrating my birthday and having a fun Barbie themed party!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was a Barbie world that night so we were insignificant. Bartenders were not tending to us, instead were focused on Barbie girls.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Unique setting. Food was good. Drinks were good.
Glasses looked dirty but it was because they were plastic.
Memorable for sure

Name: Guest
Review: The wait staff was pretty nonexistent.  If I wanted to order another item from the menu, I had to wait until my waitress walked by. Then I had to yell to get her attention so that I could place my order. She never took the initiative to come to our table to ask if we needed anything. I won't be visiting this place again.

Name: DomoneaJ
Review: Love it go now the food is pricey but I didn’t complain if you don’t care about the cash it was the environment for me

Name: NadiaB
Review: Fun atmosphere. Generally good food and service. The giant croissant was HUGE and really good (I took the rest home and shared). The photo opts were really fun.

Name: Aries
Review: Staff were rude minus my waitress she was great. Food was not good. We got the pancakes and midtown breakfast I believe it was called. Extremely hot during the day. Although it’s a rooftop I expected more ventilation. Overall I give it 2 stars because the drinks were pretty good.

Name: LauraW
Review: The pink set up was awesome and the city views are cool. Empire state building in the background! Even though we enjoyed the items we ordered, the brunch menu was super limited.  Really was hoping for more options.  Super cool vibe though!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The drinks and atmosphere are phenomenal! A lovely way to spend brunch or grab drinks with your girlfriends!

Name: JenniferR
Review: Food and drinks wasn’t the best. No air or Ac, it was to hot !

Name: RachelS
Review: I enjoyed my overall experience at Magic Hour on 7/22/23.  So many including myself and my group came out for the Barbie and birthday celebrations.  The other guests truly make this place magical as everyone is happy and having fun.  I reserved a small group for brunch and a later 10 person reservation for dinner however we had more to arrive which was not a problem since we were busy taking pics and mingling. They were not super busy or packed but just a steady flow so it allowed everyone to comfortably take pics, etc. The main security guard and day staff were problematic and took away from the experience but they made up for it later in the evening.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We came for all things pink this weekend. I brought my sister and my 6 year old niece for brunch. We had the pink stack  pancakes, chicken fingers, the crispy chicken sandwich, and the midtown breakfast. Everything was delicious. We had some cocktails too but I don’t remember the names. Our server was attentive and great as well. We took tons of pictures and left very satisfied.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Would go back! Food was okay, we just ordered fries, and drinks are expensive but that was expected.

Name: Diner
Review: Super cute and fun vibe!  The drinks were so yummy!!

Name: SierraS
Review: The ambiance and view of the Empire State Building is lovely. However, the staff were brut and unfriendly. They do not make you feel welcomed and come off a bit aggressive. In particular, the staff at the rope outside as soon as you enter the building, coat check was nice, elevator staff were also unfriendly.

Name: KiaF
Review: The space was not as advertised at all and there was a lot of mosquitoes. Thru closed off certain areas so that stoped people from taking pictures. Definitely going to make a TicTok review about my experience

Name: VielkysT
Review: El lado más bonito lo tenía rentado y no lo decía en la app , el personal te trata como que no tienes el dinero para pagar , realmente es la segunda vez que voy y es el mismo trato

Name: Renee
Review: Not great for after work drinks. They make you check your bag and can’t pay for drinks individually so not ideal for large groups.

Name: Zeppy
Review: So trendy!  Everything was absolutely a photo op.  Drinks were great and so was the food!  They only have small plates there which I did not realize but we got a few and they were very good.  Was quite pricey but I am from out of town and this seems to be in range with Manhattan prices.

Name: ArtinaS
Review: The chicken box was amazing. A lot of food for the value on all the sharable items.  The drinks were just ok.

Name: Nashonda
Review: Unfortunately we went on a rainy day so I don’t think we got the enjoy the full experience Magic Hour had to offer but the environment was lively, the DJ played a great set and the food was delicious.

Name: LucyV
Review: Went here for the first time with a group of 13 girls. Brunch was delicious. We made a hiccup with our reservation but the manager Olga was so helpful and accomodated our seating. Our waitress Ashley was superb and so helpful. Definitely recommend ! Ill add that the restaurant is pretty much automated when it comes to reservations and inquiries. I recommend you email them with sufficient time to address your requests.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We went on a rainy day but it was covered. So we were able to enjoy our meal. The atmosphere is very fun and vibrant. We loved the Instagram-able area too for pics! When we come back to New York, most definitely have to visit again.

Name: notkiddingaround
Review: I booked a table for a birthday celebration. Our table was waiting for us when we got there. A part of the space (the mini golf area) was closed for a private event, so can't judge on that end. The service was good and the snacks we had were tasty (guac & mini corndogs). We went with the bucket of canned margaritas for ease. I'd go there again for a proper happy hour so I can better judge the rest of place and the housemade cocktails. What was a bonus, it started to sprinkle and they closed the roof so we wouldn't get wet.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Had a 2:15 brunch/lu ch reservation, was excited for the vibe & the Big AF Croissant.  Unfortunately, the fun side of the place with all the pink decor & carousel was closed for a party.  The side we were on was meh. The Croissant was fabulous though.  If I had known the rooftop was split in two and likely to be half closed, I likely would have brunched elsewhere.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Was not informed prior to being seated that most of the bar including pop-up area and whole indoor area would be closed off for a private event. Only one small area open after going through the trouble of getting a reservation and traveling from out of state. Service was not good and food was just ok. Very overpriced and dissappointing experience.

Name: Jenniferxxoxoxoxzoxoxoxox
Review:
10/10 experience and food
waitress, staff and everyone was welcoming

Name: EdmundM
Review: Had a great time here - nice view of the city and Empire State Building. Be mindful of the dress code - no sandals/flip flops.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The waitress took forever, the drinks were not good. Overall it is a nice place to take pictures in general but don’t go with the mind set of enjoy the drinks or food.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I  be loved it. Nice scenery , great drink, food is good. It was an absolute vibe

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: El lugar es muy lindo , agradable y acogedor , volvería por el ambiente pero no por la comida , en lo personal la comida no me gusto. Los cócteles si… son fascinantes !

Name: Leesha
Review: Bomb drinks, DELICIOUS TACOS . I loved everything about both my visits to this place 🥹

Name: Ryan49
Review: Service and food were good. Disappointing that we could not see all of the Barbie decorations because of a private event. They should give notice prior to arriving that half of the restaurant will be closed

Name: AlisonD
Review: Fun drinks and food. Spectacular view. It was loud, so if that’s not your vibe, you won’t love this place. But if you go in knowing that and expecting an energetic atmosphere you’ll have a great time!

Name: Lynn
Review: Getting in was jumping through hoops. Complicated, the hosts were snippy. Mandatory bag check which is inconvenient for anyone who might need lipstick, pen, whatever. They couldn’t find our reservation when we finally made it to the rooftop. That took 5 minutes of blank stares. The rooftop was super hot. Food mediocre. Noisy.

Name: SusieP
Review: Take a pass... fake drinks... fried food... dirty tables... so very disappointed and doesn't look at all like photos on website ..

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I love the vibes of this place ! I love the decor and the food and drinks are incredible !! The past 2 times I’ve gone tho, only one side was open. The other side was closed both times, which is a bummer that I can’t get the full experience but it is what it is. I made the most of it regardless and still had fun, but I just wish both sides were fully open !!

Name: EdnaD
Review: Great atmosphere,food is well made….I personally loved their coconut shrimp and fried chicken

Name: ChristieR
Review:
Been here a few times and never had a bad experience. Service is usually a little slow and it was this time as well however everytime I went it was also very busy.

Delicious drinks and basic bar food. Only wish they had a little more food menu items.

Bonus points for great photo ops

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very beautiful and serene, the music is not too loud, the food is good and the service is amazing. My other friends definitely wanna come again with me.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The security guards were rude AF this was for a bachelorette party and they wouldn’t let mg friend bring her 35mm camera. I rep unfounded who go go other tao properties and they have mink tripods with them so what was the issue?!  The first waitress was great the second one was not attentive.

Name: ElizanetR
Review: The food is delicious and the place is nice. Only feedback I have is the desserts were not that good and the cupcake was disgusting not worth what we paid. But overall is a nice place to celebrate a special occasion just dont get the cupcake.

Name: RodrickZoraya
Review: Obviously, the views on top of Magic Hour Rooftop was awesome. My specific server was very attentive. The food was good. My wife enjoyed the Barbie themed area. Look forward to making a return visit in the near future.

Name: NidiaS
Review: I just loves it food was delicious and the music was not too loud which I loved

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was my first time being and it was my birthday and I was pleased with the overall result so being said I will returning back

Name: Antonia
Review:
The experience at this restaurant was decent, but it left room for improvement. The service was average—not bad, but not particularly memorable either. While the staff was polite, there were delays in taking orders and bringing out the food, which impacted the overall flow of the meal.

The ambiance was comfortable, and the menu offered a good variety of options. The food itself was enjoyable, with some standout dishes, but it didn’t quite make up for the lack of attentiveness in service.

Overall, it’s a solid option for a casual meal, but if you’re looking for top-notch service, this might not be the place. There’s potential for improvement, and I hope to see it shine on a future visit.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Experience and drinks were great.Food selection could have been better.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: O lugar é incrível, bebida e comida boa, atendimento impecável e música animada. Amamos e queremos muito voltar

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We had a great experience, if it’s your bday please make sure to ask for a bday surprise, I never received mines.

Name: AlbaE
Review: The service was poor. Our waitress left and never came back to check up on us. Neither did any of her other coworkers. The food was okay but not for the price. Other than that, the overall vibe was okay. Beautiful place to go hangout and chat with some friends.

Name: WendyN
Review: Brillant venue. Great for all age. Would different go back when in New York

Name: Shep
Review: I had fun and enjoyed myself had fun had fun hadun had fun had fun had fun

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: My experience at ‘’MagicHour’’ was wonderful. My friends and I had an awesome time. Thank you. 💖🥂

Name: JamieD
Review: Everything was perfect!  The food was great and so was the venue. Definitely coming back!

Name: AwiC
Review: Everything was nice. Servers and hostesses were pleasant. The only bad thing is the tables. They are really low and it makes it uncomfortable to eat your food.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Was a good experience and good fun but the cocktails were clearly not freshly made which for the prices was a big let down.

Service and food was good.

Name: LauraC
Review: We had reservations and were the first to be seated for brunch yet were seated at the only table right in the hot sun. Everyone else was seated in the shade and there were plenty of empty tables in the shade. The photo spots were nice and the food was good, but the hostess putting us at literally the worst table in the entire place ruined the entire experience. We also never saw our waitress again after we placed our order. I also wish there was a smaller pancake option. My daughter and I enjoyed the pink pancakes but felt bad about how much was wasted. I can't imagine the majority of people that order it can eat even half of it unless you have a group of 4-6. Overall fun experience and good food, but the service was lacking.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Besides the backdrops for pictures everything was bad. Our waitress was the worse, food was not good and over priced. Don't buy the pink pancakes not worth the $60!

Name: 000000lx3
Review:
This place has a dope presence Ali no with a amazing view , we only got a few apps but your mostly there for the environment which is super alive and awake. They even take reservations past 11 which is crazy to me ! But very helpful.
Definitely would come back here

Name: Juanosr74
Review: Magical!..awesome spot. Fully recommended to go with friends.

Name: CarlaF
Review: It was great! I recommended it. You will enjoy it!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was good o can see my self comming back to it again

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The roof was lovely, great for photo ops. Drinks are overpriced and the food is underwhelming.

Name: KhadyS
Review: Perfect  I like it good day perfect spot for instagram

Name: LoganD
Review: Not worth the trip. The staff is terrible. Took 20minutes to have our initial drink order taken once seated. And they didn’t return back after. Would not recommend.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was just okay. Drinks and food was more for the instagram-ability that taste.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Weak drinks that are very overpriced. Service was good.

Name: MathewW
Review: We're staying in the Moxy so thought we'd give their rooftop bar a try. Big regret. It felt rude from the off, talk about ideas above their station, doorstaff were particularly agitated even at 6pm, this isn't some exclusive bar you are protecting at all costs. Bags have to go in a cloakroom, full metal detection before entry. This was night 1 of a 9 nine night stay at the Moxy and am now looking forward to giving the rooftop bar ZERO custom for the remainder of our stay. The hotel itself is awesome but this bar, not so much. I went to the restroom, as soon as I did my other half was told off by a security guard who appeared from nowhere, for taking photos of the cocktails - the irony is, her Canon DLSR camera is rubbish compared to the wannabe influencers taking photos on their iPhones. We were made to feel unwelcome and clearly not the right clientele despite paying £130 a night in the adjoining - awesome - hotel. Sort it out. Comping our burgers helped, granted, but even with that, we don't want to spend any more in this venue again.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great service! Great food! Great music! Great vibes! 10/10 must try again!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Service was disappointing . Also the rooftop is covered so it was definitely a different experience than what the pictures made me think

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I had a great time. Love the photo props. Drinks could’ve been stronger, barely any alcohol.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The food was average , the drinks were delicious . Looks better on Instagram . Don't really recommend it . The servers were great , hostess as well . As for the food I wouldn't go back . Maybe drinks.

Name: Dhaynes
Review: Food was amazing! Great drinks! Decor is nice....needs to be kept up on with so many people taking pics. Understandable, but....PLEASE STOP allowing the public to make a reservation only to come up and take pics and leave without ordering food! We witnessed this with 3 different sets of people and it was only our first visit. They are taking up a reservation of a paying customer and not respecting the decor.  It's a free photo shoot. Those of us paying have to compete for time, on a 90 minute slot: to eat, socialize and take pics...yet we had to wait for people who took pics and never ordered anything and left. Plus those people using it were taking flowers. Not fair to paying customers who were not taking advantage.   We paid a lot to go here. Don't let people take advantage... its restaurant first and foremost.

Name: TarisR
Review: Great food, great venue, and great photo opportunities. Pretty pricey. Worth the experience though.

Name: KaylynB
Review: On July 2, 2023 my friend and I came here for the first time. All of the employees were friendly, attentive and efficient. We had a reservation booked and had no problems at all. The food and drinks were delicious. The presentation of the food and drinks were really nice. We ordered the cinnamon roll, grilled frites (skirt steak, french fries and vegetables), Caesar grilled chicken salad, Malibu beach bunny, Moira rose and a mojito. The host and waitress gave us ample amount of time at our table and even let us go over which we thought was so nice & considerate. The bill was reasonable and we generously tipped. The service is top tier. After eating and “getting nice” we moved on to take pictures. The set up was really nice and we didn’t have to wait long at all for our turn. We ordered more cinnamon rolls and drinks at the bar. We tried the diplomat and the berry bubbly. Those were strongggg! None of the drinks were watered down and that was a major plus. The bartenders were such a vibe! Additionally, the bathrooms were really clean and there was never a line to use it. The music selection was fire! The restaurant was lively and clean. The only downfalls  was that the tables are close together where others can be in your conversation and not much of a variety of dessert for brunch. Overall, the experience was amazing and I give it 5 stars out of 5! Thank you so much for making it memorable even though it was very humid and rainy. I wouldn’t shut up about it to my husband lol

Name: Cash
Review: It was nice   Tht rooftop can get hot, service was nice

Name: BRUCES
Review:
Music too loud for 530 
$18 for 1/2 glass of wine 
Guacamole and chips very fresh and good

Name: ANDY
Review: Great place for pics. Drinks were alright. Other than that food wasn’t all that great and overpriced.

Name: karenm
Review: Place was awesome! Great food, atmosphere, staff was friendly and helpful.

Name: Bpam
Review: We didn’t eat anything but loved the vibe and the drinks!!

Name: LeslieH
Review: Fun atmosphere and great view. The mini corndogs were very tasty and so was the cocktail I had (but I can’t remember the name).

Name: DiamondM
Review:
I loved this place !!!!!! It was fun and great for photo optics ! Staff was cool and the crowd was fun and friendly 
I went for my birthday

Name: RandallS
Review: Saw this place on a list of the best rooftop bars in NYC. I can name 3 better ones right off the top of my head. This place feels like a tourist trap. Drinks were extremely watered-down. (I ordered whiskey and it clearly had been watered down.) Drinks were served in plastic cups. Service was disinterested and we were reminded at least twice that we only had the table for 90 minutes. That was not a problem. We were gone within 20 minutes. The bar within the Moxy hotel has the same menu and was much better. Avoid this place.

Name: BrentL
Review: Drink & Food Selection is limited, definitely not up to the level they portray in marketing the venue.  If you are looking for classy & sophisticated, this is not the place.

Name: MariaR
Review: super spectacular I would highly recommend it thank you thank you

Name: LeidyG
Review: So pretty and instagrameable, our sever was so sweet but I cannot remember her name to give compliments! Also, we were sat in a regular table, we ask for the carrousel and the hostees moved us, so sweet! was an amaizing brunch! just careful is with the drinks, they are amaizing but get you drunk lol.

Name: Foodgloriousfood
Review:
We chose this venue to celebrate as a couple on our 35th wedding anniversary with a brunch. The menu allows you to select as little or as much as you want and to share many of the dishes. However we could’ve done with some guidance on the size of the portions as the special pancake stack was way too much for us two!
The food was imaginative and delicious but I felt the service could’ve been more attentive when compared to other restaurants.
It was a great location with an amazing view - particularly on a fine weather day and the roof screens are open. The music being played hit the right note!
Overall very good value as you can choose your meal options, just needs more input from the staff.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Fun!! Great photo opportunities. Temperature was warm. The pink drink is really strong but the glass is fun.

Name: kimd
Review: Didnt have the best of experiences. We were sat by the register and the waitress took our order. We got our drinks and then never saw our waitress again. She must have left for the night and forgot to put our food order in because after 45 min of waiting we had to flag someone and ordered with them. The food and drinks were not worth the price tag. Even sitting by the register no one checked on us or mentioned our if our waitress left. Will not be returning.

Name: KFrancis
Review:
Such a cute and vibrant place, with trendy backdrops and tons of photo ops! 
Found it through an IG post so decided to go for my best friend's birthday while visiting NYC and we would definitely go back.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Visited for the first time for a ladies evening out on 6/24/23.  We had a wonderful time. We enjoyed the ambiance, food, cocktails, and service.  Our hostess Melanie was Amazing!!

Name: NatalieK
Review: Fun night! Perfect way to temper the post- play mood .. cute spot with yummy late night apps and creative cocktails. Date night destination definitely.

Name: Eric
Review: This is a very interesting and cool place. I strongly recommend getting a reservation. I will say you need to be extremely specific when ordering a drink. I ordered just plain whiskey in a glass and it took them 3 rounds to get it right. Also, worth noting that whiskey neat costs $3 more than on the rocks. There are also a lot of influencers taking pictures, like about half the people there. It was cool to go once but I probably won't return.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The bar has a very fun atmosphere with a beautiful decor. The view is amazing and the drinks are very good as well. The food is ok, but they could have more appetizers options.

Name: CaletteJ
Review: I love the ambiance, great place to socialize with friends

Name: MikeB
Review: Great food, drink choices and service. The rooftop concept was a lot of fun.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We didn’t  eat. We went for drinks and the ambiance! It’s a great place! Loved it!

Name: Jessicadiaz
Review: the waitress gave us the worst service i cant remember her name but she was black haired and thick looking the food was bad!! don’t come back never !!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Horrible horrible terrible horrible terrible horrible terrible horrible

Name: Hans
Review: Pretentious plastic fantastic, way way too noisy. Horrible staff. Bar staff were miserable as sin. Don’t recommend it if you want a conversation.

Name: GinaG
Review: Such a fun setup I definitely recommend stopping by. I really enjoyed taking photos with the Pink Bunny beach decor.  Food was decent I did enjoy the corn dog minis. Tip* make sure when you make your reservation you request seating on the Carousel side.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I brought my daughter here for Brunch to celebrate her 18th birthday. Very nice place, the ambiance was perfect. Not much noise. The food was great, and the service on point. We had a very pleasant experience.

Name: KellyG
Review: Great first experience, will definitely go back next time we are in NYC.

Name: AshleyB
Review: The ambiance was beautiful but the customer service was horrible

Name: mvd10
Review: I reserved a table for a bachelorette party, and we were lucky enough to be seated directly next to the massive stairs covered in flowers (perfect for photos). It was incredible, the view of the Empire State Building was incredible, and our waitress was so sweet. The music could have used some more reggaeton and dembow, but otherwise it was an excellent experience.

Name: Bunny
Review: Food terrible.  Ambience was nice with a great view of the Empire State Building but that’s it.  Not worth it

Name: AngieR
Review: The atmosphere of the place is beautiful elegant, I did not like that we wanted to go where the summer decoration is, they did not let us in because there was an event, there was a moment when the place arrived, that the service was lousy until they took us out of the table

Name: Luvagreatphotoandview
Review: I didn't have anything to eat, I did have drinks and the ambiance was great!

Name: Clab
Review: Good and nice rooftop and amazing french fries.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I went for my birthday they accommodated me really well we were running behind. The girls at the bar were great and such a beautiful place they did  amazing jobs  food and pictures.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The food was terrible, the service sucks, the price is overrated, and expensive. I wouldn’t never recommend anyone to Thai place

Name: PauloM
Review:
Tourist trap. Instagram posts are very different from what that rooftop can deliver to customers. I told the hostess that I would like to pay in cash and so she asked to hold my credit card just for internal procedures and ok, I gave her my credit card. When I asked for the bill, she just asked about the tips porcentage and give back my credit card. So, I asked the total value of bill and she told it was already paid by the credit card... Unbeliveable...
Also, we did not like any of the 6 drinks we asked for. Some with "plastic taste", I don't know how to explain exactly but defenitely we did not like it.
Oh, last but not least, when we arrive at Magic Rooftop's entrance, we show our reservation code which was printed in a A4 paper, the security guy starts to make fool of us, thinking that we would not understand it, but, unfortunately for him, we understood his jokes...

Magic Rooftop is Tao's Group. Tao Downtown is an amazing place/restaurant and we very recommend it. But Magic Rooftop sucks!

Name: IvanN
Review: It was a awesome night. The personal was even better.

Name: JessicaC
Review: Is an amazing place! I really love it everything, I did my birthday party here and all my friend love it

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very pretty place. Food and drinks are ok. Great place for a nice vibe with great views.

Name: JeniferS
Review: Loved my experience! Will definitely be back for brunch as long as I can eat on the carousel.

Name: ElizabethX
Review: Place is adorable, food and drinks are great.  The music and decor were a great vibe.  Will definitely be back.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Not much dancing .. drinks and view of Empire State Building was only USP.

Name: LisaH
Review: Staff were rude. Do not recommend anyone visiting this establishment.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Went here on a Friday evening and we were expecting a lot of young crowd but we found older crowd.. a little laid back vibe! It felt more like a restaurant!! It’s family friendly and has some good cocktails! Moira Rose was our favorite! Some of the popular pink stuff like the donuts and ice cream weren’t that great! Appetizers were really good though

Name: GiannaP
Review: Really fun cute photo ops everyone was very nice and the food was pretty average bar food !!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Fun drinks, limited but delicious menu
Amazing view of Empire State Building
Perfect for your instagram posts

Name: MRVONTEESE
Review: Venue is beautiful when it comes to the ambiance. Food was pricey but not really worth the price. I can tell it's high because the spot is on 34th St.  Cocktail where cute but not that strong. Fab place to get a few cute pics in.

Name: ReRe
Review: I love a good rooftop. Magic hour definitely did not disappoint great ambience and the food was fairly good as well.

Name: JimmyJ
Review: Food was good service was very good  a little disappointing The website claim that was golf but there was no golf They need to update the website a little more so I know exactly what's happening. It was very good we will come back again

Name: JessicaS
Review: We had the best day!!! Great service and atmosphere!!

Name: Underwhelmed
Review: The pancakes were flat and flavorless on their own - cotton candy was the best part. Their value per dollar was way off and these should cost half. The drinks were good but not as spectacular as I was hoping. I suppose I need to come in the evening and order some of the more adventurous offerings. The decor was a straight zero. They must be in transition because 99% of the blooms were gone with the exception of one tiny corner and the bunny/barbie photo area in the rear. It is only fair to put an alert when making a reservation that the restaurant is in transition and not necessarily reflective of online photos. It was a major disappointment overall I'm sorry to say. Our waitress may have had too many tables because it was hard to find her on quite a few occasions but she was nice and helpful when we could actually snag her.

Name: Pancho
Review: Frankly the decor was very run down. The table was small and difficult to eat from.

Name: CassidyZ
Review: The food, drinks, and decor were great. Def would recommend to anyone going to NYC.

Name: JasmineN
Review: It was extremely cold the day we went you would think they would offer heat lamps or at least close the dome back. No instead I was told by star to better prepare next time(tf?) even with my whole party wearing out wear

Name: Eillie
Review: The food was subpar, its definitely all bar food but I think it could be better for the prices.  We ordered the fried shrimp which were good but the sliders were ok.  I just think for such a poplar place the food should be as good as the view. Definitely good to go there for the view and music.. not so much the food.

Name: AngelicaB
Review: Perfect for friends an excellent view, but I had issue with credit card and they does’nt communicate with me.

Name: andersonp
Review: Great experience, with good food and amazing ambiance

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Celebrated my 25th!! Had the best time ever! Drinks were amazing! 10/10

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Birthday
Great views
Great environment
Great music

Name: JacquesK
Review: When we went it did not feel like a rooftop place.

Name: JuliaP
Review: Pretty cool spot , smaller than it looks online. Menu is pretty limited but gave enough options to choose from overall I would say good place for a night cap.

Name: JaiminJ
Review: The cocktails were not good upto the mark. We ordered 4 of them and they were disappointing.

Name: Natha9405316757899999888
Review: So nice, comfy, nice staff too and decorations!!!!

Name: CyrilN
Review:
View not so good
Good quite bad
Super expensive for the experience…

Name: LeeM
Review: I’ve died in many places never had a worst experience. I will never go back. I am careful to leave details because of the poor experience I may look into taking it to a higher level.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Aesthetic is cute but the food was pretty low quality and drinks come in plastic cups.

Name: cyucci
Review: Good food, great drinks and vibes. We will be back!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: This is the most lackluster rooftop bar I’ve ever been to in NY. It looks nothing like what you see in pictures. The drinks are just ok to be that overpriced and the ambiance was lacking. And the “mini golf course” if you can even call it that was literally full of nothingness. The cups that the cocktails come in are plastic and one side of the bar is covered up so if you wanted to take pictures, they would include half skyline and half plexiglass. Don’t waste your time or money — so disappointing.

Name: JessicaC
Review: The place was nice and full but not crowded our waitress was attentive a d the food was warm not hot but flavorful, the drinks packed a punch and the music was not too loud overall we enjoyed every minute at this place ...we had 2 hours to enjoy everything and had a great time.

Name: JosephB
Review: The drinks were good and strong. Food is decent size and flavorful.

Name: ThorPB
Review: Fine food and the drinks are nothing to write home about.. expensive and not worth it. Terrible service. We were rushed out of there after half an hour (we had the table for 1 and a half)

Name: Joyfulkm
Review: Perfect place to go and celebrate Birthday or just to enjoy a good night.

Name: RemRem
Review: Not many menu options. Only ordered fries and it literally took over 40 minutes! But atleast they were hot. The drink menu is limited as well, one of those overhyped tik tok places. It’s cute for pics but that’s about it. Wouldn’t come back again.

Name: LarisaD
Review: Great food, good drinks, perfect vibe! Music was fun but not too loud. Would definitely come back

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Was not at all what I expected the ambiance and energy was great. Drinks were not really that good and the food was typical bar and grill food. The waitress was ok I had to yell for her multiple times to get her attention. I was just expecting a lot more but I was still able to sit back and enjoy myself and relax.

Name: Cara
Review: Great ambience at this rooftop and they make it a fun environment for groups to come to.

Name: DayyyJ
Review: Of course I found this place on Instagram. It looks so much bigger in videos and post. This rooftop is very small and nothing spectacular, the pink sculptures really need to cleaned or repainted. I wish they offered bigger plate options aside from finger foods. I order mocktails and they were delicious, however my group of friends & I had 3 different servers from the time we sat down. They rarely came around to check on us, which ultimately made us have to go the bar ourselves for drink. I had the worst experience at the bar. My friends and I had a reservation, when I went to the bar to order my drink the bartender had a nasty attitude (he barely spoke English), but we weren’t aware you had to open a tab at the bar, or pay for your drink immediately. I think that’s dumb as hell, why can’t you put it on the table tab? I wouldn’t have minded opening a bar tab, but his disgusting personality turned me off. I also don’t think a mocktail should be the same price as a regular cocktail. I’m paying for soda and grenadine! I know I won’t be back to this establishment, and won’t recommend anyone.

Name: Tashadeen
Review: There menu didn’t have much options. Food wasn’t really good. Drinks were okay. It was a cool vibe but definitely overpriced. Won’t be going back!

Name: RodrigoD
Review: The cost of the reservation should include at least the beverages for that price

Name: KelseyS
Review: More than lack luster. Not very many food options, our tacos were cold, the service was slow and inattentive.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: 12 friends flew in from CA to celebrate my birthday. Upon arriving about 10:45pm we got seated and pitch a bottle at over 575.00 to celebrate. Took about 15 mins or more get the bottle delivered so let’s say 11pm now only to be told last call and we needed to close up shop in 45 mins wtf. We ordered a bucket in beers and entire 5th of vodka no way we could finish all this in less than a hour. I guess the point is don’t sell this much alcohol if your closing up soon or at least let your patron know as it became very uncomfortable to try and finish this amount of alcohol in such a short time . Do better this is not what we expected when planning our first night in New York ￼.

Name: RachelM
Review: Uncomfortable, terrible food selection,  so expensive for frozen chicken strips. How do you do guacamole wrong. Also, it was confusing, irritating, and too much money. Skip it.

Name: DanaG
Review:
Ambiance & a unique atmosphere is what Magic Hour has to offer. Service is hit & miss; it depends on who is serving. All too often the server takes an excessive amount of time to even take a drink order. Personalities vary greatly! Some servers are a delight to interact with, others show little personality.

The music should come down to just background level. While I was there it felt like MH was going for the club scene, though it really isn't a dance place.

The drinks are too expensive.

Name: Sammie
Review: Tables are to close together, small food selection. Drinks sucked.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Awful! The pink pancakes were so dry and had noooo taste and…. I don’t know how it’s possible to ruin cotton candy, but they did.
How is it possible? Don’t waste your money for a photo op, not worth it.

Name: Cris
Review: Nice place if overhyped. That's what Marriot is going for I'm sure. They can't charge to your room, so don't expect to use your "destination fee" here.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I’m not sure when this spot turned into a full on club. It was much aesthetically pleasing before

Name: JessicaU
Review: It was lame. Basic. Boring. The dj played Kesha and black eyed peas should’ve known better. The place is two blocks from Times Square. Lame

Name: DF80
Review: This place was fun! Such a nice hot spot to have a date night.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great drinks, food, and atmosphere! Would definitely go back again.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Terrible place, would never go back!!! it was my birthday and I thought it would be a good experience, the place itself is super beautiful. but, they put us at a terrible table, in an isolated part. The food was terrible too, we ordered some mini hamburgers, but the meat in the hamburger tasted like it was of very poor quality. And finally, the service was also bad. I think they are very used to serving only tourists and are not concerned with providing good service or retaining their customers. It was a bad choice for my birthday night out.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
I NEVER write reviews, but this time I had to. I visited from Toronto with a group of friends & we saw alot of cute TikTok’s. Please, do not waste your time booking a reservation. Staff / hostess, doormen lack common courtesy. They almost seem as if your an inconvenience attending the restaurant as a paying customer. I get mean girl vibes specifically from the hostesses. They don’t look you in the eye while you speak to them and we’re in their phones. Upon greeting staff, they were totally dismissive. Also food is terrible/overpriced, small portions & is not good. Pub food from a small shop would be much better & worth your money. To further justify this review, we bumped into a group of girls having a birthday dinner asking for pictures. They also said they had the same experience and found all staff to be rude, dismissive and stuck up. We all found it strange. This restaurant should focus less on “aesthetics” and “pretty staff” and more on quality food & customer service.

One thing I will give them is there cocktails were beautiful ( still overpriced) and the one girl who attended our table was very polite.

Name: ElleWrey
Review: It was raining so that ruined the view/ambiance a bit. The service was good but the food was subpar. We ordered the big AF croissant but the pink icing/frosting on it did not taste good.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Seems like it’s most for the selfie-moments. So a lot of girls with birthdays..

Name: KristyC
Review: Over rated. Service sucked. They have a limited late night menu to begin with but only had one of the five things available to order which was only the chips and guac.

Name: KeithLeigh
Review: The roof top is made like a U with the bar in the middle. so it’s possible to be on the opposite side of the cute backdrop, lights and photo opportunities. If you’re not on that side then you don’t have access to the reason you booked this cute rooftop.

Name: KeriganS
Review: I have never had worse service in my life. Server slammed down the appetizer plates, left before we could tell her we were splitting the check, didn’t refill our drinks at all even when asked specifically to do so. Hostess came up to the stand and told us to hold on while she was doing something on her phone before telling us to follow her.

Name: LeeM
Review: I had a horrible experience with server and manager. I think I was prejudged without a conversation. But….not quick to say this.

Name: EmMaJ
Review: Lively vibe. Service was not good — two waitresses tended to us. First one merely took our drink order and was baffled by a request for a Paper Plane and The Last Word. The second one re-took our order 25 minutes later after noticing we still had no drinks or food in front of us. ￼ After waiting more than 30 minutes for a second small plate, we finally got our food, exceeding our 90 minute maximum stay. ￼ Food and drink was delicious! The first waitress returned to hand us the bill. ￼Wish I had had cash on hand to tip the second waitress specifically.

Name: MarcC
Review: The cocktails are always good, and I love the playful decor. Great views too, and in an easily accessible location. Fun place!

Name: CandelaB
Review: I thought I would get to a place all decorated with pink and I had nothing pink of it. It was like a regular rooftop. The pink stuff I think it’s the distinctive value of this place (that’s why I chose it) and when I got there it was all black.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Music was loud, service was mid, food was not great.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Disappointed that the Bathroom was fithy. Other than that cool vibe place.  Espresso martini was not made fresh and tasted that way.

Name: Tkxg
Review: This is a good spot if you're just going for drinks and light foods. I went for brunch and the entrees and dessert were not that tasty ! The drinks and music were good. Overall I felt a bit underwhelmed, I've always heard people rave about this spot but I didn't have a 'awesome' experience. This could also be because their spring/summer decor was not yet up so there was also very limited opportunities for photos.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: This is a beautiful rooftop bar.  The drinks were spot on. We had the mini sliders and fish tacos. Everything was delicious.  We can’t wait to come back to the Magic Hour Rooftop Bar and Lounge.

Name: AshieD
Review: Service can be better. Good place for drinks and hanging out; Limited menu

Name: AntM
Review: The server was the only person who was nice and welcoming. The hostess took a while to get us a table. When I asked to be seated somewhere else, she was rude while texting on her phone. She was on her phone from the moment we got there till we left. Also the lady in the front entrance was also rude about checking our IDs. Seem like they did not want to be at work.

Name: Nicki
Review: This was a great place only con was I went on Mother’s Day Weekend and you’d think they’d have floral decor or something pertaining to Mother’s Day, but they didn’t; very disappointing as that is why I went there. But overall food was great, drinks was great but be aware of the $20-23$ up charge on certain drinks 🤦🏾‍♀️.

Name: EbonyP
Review: Would definitely come back here! Good vibes,music, food and drinks

Name: EmilyJ
Review: I would like them to have better food selections and some types of dress code. By the way waitress and security at the door were amazing and so helpful

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great dining experience. Went for the wife’s birthday. Drinks were amazing and the chicken tenders were so good.

Name: BrittanyP
Review: Not worth it. Service was slow and most of the staff were rude and dismissive. The drinks were served in plastic despite costing $18-20 each. Go to Dear Irving on Hudson instead.

Name: Ashley
Review:
This place was really not worth the hype. If you are wanting to visit this place due to social media prepare to be disappointed. It is not at all decorated like you may have seen on social media. Mind you it could be the time of day or time of year we went but it was not decorated as seen on social media. The music is okay. The food is mediocre to say the least and overpriced. We got hamburger sliders and grilled shrimp tacos. The tacos looked better than they actually tasted. Definitely lacking flavor.

I was also stopped by a worker there for taking photos OF MYSELF with a light/flash although there were several other tables taking photos using a flash. I will never visit this place again. Definitely a disappointment on all levels.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Just average. Went for afterwork drinks and it was just ok.

Name: CharmineR
Review: Great ambience and atmosphere. Service and music were great. Weather made it extra great. Drinks 🍹 were on point 🔥

Name: MassimoS
Review: Abbiamo ricevuto un tavolo molto brutto, abbiamo chiesto se potevamo cambiarlo e dopo tanto tempo é stato possibile…( il locale era mezzo vuoto ). Il servizio non era il solito servizio che conosciamo…la cameriera era concentrata sulla sua bellezza e non sui clienti 👎

Name: Palidiner
Review: Great food, large portions. Creative, tasty drinks! Fun place to meet friends with quirky, esthetics!

Name: maguchourllober800
Review: there were no sparkly donuts. ughhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

Name: PaigeV
Review:
Food was delicious, service was great and the atmosphere is a lot of fun! 
The tables are a little low for comfortable eating if you’re tall, but other than that we really enjoyed the experience! Would definitely go back

Name: BradleyB
Review: Not worth the price. Social media scam. Tourist trap

Name: NicoleN
Review: Good place, to spend a good few hours. The drinks were delicious!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: super fun spot for brunch. cool music and ambience. however the food left something to be desired in terms of taste. this place is more about the vibes than the food.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Food was cold, guacamole tasted expired, tacos had no seasoning

Name: AngelaP
Review: Food and drinks were over priced nd not very good.

Name: JeanneB
Review: Everything was good. Only thing I recommend is that if you order a drink, make sure you tell them a single. They automatically make the drink a double which means higher cost. Two drinks and two apps over $100. Reason is the charge for doubles on the shots in the drinks. Next time I will speak up!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Cute and quiet place. Unfortunately they only serve brunch options on the weekend and have very limited options that are pricey. I was most excited for the theme but they didn’t have one at the time so there wasn’t much to look at. The staff was friendly and we got our food quickly. It’s a nice spot but I’d probably only go back during their winter theme and on a weekend.

Name: Liam
Review: Despite there not being rain or inclement weather conditions. The bar kept their rooftop closed. The only appeal to that place is the open rooftop. We had the drinks know as “the diplomat.” The drink tasted like a knock off version of kool-aid and was loaded with sugar. The busboy interacted with the table too much and had bad oral hygiene. The curly fries were marginal at best. I will say the decor entering the facility was nice.

Name: KristineM
Review: Has gone downhill… makes you pay for reservations and won’t answer phone or email.  Very expensive for sub par drinks and food.  Paying for view.

Name: LinaL
Review:
The service was terrible. My friend and I had to ask several people for help and it took forever to get what we asked for.  The choices were scarce and the prices were very expensive for what they offered.
If it was a sunny day and we were able to enjoy the weather on the roof it might have been ok, but they give you 1.5 hours limit for the table.  We were rushed to eat because the service itself was slow.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very nice experience nice space I liked the organisation everything was good!

Name: Rachel
Review: It wasn’t what I expected, the food seemed rushed and the burger didn’t have any taste and they only had the carousel to sit at when there was a table for two me and my friend could’ve sat. The table was to low for us to eat comfortably. The only thing was good was the passion fruit drink. Don’t see the hype. Wouldn’t be going back.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The place it’s really average. For the prices that they charge I was expecting to have a better experience. Also the place makes false advertising, there was no decorations at all, fake plants and my group felt kind rushed to release the table.

Name: JoJo
Review:
Pancakes are poor - i think the Chef's Mommy has a better recipe for pancakes and can do it better!
The cotton candy is tasty.
The location without any decoration is just "normal". I can't recommend it to others, because the prices are too high for just a lormal location without a special decoration or something special.
Drinks are good and the ice cube rose looks great.

Name: CARR
Review: A cute little magical bar. Sadly, it was raining so we couldn't enjoy the actual rooftop. But the food was great! I just wish there was a better place to boogie boogie inside.

Name: Deez
Review:
The door man is an absolute disgrace of a human being, the welcome team is not different such poor customer service at the entrance it’s appalling!
We sat for over 30 mins without service until we complained and then we got a beautiful hostess who tried to redeem the image of the place, bless her! To be fair the manager Aaron apologised profusely and gave us free food & desert, overall it was fair. They tried to make it up to us, as they realised we were celebrating my birthday weekend! Wld I go back? No!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Music way too loud & overpriced. Bad service, not cozy at all. One of those bad tourist spots.. not going back!

Name: Mary
Review:
I made a reservation for my birthday and was expecting the rooftop to look like what they claim it looks like on their instagram and google images. When I went there, my friends and I were seated in the ugliest rooftop you can imagine, no decorations at all! So we decided to leave. While we were leaving, a lady maybe the manager told me that their renovating the rooftop and it'll look good soon! Ok then don't take no reservation or let people know at least! BUT, while we walked out I saw that there's another section that's separate from where we were seated and it had a whole carousel, thanks to my 20/20 vision. SIDE EYE.  Now I am no mathematician 
but the lady lied to me. It was my birthday so I rather not waste my time by investigating so I went to another rooftop! I'm not going back again. Thanks

Name: Jenna
Review: Customer service was horrible. Extremely unfriendly from the elevator guy to the "mandatory" coat and bag check people. "Magic hour" yea there was nothing magical about the half hour i was there for my birthday. Keep posting those phony pics on social media. Nobody's gonna buy your 9 thousand dollar Dom Perrione.

Name: CaitlynR
Review: Dark. No ambience. Drinks were terrible, even warm. Did not live up to the hype.

Name: DeniseN
Review: The whole experience was a whole experience. I had four extra guests and appreciated the care and accommodations.

Name: SheronB
Review: Nice space and visually stunning. A bit loud and worth the cost. The pink winter wonder land is now gone. The new decor is bland imparison.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Menu was nibbles nothing else website pic make it seem fabulous an u get there its completely different its dirty its loud its not comfortable

Name: Ashley
Review: Good time as usual - great food, friendly staff, great DJ, and strong drinks. Only note is they automatically give you top shelf instead of asking which increases the bill dramatically. Additionally, we marked birthday in the reservation, not knowing it meant a $10 cupcake. If we were asked about it, we would’ve declined the cupcake.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Not what I was expecting. Margarita was from a can. Not worth the effort or money.

Name: TiffanyD
Review: Wonderful experience for me and my significant other we enjoyed ourselves and the experience very much 10 outta 10

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The place was good a little sad cause i had seen this place on TikTok and i had everything pink and it was not 😏 but place was not bad at all

Name: KarenD
Review: It was AMAZING with an incredible view!!  This was my second time visiting and the ambiance is the absolute best!!

Name: TavonnaS
Review: I didn’t like that they don’t have other non pork products other then chicken sausages and the brunch menu is not much to pick from. Also our server was terrible

Name: KisairyD
Review: Good, drink, and bottles were overpriced. The music sucked I was bored

Name: Kiki
Review: It was okay. Didn’t like the low tables and was sup set with the overpriced….everything. I mean two s’mores was $21???

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
The service was great everyone was attentive the environment was very relaxed! The food gives overpriced appetizer but it’s okay! The ambiance change with the season so make sure when you reserve it’s still in the season you are looking for.
Also there’s two different parts one is just a rooftop seating area and the other has the “props” like the swing.

Name: EricaM
Review: Food was delicious and I had an amazing time, really good pics

Name: shaunav
Review:
Music was good . If music could have more mix
Reggae , R&b as well .

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Service was awful- kind of ruined the experience!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was ok. Nothing to write home about. Service wasn’t bad but it wasn’t inviting either. The look is very trendy.  It worth the hype. Very limited menu. Cocktails were good!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very good ambience, I like it .... great menu.... Love the Ceasars Salad

Name: mariam
Review: We didn't like the place because it wasn't very nice; the food was not so good and the price was high for the quality which you receive

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Cocktails were really bad, we got Espressos Martinis and a Negroni. All of them were really terrible, very sweet, not a good cocktail at all. How is that such a well known place use plastic cups for cocktails ?
It’s a nightclub ambiance which I think it’s good if that it’s what you are looking for. There was no decoration at all.
There are way better places and rooftop in Manhattan.

Name: ElleB
Review: The WORST experience in NYC. Staff were rude from door to table. Everyone was incredibly rude from the moment we arrived at the door, the coat check, the elevator, even when being seated. It was like we were an inconvenience making a reservation and turning up. Placed us in some weird secluded corner of no where until we asked to be moved to the main area. The decor was dated and cheap and nothing like the pics on the internet or review places. The food was TERRIBLE. Even the Caesar salad was just with vinagerette with some cheese. Was literally the only thing I regretted from my entire NYC trip. DONT GO.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Service terrible.  No one around when needed.  Ambience - holiday decorations in April?   Food - fast food and nothing special.  Again - service no where to be found.  Had to go bar to get a drink.

Name: Sleepy
Review:
Went for a birthday brunch celebration on a Sunday. Drinks were visually pleasing as well as tasty and strong enough to be worth the price. The big AF croissant was delectable. The food however was subpar. The chicken sandwich was very soggy and inedible of which I informed my server after trying to take a few bites but it was not replaced or taken off the bill. The chicken tenders and sliders were also unimpressive l. Wish the food lived up to the infamy of the place. 

I would return for drinks and the ambiance and maybe a few casual bites if any.

Name: Jocelyn
Review:
The seats were extremely low so it was hard to really enjoy a brunch there. Back was really hurting bending so low to reach the hobbit tables. Our waitress was giving us vibes to hurry and leave, took our drink before we even finished it so we quickly had to tell her not to take anything else off the table cause we weren’t done. No pink decor as seen on IG so I was disappointed. All in all it was good for what it was but would never go back or recommend 
Felt a bit cat fished

Name: LauraM
Review: I really enjoyed the experience! While the big AF croissant was definitely expensive, it really was big AF and really good. The service was great and it was a fun experience. The only downside is that the music was way too loud. It was nearly impossible to hold a conversation and my throat hurt from having to shout so much.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Perfect for a brunch during a trip to the city. We ordered the pastry basket and were so impressed with the selection. The drinks are all very pretty, and the DJ was also awesome!

Name: NicholeF
Review: I strongly recommend this place. The decor is gorgeous, and the food is soooo good!

Name: Janet
Review: Everything was so nice the staff was really nice. The place was gorgeous the food was good. I really enjoy my birthday a really nice place to go.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Honestly, it was my first rooftop experience and i expected a rooftop experience but idk why the roof was covered, i assumed rain or because its not summer yet but i wish i knew this sooner because off taking my wife here for her birthday when she requested me to take her to a rooftop experience bar, which it kinda wasnt. So i wish that Magic Hour made a disclaimer prior for me in reserving a seat which cost $30 to make. Overall food and drinks were good.

Name: TimothyS
Review: Way too noisy.  Too pretentious for being served fast food style offerings.  We had better food from the street carts.  The secret service style escorts to the elevators are obnoxious.  For a place that wants to be perceived as elite and upscale, they should stop serving drinks in plastic cups.

Name: SusanP
Review: No pink decor or any place to really take cute pics but outside. Menu was limited.

Name: Lovelyone
Review: My group and I traveled from New Jersey due to videos and pictures we seen online with beautiful floral displays and decor but arrived and none of it was there. We asked someone and was told it was a seasonal thing. I wish that would’ve been clear to avoid this disappointment. Food was average, table was like a coffee table where we had to be hunched over trying to eat our food the whole time. Food came out at a decent time but we constantly had to hunt our waitress down. She barley came over to check on us. I would not visit again. Not happy with the experience.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Moment sympathique mais pas le décor mentionné sur le site . Les cocktails sont tops , et la vue incroyable

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Took my girlfriend for her birthday. It was a cool vibe ad fR as the crowd. The food was cute and the rooftop was nice however security was rude and pushy. Not a welcoming environment at all. I wad asked if i had reservations (which i did ) 5 times.

Name: Iamthemongoose
Review: It was a great experience. We were a large group and the staff were very accommodating

Name: Xris
Review: Poor customer service, our waiter overlooked us and waited on other people. The drinks were water washed down.. Magic Hour has simply lost it touch. My friends and I will not be returning again.

Name: NadineB
Review: We had a good time.   Drinks were really good and not bad$$ for rooftop.  The appetizers were good.   The DJ was spinning great music.  We're going back for brunch and after sunset so we can see the EBB lit.

Name: JenniferF
Review: Was looking forward to amazing decor however there was none. The hostess said it was decorated for spring however there were no decorations

Name: Lourdes
Review:
I know you had to have reservations and that’s wonderful.  But having a certain amount of time wasn’t good. Are table was reserved under the hot sun.  Thank goodness the hostess was nice enough to move a party of 9 to a different table.
Drinks were good but the food was cold.   The birthday girl wasn’t happy about the experience she had or anyone else.

Name: ShaianA
Review: Very lovely hostesses and amazing food/drinks. Great place to have a drink and view the city!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We got to the restaurant host at first door very polite and thorough with the details to get to the top floor. Hostess and servers very  friendly, food and drinks are great and ambiance is awesome. Took hundreds of pics in the restaurant!!!

Name: JoanR
Review:
Great place, great food and good service.

Could be great to order the full menu during brunch.

Name: Gerrie
Review: Very disappointed with food and atmosphere this time around. Could have gone to McDonald's and gotten hot better tasting food.

Name: WhitneyD
Review: The food was good and the environment was nice. We went for brunch where they serve the Pink pancakes. I definitely recommend them!

Name: RebeccaC
Review: My friend and I really enjoyed our visit to magic hour. The drinks were lovely and views were simply incredible. However the only downside was the food. We ordered the pink stack of pancakes to share and while delicious, we were disappointed that we seemed to get pancakes that were lacking in candy floss compared to other diners who had ordered the same. This was disappointing given how expensive they were. Overall we had a great experience and would recommend to others.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Don’t let their Instagram page fool you! The atmosphere is nothing like those photos! And don’t celebrate your special occasions here! I guarantee you will regret it! The chaos in this place only brings you headache rather than making you a good memory of your celebration!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The ambiance was very poor. The way it’s advertised online is only for seasonal experiences and that isn’t even communicated before you make reservations. I feel that I was ‘Catfish’ed to come to this place and it basically ruined my birthday dinner. Being from NY and having such high expectations…I would say my experience was trash. I expected to pay high end prices…but I also expected for me and my guests to enjoy themselves which we definitely didn’t.

Name: WendyZ
Review: The drinks were so good! The place is amazing and has good vibes

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Me pareció que lo quieren hacer un sitio exclusivo y de exclusivo no tiene nada. Horriblemente ambientado y sucio. Nada que ver con lo que se ve en las fotos. Igualmente debo decir que la moza que me atendió fue súper amable y mi trago après ski excelente.

Name: IsabelR
Review: Magic Hour is perfect to spend time with your friends and take pictures on their instagramable spot. The service was great, the lady that took care of our table was very kind. The food was tasty but kinda expensive since it was food that you find in other places like burger and chips but I guess that happens when a place gets to know much. Overall, was a great experience, I will definitely go again.

Name: Dess
Review: This place is nothing like their instagram displays It to be, and the food is good but very limited.

Name: AlexusY
Review: Absolutely loved it! 10/10 experience awesome and quick customer service. Loved the food quality and variety. Also the view and many photo opportunities!

Name: amber
Review: False advertising on all social networks. There is only 3 pink cats outside on patio. The other pink decorations have been removed and with no warning. The waiter was not great at all. She acted as if she didn’t know her job didn’t care to make sure we was taken care of. I would rate 3/10. I only give a 3 cause still the place is cute but not what I came for. Food is horrible!

Name: MARIA
Review: The atmosphere didn't have anything special, according to what i have seen on the internet so it was a little bit of dissapointing. However, the food was delicious and the service really kind. Note: portions are really big.

Name: IolaK
Review: Does not look like any of the pictures online, very basic roof top bar, nothing special, nothing like the pictures. Expensive waste of time, would not recommend, there are a number of amazing roof top bars in New York. This is not one of them.

Name: Genne
Review:
The food menu has like 5 items, the drinks are ok and nothing that I liked but my friends all picked “The Diplomat” and enjoyed it. I ended ordering off the menu. Tacos - 3 good but small tacos, Guac was not homemade, mini sliders (3) were good, curly fries were fine. With 4 drinks, and listed apps it was $150. 

While on the line for the bathroom there was an extremely rude interaction with a customer and the bathroom attendant. The customer yelled at her stating she paid $3000 already and is entitled to whatever candy is on her table. 

Overall, I won’t be back.

Name: Kels
Review: We had 3 servers (w/o warning/knowledge). Appetizer was placed on someone else’s table for several minutes before being placed on ours. Never gave us a fresh new appetizer. Was told we had to leave right after ordering second round of drinks. Waitress took cards to appropriate receipts ands still charged all cards to the wrong receipts. Manager had a “careless” attitude. Her response to every complaint was “Okay”. Waitresses never checked on us, we had to waved them down every 20-so minutes. Will never return. Also, it’s nothing like it looks on its webpage. False advertisement. Would recommend friends to never experience Magic Hr rooftop.

Name: Caterine
Review: This rooftop bar is a great place for spectacular views and delicious drinks. Let surprise you by the ambience.

Name: Andreinaj
Review: It was great!? Love the atmosphere, movie and the vibe!

Name: DJSoni
Review: L’ambiance et le DJ étaient super

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: No one seemed to have any clue what they were doing. Service was TERRIBLE. Our waitress had no idea what they had for drinks, and when we did get them, one was wrong. 35$ for two drinks. We tried to go to the bar after (with out almost finished drinks) and sat there for 30 MINUTES and were not even acknowledged. Not even a hello or a look in our direction. One of the worst establishments I’ve ever been to. Not sure who is running this place but they need to check on their terrible staff. Wouldn’t recommend to my worst enemy.

Name: rguerrero
Review: Good view but very noisy. Good view but very noisy.

Name: AnaJ
Review: The service is so bad. I don’t recommend this restaurant is my first and last time o go to this restaurant.

Name: SimonB
Review: Great atmosphere had a great time with my wife food and drinks were fantastic

Name: RebeccaE
Review: Horrendous place, we stayed 20 minutes and left. The man in the lift could jot have been a more miserable member of staff. When we hot to the top having endured the ride with the gloomy man in what I would describe as a black box there was no one there but they tucked us on a table for two around the corner from the bar. If you have read about about a beautiful rooftop adorned with flowers and if you think you’ll be eating insta-worthy pink s’mores with pretty sprinkles, topped with cotton candy then to manage your expectations, they don't serve them anymore, there is no rooftop view to write home about and the only “flowers” were a couple of plastic faux trails of  ivy in an otherwise bland aesthetic. A hugely disappointing place.

Name: Varunieb
Review: I absolutely hated this place. All the decor which was on google maps was was taken down. The food was awful. Overall it killed the vibe , I went into the bar expecting a lot more.

Name: Kilahbilah
Review: The food was absolutely delicious. The drinks looked and tasted good.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Such a cute place and this food is amazing!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Viel zu überteuert, Getränke aus Plastikgläsern, schlechter Service - einfach nicht zu empfehlen.

Name: ToyaF
Review: The server was the absolute worst. She took a while to tend to us when we got to the place. Then she came over speaking Spanish before asking us if we speak Spanish. She seemed like she had an attitude. It was my birthday and I didn’t even get a cake, meanwhile she handed a girl sitting at a table opposite me a cake. Barely came over to ask us if we were okay or needed anything else. If it weren’t for the cute decor and pictures I got, I wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone who wishes to celebrate their birthday. Utter trash

Name: Gina
Review:
Barely any food options on the menu and the quality of the food was no better than going to McDonald's only it costs 10x what you would pay at McDonald's.
 Drinks ... Good
 Food ... Eh

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The service once inside was sub-par. Waitress was very inattentive and the times she did come over she was constantly looking at her watch. We didn’t even reach out hour and a half table limit because we were just turned off and the place had many empty tables so unsure why she seemed to be in a rush. It was not the “magic” experience we came to expect from this and certainly was NOT worth the $200 spent for 3 people who only had sliders and chicken fingers and two drinks. One person didn’t even drink other than the TAP water they provided.

Name: TenieraW
Review: Great space, Environment and  food was amazing....I think brunch menu should have a more Variety of food but food is great

Name: JenniferM
Review: We had such a great time at Magic Hour. The food was out of this world!  All of the staff was nice and friendly. Seating was spacious.  So many fun picture opportunities.  The over all vibe was great!

Name: Kayleigh
Review: My bachelorette was here over the weekend and it was the most perfect spot for that! The drinks the atmosphere the workers, it was All so perfect!

Name: SuzanneM
Review: Outstanding! Best rooftop bar we went to out of the four that night.  Really fun atmosphere!

Name: CoreyM
Review: Ambience was very cool and the music selection was fun. Great spot to go for before dinner drinks, but I have to say the drinks were very expensive.

Name: CamilaS
Review: the place is really fancy  . It has great views. the food and the cocktails were delicious.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very overrated. Food was not good. Had to send it back.

Name: Sara
Review: Service very unpleasant. Food was ok. DJ bummer. Expected a lot more from this place

Name: NeidaG
Review: Great place to out with your girls. Good food and drinks. Very cute

Name: Kjs590
Review: It was beautiful and the service was amazing. I just wished the menu was a little broader but overall amazing

Name: ShirleyV
Review: Fun, beautiful environment! Music and drinks were great. A wonderful experience

Name: Ihokhhk
Review: Waitress chased me down to pay her $23 dollars for one drink when I told her I was getting my bag

Name: Theodora
Review: The pink AF pancakes were delicious, awesome place for cute pictures and good vibes in general

Name: Rush
Review: The hype didn’t match the reality. The food wasn’t all that, the drinks were ok

Name: CherylG
Review: Absolutely awful. From the attitude of the staff on the door to the abhorrent attitude from the staff when getting out of the lift. The decor was cheap tacky and still had Christmas trees up in March. The decor on the carousel was ripped and the food was pub food at best. Would never recommend and very surprised at this being a Tao group establishment

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Had a great time for my friend’s birthday. The Apres Ski is so delicious

Name: Larson
Review:
This is a bar for young kids who want cool IG posts. Drinks weren't bad. We were there pretty early (6pm) on a weekday
Music is almost club-level loud. 
Drinks were decent. Our server was very kind, but spent a lot of time talking to coworkers with her back turned to the guests so that we couldn't get her attention even from 15 feet away. 
Not a terrible experience but also not what we were looking for in a rooftop bar.

Name: JodyW
Review: We were very excited to visit the venue. After finding a spot not to cold we settled in and ordered drinks and food. We were not disappointed in either.

Name: SofiaN
Review: It was awesome even on the weekdays I recommend the burrata

Name: TamaraD
Review: The food was trash. The service was trash. The ambiance was good.

Name: KarenC
Review: Extremely overpriced for poor service and bland food.  The only nice thing is the view and a few props. 25% off Prosecco / really $70!!  It’s a $20 bottle! Then bad service like they were doing is a favor.  There are so many rooftop’s that are great this one is just a tourist trap!

Name: Magdalena
Review: The waiter never came back to check on us. We went here for brunch, it was not busy at all so I don’t understand why we weren’t attended properly. The food is too hyped up is not even that good. I was just mad at the experience I received. The place was pretty and I loved the photos I took here but I don’t recommend the service at all.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Treated rudely and not allowed to use the $30 reservation deposit towards our ticket

Name: Tammy
Review: Drinks were not good at all.  I didn't even drink mine.

Name: Worthy
Review: It is always very aesthetically pleasing. That is the best part about Magic Hour

Name: IPretty
Review: The restaurant is run down looking in person.  The food is average and not worth the price.  Pictures online are deceiving.

Name: Njoi
Review: the photos make it seem as though the location is very whimsical in its decor. I found the decor anti climatic in comparison to what I saw online. The food was over bland and overpriced. The drinks were good. I would not recommend this bar/lounge to anyone.

Name: Veedee
Review:
Went for brunch,  was ok. Atmosphere was super cute , very instagramable . There is not a real entrance from the hotel. You had to stand outside a side door in a tight line and they take you up by group . Quite busy at opening , they were late to take us in.
