We were seated quick , menu wasn't much to choose from for brunch. They only checked in on us once and then we had to flag staff down after that for refills,  dessert , etc....
There was a second dining area and the patio wasn't open. Maybe lunch and dinner would be better ..?? Would have to come back to find out

Name: TraciT
Review: a little pricey but everything else was wonderful... scenery ood and music and guest we had a wonderful time!!!

Name: Jdknsos
Review: Energetic vibe, really did well to get us the Big Croissant for dinner! Really liked the place, would recommend!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: People should stay away from this corny place. I wish I can give it something less than a zero.

Name: DianneS
Review: Great ambience. Awesome drinks and delicious food.

Name: AlondraA
Review: Pretty place for drinks but we were uncomfortable & no one took our order from the table we had to get drinks at the bar because we had no server. People not too friendly just grab a few drinks and go.. I was expecting more for a new york bar. Only good for pictures and drinks

Name: AbbyY
Review: Martinis served in plastic ware and very over priced. You’re paying for the views and vibes

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was great! I celebrated my birthday!

Name: CrystalF
Review: The magic hour was not magical.. the staff did not interact/entertain and the food(snacks) and drinks were extremely overpriced.  The carousel was pretty and a good photo op but definitely not worth the price for simply photos.

Name: Carson
Review: Honestly not great. Cocktails weren’t bad- but not good. My glass came dirty as hell (lipstick marks), our waitress just took the glass after we asked and didn’t check on us once after that. Food was fine, but definitely there are better places in NYC to visit. Only go here if you want to take photos don’t waste your money on the food or drinks.

Name: AnnetteC
Review: Is an amazing place to eat, drink and have a good time. I recommend for friend's, beautiful place

Name: NancyR
Review: Nice place, a lot of hype for just a table that is decorated. The service was good the drinks are expensive but strong. Nice for the aesthetics but that’s it. Wouldn’t go again

Name: Drew
Review: Place is beautiful, but travelled out of state for a birthday dinner and made reservations at 10:30, to arrive and not be able to eat. Reservations made after 10:30 should not be available! Or atleast let customer know that kitchen will be closed and to book at own discretion.

Name: JanaZ
Review: Very good location an good rating. We are very happy about all

Name: Rk0131
Review: The food was ok, and overpriced. Our server was great. We asked for another table and when we got moved we ended up having to move tables together our selves. Lastly,  we didn’t even get anything for my friend bdate, like no small dessert/candles, even though I noted this on my reservation. People just go for pics and the decor, that’s all…

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We loved everything except the server who told us that we have to move from the table because they had more reservations coming when it was false and we were consuming food and beverages and she was desperate asking for us to pay the bill that was rude. The environment was lovely anyway we enjoyed it.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Awesome time once you finally get in. Service is top notch.

Name: KevinH
Review: I recommend this place, the view is great you can see the Empire State Building is right behind. Service was okay our server would take too long to check up on us to see if we needed another drink. The shrimp tacos were dry and had no taste but overall I had a good time.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Was amazing ❤️❤️❤️ I had plenty of hun imma go back again

Name: DayR
Review: Never went lady said she canceled my reservation and it was my birthday and they still charged me $30

Name: DayM
Review:
The coolest spot in NYC! 
Great DJ, Delish food, fun selfie spot! 
Grab your friends ... and head to Magic Hour Rooftop Bar!

Name: Tina
Review: The food was mediocre and the service was not great for their prices. One friend didn’t get her food until the rest of us were finished eating. The waitress didn’t seem cut out for the job. Either she kept forgetting things or just didn’t care much about what we needed. We took a couple of nice pictures. That’s about it. I wouldn’t go back.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Me and the girls had a blast! We will definitely be back!

Name: americantraveler
Review: No magic. Regular drink bar. But chips and guac was really tasty.

Name: MAJO
Review: It’s your typical IG place, it’s cute for pictures but the food is basic and the drinks were overpriced.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Nice spot , nice view, , the worst service , one waitress for one floor. With around 20 tables .. they take for ever for bring everything.. menu, food, drinks .. gosh so disappointed.

Name: VeeDJ
Review: Magic how rooftop was nice. The food, ambiance, music, and drinks were all a great experience.

Name: AmyL
Review: Was in the City for a work trip & visited with a couple of girlfriends from work. All three of us were super excited for the reservation but were quickly disappointed once we were seated. Reservation was for 7:30 pm in March, it was quite cold out which I think affected the vibe we experienced because the bar was enclosed because of the weather. The enclosure hindered the view which is no one's fault. Super cute spot but the music was way too loud (think club music loud) to even hear each other at a very small table for three with incredibly uncomfortable chairs. Although our server was kind & on top of things, the food was beyond disappointing. We were aware it would be bar food but it was barely palatable. We knew the cocktails & decorations were the main attraction of the bar but we did not think the food would be treated as an afterthought. Overall, it was a huge letdown. I think if you visited in the warmer months when the bar is truly an open rooftop & only order a couple of overpriced cocktails, you might enjoy it more than we did. Definitely some cute photo opportunities for those really into socials but that is about all this place has to offer.

Name: ChrP
Review: Location rigged as a party place for the 20something crowd. Nice if you like expensive drinks in plastic glasses.

Name: Chel
Review: Pretty place but it simply does not live up to its hype. We were seated at a corner next to the bar with little to no light and no proper restaurant ambiance in sight. The food options are limited and expensive considering how it tastes. This poor review strictly focuses on the overall place not being worthwhile, as their staff was very friendly and that did not go overlooked.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Talk about a “catfish” restaurant! The pictures online are misleading. Do not waste your money or your time. This place is totally beat. Food was like frozen food from the grocery store. Dirty glasses with lipstick and mystery cream.  Rusty container held our cotton candy. STAY AWAY!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We felt a little rushed and we were set next to an exit door when there were other very nice seating areas. Also we wanted to order a specific food item and were told they didn’t have anymore, however the table next to us ordered and received 2 two of the items. It was my second time visiting and my first visit was fir my birthday and it was magnificent, however we didn’t have the same experience for my daughter’s birthday.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Absolutely loved it ! I came to NY for a few a days from FL and had pre booked it. So glad I did. Ambiance was amazing our waitress Cory so beautiful and so sweet. Will definitely be returning for the summer time vibes !! 10/10

Name: ELOKNOWSFOOD
Review: The welcoming staff seemed on Edge, particularly 2 hostesses being abrasive 1 downstairs and 1 upstairs. Our 2 waitresses were great!...food below average with decent drinks. Our dining chairs were FILTHY...particularly the table directly ifo DJ booth...not returning anytime soon.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Food was amazing, vibe was great

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Was not pleased with the food. Drinks were delicious and the vibe was great

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Sadly, not the experience I was looking for and definitely not what they show on the photos. Wine is served in plastic cups, even when we were all inside. Music was so loud at 9:00pm on a Tuesday. Don’t think I’ll be coming back

Name: JordM
Review: It was way too loud near seating like ow loud right at our table, the food is normal bar food which is fine but small portions for double the price. The only reason to go is because it looks aesthetic, but even then it’s so dark that your surrounded by people taking flash pics standing at the carousel table (awkward if you reserved it). We didn’t know we had a waiter until about 25-30 minutes in because no one talked to us or gave any direction. Staff just kinda stares at you 😭 I wouldn’t go back but it wasn’t terrible. There’s also not really a dance floor or anything near the bar so I don’t get the noise level.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Their pink pancakes with the sparkler candle was beautiful and it was a nice touch for a breakfast brunch

Name: Mpr25
Review: It just a nice place but the food is not that good

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Got charged for still showing up , the lady took down my reservation so explain why they charged me $30???????

Name: KaylaL
Review: Service was horrible, we were ignored the entire night. They have Christmas trees up in February which is so tacky and that was literally all the decor they had so we couldn’t even get good pictures. This is probably why it was so empty. Worst place to go on my birthday.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was a great night with an excellent vibe!!!

Name: rubia
Review: Absolutely loved Magic Hour. The venue was super cute with its chic girly pink theme. There’s plenty of photo opportunities for you and your girl gang to take pictures. Definitely will recommend this place for a cute girls night out.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: This place wasn’t as nice as I expected more of a club scene if anything nice decor food was disgusting def more of bar food I didn’t even see the same food I seen online on the menu def a catfish restaurant

Name: charlesg
Review: A guest was a few minutes late to the table  and because of this they never checked in on time to offer dessert. They rudely came over and put the check on the table and said it’s a timed table. It was not busy and it was 8:30 on a Saturday. They could have at least came over and asked if we wanted dessert.

Name: DestinyJ
Review: Great experience. Service was good I have no complaints. Drinks and food also good

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Instagram able place! Photos on Instagram can be deceiving. The Big AF Croissant is good! Drinks are OK and expensive when we see value for money

Name: FariaN
Review: The food was delicious and the service was excellent! I will definitely be going back again!

Name: AmberP
Review: Basically only saw our waitress once then we were chasing her around just to get a glass of water. Food is mediocre for the high prices. I’m sure there are other rooftop brunch options in the city that is better than this place.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Food was good , service was terrible . Ambiance was everything

Name: EdwarA
Review: Terrible service, I saw my waitress  once, she didn’t even take my order, another waitress did it for her even though she was aware we were on her section, she came and put the drinks on my table and we never saw her again, not even to bring my check. I wouldn’t recommend this bar.

Name: LADaher
Review: Great vibes! Loved the atmosphere

Name: LisaB
Review: Didn’t love anything about this place. At all. My daughter and I grabbed a drink and food before a show and couldn’t wait to get outmost here.  Just weird

Name: MistyB
Review: We celebrated my daughter’s 23rd birthday at Magic Hour and absolutely loved it! The decor was amazing and the food and drinks unique. Service was on point and the DJ payed the perfect mix of songs for an evening out!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: No happy hour on margaritas only on wine!!!

Name: naomiem
Review: Service was excellent.  Food was mediocre and over priced. I enjoyed the drinks and ambiance. The DJ brought good vibes.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We were meeting our friends there. Check in to the location was pretty smooth. Our server was great. Great ambience.i..great music..not too loud that u cant talk to each other..the only thing that wasnt that great were the cocktails that we ordered. I felt the cocktails were a bit diluted. I took berry bubbly and my partner took the diplomat. The food was good..overall we had a great time. Will definitely recommend this place!

Name: Ashley
Review: The staff were rude and inconsiderate. The waiter was irritable and displayed it towards us despite it being my birthday. She forgot our drinks and even intentionally didn’t tell the rest of staff it was my birthday so they never even sang to me lol. The atmosphere however, was beautiful and worth the trip. That was the best part of being there. The food was decent. Brunch might be a better option than dinner.

Name: TessaB
Review: This was my second visit to this establishment and I have to confess that I was extremely disappointed the second time around compared to my first time. Based on my first experience,  I have recommended friends to visit this restaurant. Unfortunately, I would not be able to do so after my last visit. The food was so bad I could not believe it, and not to mention it was expensive. Every chef should be able to properly prepare Sliders, those were the driest   have ever had, the guac and chips was tasteless and disgusting. This was my bday celebration and it sucked. I will not return nor will I recommended anyone else, ever.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: My date and I had a great time here! The vibe was amazing, good drinks, good food, and a good view! All I was looking for tbh and we both enjoyed it!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Agradable! Disfrutando con mi esposa, recomendado pero ten presente que es un lugar de cita, para comer varias entradas ya que los platos son pequeños pero tienen buen precio

Name: AlexanderM
Review: Great ambiance for Instagramable pic moments, but the menu is very sub par on food choices.

Name: NicoleJ
Review: Several of us came here to celebrate Galentine's Day. Before making the reservations, we should have checked the menu. Food is small plates/appetizers and the selection is limited. Despite being small plates, they are priced like entrees. The beverage menu is not extensive. Despite our desire for a chocolate martini, they only offered hot cocoa. I was dissatisfied with the waitress's service. You can take pictures and enjoy the atmosphere here, but don't expect great food or service.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Beautiful decorated inside. The place attracts plenty of women so if your date is a bore no worries there’s multiple to choose from lol

Name: Daya1411
Review: The food is very good, the place is like its name MAGICAL

Name: RunawayRenee
Review:
Not nearly as nice as the photos look, but still a cool experience.

The drink selection is limited, everything is sweet, and it is too loud to talk much. Also, the scene is very young

It could be just what you are looking for, but I had envisioned something more lounge-y.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The place is very chic! pink is my absolute fav color so this place to me was a paradise 💘 got some nice pictures on the open rooftop, loved it there, will definitely go back so have some cocktails 🤭🥂

Name: VincentG
Review: Valentine’s Day date. My fiancé had fun

Name: Mellany
Review: Our first time coming in here me and my girls and we loved it. Amazed ❣️ hope to come summer time

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We were sat on the carousel then forgotten about. Sat there for 30 mins then finally went and found a server that let us know she’s not our server but she will come take our drink order. We got a very boozy hot chocolate and a glass of wine. We never saw a server after that. We would have loved to order more. We actually waited another half hour or so and finally went to the bar to try to pay our bill and the bartender told us we couldn’t pay there. So we went to someone else until we were directed where we could go pay. We actually were suppose to have brunch there two days after but cancelled it because we had such a bad vibe and experience. We did go out on the terrace and that was really pretty out there. The place was decorated beautifully. It’s to bad the service was so absent and short with us. All our other TAO experiences have been so lovely.

Name: ValerieM
Review: Pricey…………………………. Everything else was really good!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Unfortunately my friend and I had a bad experience for our first time. We had a reservation for only 2 ppl which I booked 2 weeks in advance for her birthday celebration. We are from out of state so I drove us there for the day to spend the day in nyc and was going to pay for her dinner here. The waitress sat us down in a corner and gave us some water. Cool. Never came back to take our orders or check up on us. The section we were seated at looked like a company picnic that was also taking place. One of the customers from that huge party walked over to us and said “you’re not supposed to sit there we reserved this whole section”. So I said “I have reservations here and the waitress sat us here”. Her Karen self walked away and was mad because she had to squat in her heels because there were no seats for her left lol. Anyways, the place looks stunning but that day service was lacking.

Name: Stephanie
Review: I was drawn in to this place by tik tok. It was overpriced McDonald's. All they have is chicken fingers and sliders. Not many food options at all. If you want pretty pictures for Instagram then go here but if you're looking for a good drink and food this place isn't it.

Name: Goodgirl4u
Review: Galentines.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Customer service is great! Food and drinks perfect

Name: JayGee
Review: Great spot overall but 1 hr & half to eat, drink, chat up and pay a bill with a group.. such a rush

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Entrance front desk person who confirms the reservation on the first floor was super rude. Security was super nice, however I felt very rushed. Food was subpar, the pancakes were not good at all, could’ve made it better at home. All in all it was pretty lame and overhyped.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Overall it was a fun experience, we did have to wait over an hour for our table which was a bit frustrating. I did like the fact that while waiting we were able to get drinks at both bars and take pictures. Everyone who attended my brunch said that there were a lot of kids and it was quite unexpected due to it being a 21+ bar/rooftop. We feel maybe they should have one side for families/children so that way guests aren’t uncomfortable drinking in front of someone’s child. My friends and I would give our overall experience here a 7/10, we’d definitely come back!

Name: KimberlynM
Review: excellent place the service the environment a thousand times recommended

Name: Deeeeee
Review: I was embarrassed that my Amex wasn’t going through aside from it actually having funds . Eventually after a few minutes it did go through after authorizing it. Food would be the game changer here . More options/ better cooked would be nice . My party and I had so many drinks when hungry we had to order food elsewhere , we would have preferred to spend the money there. Service 4/5. Drinks 5/5 . Food 1/5

Name: JisselM
Review: The restaurant is amazing we are pleased with the service. The decoration looks like out of a fairy tale the prices are very affordable.the waitress was very nice attentive.

Name: AmyM
Review:
I done a lot of research and this place also came top however it was a little disappointing for me. We were stuck in a corner right next to the DJ. No real atmosphere. It looks great on Instagram but in reality we found it very underwhelming 
Food was tasty and cocktails were nice. 
We checked our coats which was great but when I approached the lift I was told I wasn’t allowed my hand bag even though the security guards watched me and my husband but stuff from our coat pockets into my bag. Another women got in the lift with us with a larger bag than what I had.  

Our server clocked off 30 mins after we arrived so we had to settle our bill just as our food was brought out so she could get her tip. No other server took over so we left.

Name: TriniNewRoc
Review: The s’mores were delicious, drinks were ok! We went on. Weeknight and we had fun. The curly fries with truffle sauce was delicious as well.

Name: Alex
Review: The service was a little slow and lacking for what seemed to be a slower night.

Name: DaisyP
Review: Food options very limited, drinks are overpriced you pay for the photos and ambiance.

Name: SUZYGODBLESS
Review: I love it, friendly staff I felt like I was at home food and refreshing was awesome I’m definitely gonna come back the best

Name: MeganT
Review: This restaurant/lounge was very hyped up all over TikTok so we wanted to come try it out, especially for the cotton candy pancakes. They were pricey, and tasted mediocre. The presentation was great. Service was great as well. It is a great place to go with friends to have a cute brunch and take pictures.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Love the carousel. Brunch needed more options.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great rooftop bar. Music. People. Signature drinks are tasty. Amazing view of the Empire State Building and the decor is fun and flirty.

Name: JaclynB
Review: An incredible experience, we both loved everything about it

Name: Lissette
Review: Expensive & Overrated .. Table was only for 1.5 hrs. Once over with your table reservation, you must hover around the bar to access drinks. No access to pink bunny displays which was one of the main reasons I came to visit magic hour. Overall not to happy with our reservation. We were better off going uptown (Dyckman/Heights) where you can enjoy your dinner, drinks, and time there without being rushed and told to give up your table. Must include uptown not too expensive either! I wouldn’t come back here a second time.

Name: AmberK
Review: Nice ambiance and very “Instagramable” however the service was poor with our waitress prioritizing bigger parties. Waited a half hour for a glass of water. Food did not all come out at the same time. Food was mediocre for the price. I’ve been to Magic Hour in the past and it was fantastic, but something has changed and I will not be returning.

Name: Kayyy
Review:
It was lovely. The food was okay. But the ambiance was a vibe and staff were super friendly. I ordered a ceasar salad and I had whole romaine leaves instead of them chopping it down.
I do recommend for birthday parties or any special occasion

Name: AParris
Review: i literally have no words! my friends & i decided to throw a girls’ night for one of our friends since she didn’t have one before she got married. it was absolutely everything we needed & imagined it to be! the decor was absolutely stunning, the music- dj larry had us up the entire night!!! it was truly the BESSSTTTTTT TIME. the food was good & the drinks so tasty! 💕 i’m mentally planning my next visit .

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Took my wife here for her bday.  It’s is a great setting very different atmosphere loved it. Food menu is limited and $$$$ expensive food taste good. specialty drinks as the ones on the site they didn’t have or ran out. My wife wanted the cotton candy drink and they didn’t have it. Carousel is awesome for picture if no one has reserved it if so don’t expect a picture.  Overall it was good my wife enjoyed it.

Name: Elizabeth027
Review: The place is such a nice vibe and such an aesthetic! I will say there should be more of a variety of food choices and also offer more than small plates with the prices that they are charging. Overall, it was an amazing experience. ❤️

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Me and my guest become I’m

Name: ariellel
Review: I went to this rooftop for drinks before a show. It was absolutely stunning. Felt very cozy. It was a rainy weeknight so it was pretty quiet. My server was excellent and friendly. Gave good drinks recommendations. I had the boozy hot chocolate which was delicious. I would only come here for a drink and pictures. The food is very expensive and okay tasting. Drinks are typical NY pricing. It is quite spacious so you could go with a nice size group of people.

Name: HannahD
Review: It was beautifully decorated we had such a great time

Name: IsabellaS
Review: Birthday drinks

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Birthday

It was a wonderful experience. I love the view and the ambiance

Name: Roop
Review: This place is meant to look pretty for the gram, the brunch scene was very young tweens and teens along with tourists taking pictures of pink cocktails with white Christmas trees in the background. The rooftop has some lewd figures definitely not kid appropriate. Poor judgment call on my part, I should’ve known the marketing and social media hype was exactly that.

Name: RoseP
Review: We thought the decor would have been more extensive. The menu options were too limited for us. Nice place to have a quiet date drink.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Eh, under lacking. Overly priced food and drinks, dinner menu is unappealing and not real dinner options. Hostess was rude. Restaurant practically empty at the time of our reservation and hostess threatened to give our table away if our party of 6 wasn’t complete while 4 of us were present. Drinks tasted awful. What waste and a shame. We wanted to like this place because of the theme and vibe from seeing on social media but, totally not worth the hype!

Name: Trina
Review: Took my daughter here for a birthday dinner, the food menu wasn't much to choose from, but what we chose was really good. The drink menu was good, and they were on point with making it strong that I only needed one drink, thank God, cuz it's pricey, but worth it. Plus it's New York, I wouldn't expect it to be cheap. The whole vibe and everything was amazing. Very pretty decor! The whole staff was very nice, from our bottom floor arrival all the way to the rooftop! The whole experience was classy but chill! Will definitely go again, and try the brunch!-)

Name: JessicaM
Review: Perfect area and view. Prices of food and drink was fair.

Name: Fern
Review: Such great place to go for a brunch out with the ladies <3

Name: Rk0131
Review: I felt very rushed from the beginning, the food wasn't all that and expensive. The decor was beautiful and our server was great explaining the menu options. we went to take pictures and by the time we got back our drinks were gone and table was cleared! and we were within our 2 hr time limit.

Name: Sandy
Review: Very poor service and rude staff.  food quality was very poor too and my party was not attended well.

Name: PabloP
Review: The host was very rude when we first got upstairs we asked her if there was any tables she didn’t even look at us and said no not on the weekends and walked away she was a Asian girl with long hair so I went on open tables and found there was 9 tables still available so I booked it they sat us down after 15 min later she came to our table as if I snuck in and asked for my name the place was beautiful but I also felt disrespected not going back again

Name: NoemiS
Review: The place is nice, the drinks were good but the food was just ok.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The ambiance and drinks were amazing. We had a reservation for my birthday. The server didn’t seem to care and paid little attention to us. We seemed more of a bother than her customers. Not even a Happy Birthday acknowledgement. Again drinks, atmosphere, and music were a 10.

Name: FoodieFoodie
Review: Not good for business meals

Name: AngelenaA
Review: The ambiance was really beautiful however the service and food was not. The servers did not give me or my cousin “warm and fuzzy” it was everything short of hospitable. At first we were placed in a back room that was empty which was nice and intimate. Until our server placed a couple on a bench directly next to us despite the fact that their were several other tables open.  We had to ask the servers several times for simple things. Utensils, water and basic service. Also when we asked for a larger plate because we ordered the stack of pancakes the waitress said “we don’t have bigger plates” and let us continue eating huge pancakes off of appetizer plates. The best service we received was at security, coat check, and the bathroom attendant “alma” yes we got her name because she was that nice. The food also lacked flavor we ordered tacos and they were very bland, the pancakes were extremely hard and the cotton candy caramelized on top to the point that we couldn’t eat it. My cousin is pregnant and wanted a mocktail or even hot chocolate. The drink menu does not service people who do not drink which is very disheartening. This is the type of place I would return to for 1 drink to take photos. Otherwise I wouldn’t return. I also work in hospitality so I know when I’m not receiving 5 star service. Still very disappointed.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Came here with a group of friends for a birthday celebration, we mostly drank but enjoyed some small bites. It was nice and super cute. We came on a Tuesday so it wasn't busy. Nice place to take pictures and have a girls night

Name: Desiree
Review: Overrated, overpriced. Save your money and and check out other local bars

Name: EmilyN
Review:
Overall enjoyable. Went around 4:30 and the outside portion was already closed. Didn’t feel like we got the full experience 
Food was very tasty, was hard to get refills of water and for some reason mid meal they took our napkins 
I would, however recommend going for a quick drink and app

Name: AudreyR
Review: We had a FANTASTIC time at brunch! We had a few group members that were not 21, so we opted for a Sunday brunch. The atmosphere is unlike anything else, the food prices are typical for the area, service was friendly. Great experience!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Hello,

Now that the world is changing I would’ve expected to see some vegan options on the menu. I asked if I could add a side of spinach and mushroom and was told no. I didn’t make a fuss. Overall my friend enjoyed her experience being it was her first time. She took lots of pics and became a influencer overnight hehe. Thanks so much.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Made a brunch reservation for my 40th Birthday- mentioned that in the booking, gave us terrible table in back away from the pretty decor we came for :( menu is limited, bar food, gimmicky, and all plastic plates and cups were dirty. My plastic martini glass came with someone else’s lipstick stain 😢 probably a great bar for drinks but would suggest for food or in day light

Name: FrancescaS
Review: Really cool bar really good strong drinks and really awesome music and we sat at our table exactly at the reserve time they did also did take into consideration the note that I had to sit near the carousel for my birthday very nice!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
All hype for me, place is undeniably beautiful however is not a place to dine.
They only have appetizers, this is a place for drink and appetizers.

Name: JordaniaJ
Review: I went for my 21st birthday. I love the vibe and the way the place is decorated. The only thing I recommend is to go for drinks because they don’t have that much food options.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Place is overrated,  poor customer service waitress was not attentive

Name: VanessaR
Review: Social media pictures are a complete illusion. The place is lame

Name: CoriV
Review: The place is so nice & very aesthetically pleasing but the food I had was just alright.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The place is kitch and an arrogant host. The food is bad and costs more than it should.

Name: diannae
Review: The food my friends and I ordered had wayyyyy too much salt on it. Toooo much salt. Stop cooking with all that salt. My friend couldn’t even eat her food because of it. And The drinks tasted water down.

Name: AgusMoya
Review: The rooftop is beautiful. The waitress are very nice and helpful but the security guard was rude and he made me experience an awful moment.

Name: SheronB
Review: This is a must see! I can be a tourist trap, but it is worth a visit. The views are astounding, the food standard American cuisine, with a sweet tooth twist. This is a very girlie location and perfect for selfies!! This is a must see. Loved it in the winter months, I can't wait to visit once it's warm outside.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Went for my birthday and they didn’t disappoint

Name: MD2020
Review: We celebrated my daughter's 21st birthday and had an awesome time.  Great service, very attentive staff, from the time we walked in until we left!  Loved the decorations, perfect for picture taking - the carousel was very cute.  Drinks were good, and the bar/finger food was a great match to the vibe.

Name: GarethA
Review: Hyped up but disappointed! The staff were non-existent when we went past the guys at the lift (who were all lovely)   so took a while before being shown to our table (the staff member  who was a young guy who liked F1 was friendly) we ordered a drink each (an ice queen cocktail and a peroni beer) took some pics and left, shame there wasn't an open rooftop section to see the nightsky 👎🏼 Don't think I'd recommend here, it's ok for a bar but nothing special and not worth the reservation.

Name: IankaM
Review: Service was slow even whith so many empty tables. Drinks weren’t that good, they even gave ys stomachache. Food was salty.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I went on a Sunday whit my daughter to celebrate my birthday. Service was very poor, the place was almost empty and we were seated almost behind the bar. We order the famous pancakes they were dry no flavor in them, the waiter didn’t even ask us before the plate was removed what was wrong, the busser came to pick up the plates I told him about the food and his answer was everyone liked those, took the plates and left, empty table no drinks we were done and 20 minutes after was when the waiter came to us and ask if everything was fine I told her what happen whit the food she just says I tell the kitchen and I ask for the check she game the check and left. No sorry, she didn't care. All the plates and glassware are plastic they look dirty.

Name: SaanaH
Review:
I came for a birthday brunch. My party and I were running late and I called and was told no worries. When we got there we were sitting waiting for at least 10 minutes before a server came over and immediately told us we had 15 minutes to order because it was approaching 3:30 and she also told us we had until 4pm.

We started asking questions about substitutions on the menu and without asking the chef we were told no and she came back to tell us they could accommodate it.

Once our food came she rushed over to let us know that she would be cashing us out soon. The bill came soon after. We paid the bill and never saw our server again.

We had a bunch of food piled up on the table a few of my friends wanted another round of drinks but didn’t have anyone to ask.

A manager came over when my friends realized I never received the birthday dessert they asked for. He was so rude. Instead of listening to what they were saying he mentioned the donuts we ordered and paid for. I’m not sure why our experience was so horrible because I didn’t witness any other tables being rushed and they came in after we did.

I would never return.

Name: AlexisM
Review: I made the reservation for my birthday. I put on my reservation that it was my birthday TWICE. Once got seated our waiter acted scared to even get us started. I ordered the pink pancakes, didn’t receive the sparkles or when they pour the syrup over the cotton candy. I was very sad about that. Then we told her it was my birthday she was just like “ okay “ then 10 minutes later wants to bring out a sparkle. It just wasn’t the experience I wanted / expected.

Name: JohnR
Review: Fun place with beautiful views. Food is underwhelming.

Name: LauraB
Review: Picked this bar because I’d had seen it did a Harry Potter theme previously, but that is no more.  There wasn’t really anything magical about it at all.  Drinks were ok/pretty good, bites were just easy bar food.  All in all, just mediocre.

Name: Bklyn
Review: Definitely pay more for the experience, as the drinks were pricey. We didn't order food, but the service was great and the DJ played good music

Name: VernieY
Review: This place is great for a drink and photos. Food choices is limited and over priced.

Name: Herstory
Review: Cute venue and atmosphere. Great dj’s and delicious food. Friendly staff.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Underwhelming service. The drinks very very mediocre with a large price tag. Good to go once for the decor but the staff made no efforts to make the experience enjoyable. And unless you are sitting at the carousel or one of the booths directly next to the large decorations, there really is no appeal.

Name: vala
Review: The waitress was extremely rude and took a while to attend to our needs

Name: CatherineP
Review: Super expérience, ambiance extraordinaire, service génial. Endroit parfait pour un 5@7 branché hiver comme été!

Name: Christy
Review: Definitely overrated, every drink we wanted they didnt have. Not much of a food selection. Seating was horrible. Muggy inside. The wait for the elevator was long. My excitement for this place went straight out the window. Would never go back.

Name: Rachele
Review:
B E A U T I F U L! 
EVERY THINGS WAS WONDERFUL!
PINK CHRISTMAS TREE ❤️

Name: Lauryn
Review: Definitely was not what I was expecting. The music was terrible and not up to date. The food was very mediocre with small portions and not many options to choose from. My friends and I could not wait to leave and go somewhere else. The only good thing I can say is that the space was pretty and comfortable and the waitress was very nice.

Name: DanW
Review: Totally a good spot to stop for a drink before a show, very nightlife vibe but worth a trip.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Over priced place for something super simple didn’t mind the price but expected something nice drinks for around $20 just for a glass of champagne.

Name: LLJBKNYC
Review: Food was good, drink was better (bubbly something). It’s all about the decor.

Name: AshlynF
Review: Overall experience was great. Very accommodating staff. Food a little overpriced for small portions (also not many vegetarian options) but you’re definitely paying for the experience, location and overall atmosphere. Loved this place. Probably favorite stop from my vacation to NY!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very cool decor as you walk in. Staff was very slow to collect order and they were out of their highly advertised drinks. Did not order food so I cannot rate or comment on that.

Name: Belen
Review: Excellent service, super kind and attentive waitress. Great music and vibe.

Name: AdrianaC
Review: Great cocktails and ambiance excellent place to take nice pictures our waitress was attentive and professional, food can be better

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The service was great. Fast and efficient. The food was hot and tasty. Drinks were good. Music was decent. But don’t go for the ambiance. It’s a one IG moment.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Atmosphere was cute.  Got sick after eating there though.

Name: Pauliev1965
Review: Had Brunch on New Year’s Day. Place is nice but nothing like the pictures on their website. it was 50 degrees out and roof was open which was cool. Our server was an Asian young lady that needs a course in restaurant service. The only words out of her mouth were, are you ready to order and here’s your check. $45 for pancakes and cotton candy was a major ripoff. Wouldn’t go back anytime soon.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Went on NEw Years day for my daughter 10th bday. Upon entering nice and smooth everyone was nice polite great. Sat down at table no one came for 30 min had to ask girl who seated us to get the server smh Once she came she didn’t know the menu told us things we couldn’t order but really we could. She also said 3 people  called out and understaffed smh Ordered drinks and food. The food did come fast and was Luke warm smh My salad was horrible lettuce not cut but steak was good. TbH I’m shocked they are serving the salad like that smh could have made better at home. Then we told server it was my daughters bday she brings out cotton candy and says happy birthday. We wanted candle at least So she brings out cupcake with sparklers and says happy bday no song nothing smh Besides ambiance this is not worth the hype food was trash. Would only come for pics and dessert. Never come for a bday smh I’m soooo disappointed we traveled from CT for this

Name: Tqhb
Review:
We went for the brunch on Sunday.
It is Overrated. Not worth. The pictures on the website gave the impression of a grandiose view, it is just great.
And a strange bad smell close to the bar and to our tables.

Name: InezM
Review: More salty options would be great! Drinks were awesome - day was cloudy but service was nice

Name: MichelleD
Review: We were there for the weekend brunch. This review is based on that. Have never been there when it is in bar mode.

Name: DonSimondo
Review: A bit ‘Meh’. More style than substance. It has so much potential though.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I was charged $30 because they couldn't find my reservation and I was present

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The place is really cute and the staff at coat check deserves a raise ! We appreciated the fact that they put a generous amount of alcohol in their cocktails. The music is a little too loud and they need to re-do their playlist and their pig in a blanket is advertised like wagyu but it feels like something you can find in the frozen isle of your local grocery store. Overall good tho!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The server was rude

Name: Ale1
Review: My friends and I had a great time here at Magic for our Christmas dinner! Will definitely return to celebrate my birthday ❤️

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Nothing special at all.

Name: Tess182
Review: The ambiance is amazing!  Both the Apres Ski and the Berry drink were tasty.  Small menu, but the shrimp tacos, fries, sliders, gauc and chicken sandwich were good. I would definitely go again!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Superbe ambiance avec de très bons cocktails et un décor ludique

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: My experience was honestly horrible I’d give 0 stars if I could

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was very underwhelming. The photos online were much nicer than it looks in person. Limited menu and $45 for pink pancakes, $23 for 2 sliders and $14 for glitter donuts with no glitter. Drinks were very sweet. Overall we were disappointed.

Name: Fani
Review:
To be honest i was a bit underwhelmed with my experience at Magic Hour. I have been wanting to visit this place for so long but it didn't match the hype. 
Drinks were cool, sliders cool, smores were cute . 
And i got a few cool photo ops

Name: StevefromBoston
Review: A beautiful rooftop oasis in midtown. Great decor and view. Service was prompt and friendly. DJ was great and although the music was loud my 66 year old ears were still able to carry in and hear a conversation. The drinks were creative and delicious. Great place for late night stop for all over 21.

Name: DalvinP
Review: Very pretty inside and great ambiance; however, the mixed drinks were not good and the food is not worth the money. Great place to hang out and just enjoy the basics.

Name: TOrecruiter
Review: Loud but fun and photo worthy, festive environment

Name: Nicki
Review: Nie wieder, es stinkt wie in einer Kneipe, der bier Geruch ist extrem. Billigstes Getränk 17$ wo nur Eis drin ist. Bedienung könnte freundlicher und aufmerksamer sein. Es sieht nicht so aus wie auf den Fotos! Fail

Name: AlbertL
Review: Overall awesome place with an  amazing view of the Empire State building, which was lit with Christmas colors when we were there. Fun, upbeat atmosphere, beautifully decorated and an amazing carousel with 4 cozy seats perfect for a quick picture when not being used as a reserved table. The menu was limited and the food was just ok, definitely overpriced but you've gotta eat to sit on the carousel side. Drinks were good and you are limited to 90 min. once seated.  Would definitely recommend because it's such a cool place with a speakeasy vibe getting up to the top. We loved it

Name: AJR80
Review: It was a fabulous experience overall.  Everyone was super friendly.  The music, food, and drinks were fantastic.  The ambience and decor was top notch.  We loved the “pink” everything at Christmas.

Name: Loli
Review:
Over rated rooftop with expensive drinks and terrible small bites
Not worth it

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Was so excited to go and see the hype, the Christmas decorations were only at the front area and we were sat around the corner behind the bar, we were beyond disappointed!  I don’t normally leave reviews but this was the biggest waste of time, the food would have been better at McDonald’s.
While trying to eat and enjoy my drink, all I could smell was a dirty bin smell wafting past. The smell came from all the rubbish behind the bar right next to us.
The staff matched the rest of this place, I would highly recommend to avoid this experience especially if you don’t have time to waste. I saw other mixed reviews and gave them the benefit of the doubt, big mistake!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I was expecting so much more! It was just blah. The drinks were t great. The food options are limited. I wouldn’t go back or spend money to reserve here again.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was great.

Name: jamm
Review: Pretty decor and view, limited menu and service was okay. Good came out quick but had to wait for drinks

Name: JulienT
Review: Go there for drinks and instagram content, not for the food

Name: KLBaze
Review: Excellent service and the food and drinks (especially the drinks) were PHENOMINAL!

Name: Agxx
Review:
Christmas evening, wasn’t all I thought it would be. Table was reserved but wasn’t a good speck.
Service was minimal.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Horrible….service from the door to the waitress completely rude, angry and dry. Unwelcoming at every level. Good wayyyyy over priced. Menu nothing to brag about. Surprised what the mindset is in regard to customer service.

Name: ElenaF
Review: It was the most beautiful experience I have there. I got my engagement ring there beautiful moments. We are planning to get married on Valentine's day 02/14/2023. I we can come back on the day we get married. I love it here

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Completely over priced basic food. Venue looked nothing like the website.

Name: AAJ129
Review: Service wasn’t good. Our server never came to the table. We didn’t get a drink refill till we asked for one, when we asked for our check. The pancake tower was cute but the pancakes were dry and no flavor. They hyped up the place in pictures and in person, it falls flat. Every worker was looking down at their phones and not welcoming. This is a pass, save your money.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I was celebrating Christmas with my fiancée. Although I loved the Pink Frosted theme, I was unaware of the other contents in the atmosphere. I was told the food was delicious so I wanted to check it out. The food was okay but could’ve been way better. The service was great so that helped.

Name: ANAH
Review: Don’t like the low tables to eat…very uncomfortable. The brunch menu is overrated. A place just to take pictures and drink some cocktails.

Name: BUSINESS
Review: Great time, wonderful service for a great Christmas meal.

Name: NeeNee
Review: Loved it. Wish they gave the option of separate bills. That's my only issue.

Name: PRsky80
Review: Nothing like the pictures online. Too much hype. Staff looked like they didn’t want to be there. Only friendly staff was the bouncer and girl downstairs.

Name: NinaB
Review: Nice view! service was nice. no vegan food. Dinks are very good

Name: AngiJ
Review: We sat at our table for almost 30 minutes before being served. $18 for pretzels was ridiculous! The decor was nice

Name: StephanieM
Review: Average experience. Horrible customer service. Guy at the entrance threatened to not let us into the restaurant because we mistakenly entered through the side of the rope instead of the center.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Overall I had a great experience. I took my daughter out for brunch on Christmas Eve. Great vibes, great music, great food and the services from the actual hostess and servers were great. Great place for photo ops as well. My only issue was, and I’m not gonna take away from the place itself but I didn’t really like the bouncer/security guard that was out front. Seemed like he had an attitude but other than that everything else was great. Bouncer should be a little more pleasant with people visiting the spot.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We had an amazing time at magic hour rooftop bar and lounge, the drinks were amazing, food was delicious and service was great! Will definitely be going back!

Name: GennaM
Review: Cute,but pricey. Decent food, understaffed servers but they were really nice. Better decoration for the winter season.

Name: ArthurM
Review: We spent a really good time there, really good services

Name: Anita
Review: Except for our waitress, the staff was quite unfriendly.  Definitely not happy in their work.  Cocktails were very good, but pricey.  Music was ridiculously loud.  Fun for a novelty, but won’t repeat.

Name: KirstenD
Review: Great experience and beautiful decorations

Name: DEEDEE
Review: Honestly I was expecting more from this restaurant. I’m from Georgia and the marketing and advertisement of this place is great, however the food was cold and hard. Just getting to the rooftop was a complicated and draining process. Overall I enjoyed the ambiance and drinks.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Came for birthday, nice ambisnce.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Turned up and was told our reservation for two was going to be 20 minutes late and did we want to sit on the carousel. We said sure and was told to check in upstairs. There was no one at the desk upstairs and no one to greet or assist us so we sat down on the carousel. Within a couple of minutes, we decided that the carousel wouldn’t be appropriate for drinks and food and tried to get the attention of a staff member to ask to move. No one bothered even giving us eye contact. We saw a couple of tables that were free so we sat down at one table for 2, still hoping to catch the attention of someone. Was ignored for a whole 20 minutes until a very rude staff member came and starting saying we needed a reservation to be there. She talked over me and refused to listen to the fact that I did indeed have a reservation and was barking at me the fact that I’d be charged for sitting at the table I was at. She went and got what appeared to be the manager who was even more rude (which I didn’t think was possible) who was yelling saying that I should’ve come to see her to check in for my table. I tried to explain that there was no one at the desk and that I hadn’t even seen her for 20 minutes but this was something that she clearly couldn’t understand. We finally established that I did in fact have a reservation and I could stay put on the 2 person table that we’d sat down. We decided to leave due to the appalling customer service. A shame as we had booked this months ago and this was our first night in New York after arriving from New Zealand after a gruelling 20 odd hour journey. Wouldn’t recommend.

Name: KaterinaG
Review:
Bartender doesn’t know how to
Mix drinks. They were awful. The server was absent we waited half hour for her to come to our table. Food was pretty okay for bar food. The carousel is what makes the place.

Name: Trini
Review: Overpriced finger foods and cheap desserts ! Needs more of a food selection . Only great because of the decorative experience.

Name: MarissaC
Review: It was an amaizing experience really loved it, definitely will come back

Name: Surprisebirthday
Review: The food and alcohol is wayyyy overpriced and not even that great! Food was not filling. It’s overhyped. Waiters force you to buy a overpriced drink/ food. Def not worth it. Save your money and go eat at a reasonable priced place with actual good food.

Name: Callie1234
Review: Great setting but service was terrible. It was my birthday and i wasn't acknowledged. Won't be going back again.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The food at magic hour it was the biggest rip off ever. Powdered donuts $14 for two of them ridiculous. It only had one photo up area so it was very hard to get a turn.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I stopped at Magic Hour after catching a play in the city & had a fantastic time. The ambiance & decorations were insta-worthy & extravagant. The drinks were also incredible. Definitely try the spiked hot chocolate.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Had to wait 20 minutes to use the elevator to get upstairs. The hot chocolate was white, not pink. In general, the aesthetics did not match what was advertised; I was expecting be immersed in a pink, wintery setting, and there was only one pink/wintery display. There was also a private party in the area of the gondola, so this was inaccessible.

Name: Kate
Review: All of the food and drinks were way too sweet and everything was overpriced.

Name: CoCoH
Review: They need a bigger & better selection of food & drinks. There was only 1 elevator so we had to wait in a line to up & to come down which is a total fire hazard. Things that were advertised online weren’t available. The golf course was extremely small compared to the images that you get online. The carousel was cute but we couldn’t take pictures because it has people dining there which was weird

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Drinks are great food was good and played great music

Name: Chloe
Review: service was terrible, food was terrible and very over priced. Drinks were fine but definitely not worth their price. The view was the only decent thing about the entire experience. Do not recommend at all and will not be returning

Name: Micheled
Review:
Very overpriced for the service. 
Food was good. Drinks fair.
Service not good. Would n't go back.

Name: AlliB3797
Review: The restaurant was absolutely beautiful! The food was decent. The music was way too loud. We were a foot away from each other and couldn’t hear. Service was not great. Everyone was pretty rude, like they’d rather be doing anything else other than working. Employees were definitely picky about who they were nice to (young attractive people). Not sure if I’d come back again myself, but I’d probably recommend it to my college aged friends.

Name: ChandaraG
Review: Loved the ambiance of the place, the decor was amazing. Service and staff were very attentive overall perfect experience!

Name: GinaC
Review: The ambiance was cute in one corner but did not look the same overall as it does online. Only serves finger foods.

Name: amandaallaround
Review: Really lovely winter experience and the staff was great. Highly recommend.

Name: JenniferK
Review: I have been to quite a few rooftop bars in NY and this by far was the worst experience.  Room smelled. Food horrible and drinks lack luster.  Ambience was totally lack luster.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I live in DE and I took my boyfriend here for date night, something different for both of us! He said it was the best date he’d ever been on! Great vibe, good food and good music! We loved everything they had to offer.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Too noisy, decor was not that nice, food was so so

Name: WilliamM
Review: 47$ dollars for a plate of pink pancakes was absurd.  The décor in the corner was very cute. But the overall ambiance wasn't that great (inside) just felt like a bar with a few undecorated white Christmas trees.  Could use better music or a DJ.

Name: JassmineR
Review: I really had a wonderful time. I took my daughter there for her 14th birthday and she really had a good time. Everything was amazing.

Name: CindyR
Review: Food was definitely mid. My daughter had the honey chicken sandwich and it was dripping in honey then became very spicy she couldn't even eat it.  I got the sliders and very inconsistent.  One was super salty ,the other salty and the last no flavor. Not worth the money spent. The only thing that was good was the carousel . Very pretty.

Name: AngelicaN
Review: The food is over priced and is not worth it. They over cooked my steak twice, the pancakes were trash. Only good thing was the drinks the music was OK. The serve was not memorable at all and i had to wave her down to order my food and drinks.

Name: BruceM
Review: Open table let me make a reservation for this place, but they didn’t even serve food after 1am.

Name: Jimi
Review: Music was a bit too loud and the food was a bit pricey for the value.

Name: AnnaM
Review: Great Holiday Drinks. Love the photo ops!! Great music

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The place was amazing, the food delicious, I love the meal 🙏🏾😍

Name: LizzieJohnny203
Review: Great experience. So much fun. Great atmosphere. Great drinks and food. A fun day out!

Name: DoreenH
Review:
Highly anticipated visit was rather flat and lack luster
All hype no substance

Name: Boston
Review: We saw so many great pictures and reviews but we were very disappointed... the side you can take pictures on was closed for an event and it wasn't as expected.

Name: PParker
Review: Super relaxing. Served in a timely manner even with an even going on I'm the other wing. Really good sliders.

Name: Dree
Review: Place was decorated nicely. Right side was much more decorated and festive than the left side. They don’t ask where you’d like to sit so we had to share a bigger lounge area with another party. The food is not great at all. They are basically heated up finger foods. The waiting staff was very attentive and the drinks were real delicious. I’d say go for the decor and drinks if that’s you’re thing, but don’t go in expecting a great meal.

Name: NISHID
Review:
Outstanding!  Best bar in NYC!!
Stunning decor and definitely a memorable experience!

Name: Emily
Review: This place was a disaster. There is one room that is decorated as advertised, the other is not at all. The service was AWFUL - we had to chase our waiter down about 6 different times to get more water, remind her about something she missed on an order, and more. We ordered the s'mores (it was 3 of us) for $21 which came with 2 s'mores to make, which is fine, but our waiter should have at least asked us if we wanted an extra graham cracker and marshmallow for the 3rd person? We eventually did ask and it was another $8. Whatever, just pretty offensively priced for a MARSHMALLOW and graham cracker, which btw were neither pink nor frosted as advertised on the menu. Overall, would definitely spend your money elsewhere. This is a classic place that looked cool on social media and was a massive disappointment.

Name: Chrisd
Review: Horrible service/experience . Waited over 30 minutes for a server then didn’t get water until food came.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Servicio al cliente fatal. Reserve con 3 semanas de anterioridad, mucha emoción por visitar el lugar. Al llegar y ser sentados, estuvimos sin ser atendidos por NADIE como por unos 25 minutos y varios del personal ni siquiera preguntaron si deseábamos algo. Decidimos irnos. Rooftop de decoración muy bonita, más nada.

Name: josy
Review: Bad service, you have to chase after your servers. The food and drinks are ok but overpriced. Basically just a nice photo-op with mid food and drinks.

Name: StephanieB
Review: The hype on social media was more than the experience

Name: KatieD
Review: Great venue to visit while in New York. Had the best time, food quick service and lovely drinks

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: F Our cups were dirty. We requested new cups and still receive dirty cups. The pancakes were so dry. We had watered down orange juice. The best part was just the look of the restaurant

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We traveled to NYC to celebrate the holiday season and this was the perfect festive stop! From the entrance, to the carousel, to the food. Loved every second! Can not wait to go back!!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Food was absolutely terrible. Overpriced and poor flavor. Drinks we okay at best. Service was sub par but I don’t think that is entirely her fault. She literally was the only one with a huge area. She was kind and nice.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great service, great food, great dj ! Amazing atmosphere ! You won’t be disappointed !

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I really enjoyed myself was able to accommodate us for an earlier reservation had an awesome time

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Honestly this place was way more hyped up than it needed to be. Only thing I was truly satisfied w is the fact that I asked for a carousel seat & they did honor that request. However these carousel booths are literally made for someone 5’2 or smaller. On top of that, I only chose this place based on things they were advertising like their s’mores dessert plate & their donuts, didn’t have either of those. Asked for the hot chocolate w tequila, they lazily have it already batched w vodka. Asked for some fun creative drink then instead w tequila & I got a basic red drink that tasted only like the pomegranate mixer they put in it. Plus, I know it was cold out but at least someee type of airflow. I was under the impression this was a partially open rooftop & they just had plastic shades all over the place obstructing what’s supposed to be part of a rooftop venue experience, the view. Only ended up w 2 drinks & 4 shots & the bill was almost $200. Don’t waste your money!

Name: Florcita22
Review: De vacaciones, disfrutar el momento

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The scene was phenomenal. Very gorgeous setting. Music choice was upbeat. Serving staff and service was friendly. Prices outrageous for extremely small portions which seems to be common across New York City. Would go again but would budget better for raised prices and minimal options.

Name: Lucky
Review: This is nice spot to gather with friends! And take cute pictures

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Fun in NYC!

Name: MicheleP
Review: Beautiful decorations, super music, very fun a must!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We came up here from Atlanta to experience brunch for my birthday

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I went for my daughter’s 18th birthday.  I think it is more for the photo op than the food.

Name: MelissaJ
Review: Nothing like TikTok video one place for the winter wonderland ambience and rest was just seating.  Food was good but drinks were meh.

Name: MaribelR
Review: Pictures and description of holiday decor is misleading. We were looking for a lounge that was highly decorated for Christmas for the holiday vibe and that is not what we experienced.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: First time here for cocktails and dessert. I must say I was pretty disappointed and dissatisfied. The drinks tasted so bad that my entire group asked to send them back. Not once, but twice. I am usually not a picky customer but the drinks were so terrible we did not even finish nor hardly drink them. While exiting the bar the bouncer used vulgar language and yelled at us instead of redirecting us in a professional manner. I am saddened to give this review but had to warn others that just because it looks nice on social media it is not worth your time or money.

Name: HCDinesOut
Review: Festive decor; drinks and appetizers were good not amazing! They give you 90 minutes for a table but manager asked us to leave after 69 minutes for another reservation. Thought that was pretty rude!!

Name: MichelleB
Review: Great atmosphere! Very unique!

Name: tammyesco
Review: Be prepared to check “large” bags - including work totes. And then go in a circle to exit. It’s all very “extra” for a basic restaurant/bar.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very nice for drinks and maybe some appetizers, but the apps are just okay. Ambience is super nice though! Great for pics!

Name: Bill
Review: Ignored by staff, loud, dry sliders that I couldn't eat.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The decor was so cute and the drinks were so good but the customer service needed some work. Not friendly. We made a resveration for when

Name: Phil
Review:
Not as much in terms of decoratiom as expected. Went for the ski lodge aesthetic as had been on their IG and was surprised to see a only few white Christmas trees dotted about apart from the carousel, which was gorgeous but a bit gimmicky. 
Service was fantastic and the curly fries were delicious but we left after 1 drink as was underwhelming and not worth the expensive drinks.

Name: Reviewer
Review: The decor was NOTHING like as advertised. They're very strict with their reservation timing, so be prepared to get kicked out, even rudely once your time is up. I've been here before, and had the same experience. It doesn't matter whether you are spending money or not. The food is definitely a very slightly elevated bar food, and the drinks are mediocre for the price. I thought I'd give this place another chance from my first experience there, but it's still as not worth the visit as the first time.

Name: Jaynie
Review: Worst service ever experienced. Our server tried to get us to pay the bill after 30 minutes because a private event was coming in, although was never told when making a reservation for that time. Overpriced and horrible service!

Name: KayleighM
Review:
Came here on a Sunday night for a 10pm reservation, when we ordered we was informed 3 drinks were unavailable all of which were the apres ski specials. When you are promoting these so much on social media I would expect there to have been a bigger order made of them.  
The venue it’s self is beautiful, we was seated by the carousel but again we was unable to go outside as it had been shut off.  
The venue closes at 12pm but we was asked for last orders at 11pm and the ambience drops as everyone feels rushed out. 
This is a beautiful venue just a shame it’s maybe not as magical as promoted online.

Name: Happy
Review: Staff indifferent, slow service.  They were out of Prosecco and Rose which are in several of their signature cocktails.  Only one guy there really seemed to care about customer experience (believe he was a manager).

Name: Samuel
Review: Dirty, sticky. Not at all like the pictures. Drinks are awful.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Amazing location and view!!!!  Food was a so

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We arrived and there were only 3 items on the menu available. Waitress stated because it was near the end of the week they were low on food, this was a Sunday. Due to items not being available I had the curly fries, they were extremely crunchy, my friend had the chicken sandwich…2.5/5. I requested to order the chicken sandwich after hers came out and the waitress said “we have no more chicken sandwiches” we ended up going to the 99 cent pizza spot for food. Super disappointed.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Why was I charged 30 for the table. No waitress.   Had to flag someone down.  Overall. Yes cute place but no worth the money

Name: NickR
Review: Wish the menu was bigger for food items and also bigger portions for the prices they were at. I know it’s NYC but it’s the same food everywhere.

Name: DinaF
Review: I love this place. Shrimp tacos were amazing but really the atmosphere and and drinks are what really makes this place so awesome. I’ve been here in the spring when fully decorating in pink roses and also for Christmas with all white Cory trees and crystals and all pink lighting. A beautiful place to have a girls night out. You won’t be disappointed

Name: Marie
Review: This place is definitely the place to go to if you want a good photo opportunity. But our service was terrible. We only saw our waitress when we ordered food and when she gave us the check. She never checked in on us. The bus boys were absolutely amazing on the other hand. They constantly checked on us and made sure we had what we needed. They even fixed our order when our order was wrong and food was undercooked.

Name: ClarkC
Review: Love the pink ski theme and decor but wow, Terrible food At expensive prices.  Not with it.  The bakery below had WAY better food.  Drinks were plain, do not order the Bloody Mary, you will be disappointed.

Name: traveler
Review: Magic hour is unique. It reminds me of a bar with some small plates. For the people complaining about portions this isn’t a steak house. This place is intended for drunks and small plates and has desserts. It’s supposed to be fun and photogenic. Go on their instagram to get the idea. The drinks were strong and looked pretty,  they have a couple different spots for photo opps which are pretty. It’s not a huge place but a beautiful view. We had the spicy chicken sandwich which was  great and the brunch breakfast. The only complaint If I had one was that the donuts were dull. I was expecting a better presentation

Name: JessicaK
Review: We were a bachelorette party and had an amazing time!! The music was phenomenal and drinks were all great! The service was also outstanding. Would highly recommend

Name: Layla
Review: The vibe was really nice. Go for a few drinks and the ambiance but eat somewhere else before. My partner has a nut allergy and it was a bit difficult getting that across to the staff. Otherwise, for pictures, a great atmosphere and cute decor it’s a 10/10

Name: Karen
Review: Smaller than images lead you to believe but beautiful and fun. Expensive drinks but you pay for the ambiance. Pink is the word this holiday season!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Awful place, music so loud you can't hear each other, tables crammed together at the edge of a dancefloorr. People standing waiting for a drink  literally touching your table. Waited 25 minutes to even get acknowledged by a waitress. People next to us had food served then had to wait another 10 minutes till they got cutlery by which time their food was cold.  We left after having one drink as couldnt stand it any longer then had to queue for 15 minutes to leave waiting for the lift. Honestly the worse place I have been in NY

Name: LaurenC
Review: No vegan options. It’s year 2022 they need to get with the program. We aren’t in the 90’s anymore 🤭

Name: LeenahH
Review: Place was eh

Name: AnaT
Review: Excellent service,  good food,  great vibes! Sadly the gold section was closed son we couldnt go take pictures.

Name: Christina
Review: We ordered the Apres Ski which was delicious, the ice queen, which was a little sour, berry bubbly, which was good and the Mr Pink, if you like a Smokey taste than you’ll love this drink. Everything is overpriced but the drinks were strong. Ambience was amazing, our waitress was not. I had to go up to the bar to order drinks bc she rarely came around.

Name: JenniferA
Review: Very disappointing! Should have listened to hotel staff who gave recommendations and warned us it was not worth it.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Absolutely must b on your list.. Great atmosphere for date night, girls night, and picture opportunities.. Its decorated seasonally and so beautifully..

Name: BocaBest
Review: Ambiance is fun, decorated for the holidays, energetic vibe, very loud. You go for the ambiance, not the food which was overpriced and subpar.

Name: SydneyS
Review: Although the ambiance was beautiful. this establishment was terrible. When we arrived, we were greeted by a hostess but a group of (obviously tipsy) individuals were at our table. The hostess asked them to move (which they did), but encouraged us to sit down without wiping the table down, and when we asked someone to do so we received an attitude. Sorry, I’m not sitting at a dirty table. Not only was the service terrible, the staff was blatantly racist and unconcerned. We were told from others that the service was terrible and racism was obvious but wanted to give the place a chance. We were placed in a corner and disregarded the entire time. I would never recommend for anyone to consider this place. After 30 minutes of being ignored, we decided to leave. Imagine going to a place for a celebration just for the staff to ruin everything? Unacceptable and unbelievable. This place is more concerned about appearance than the actual service to customers - especially those that are native to NYC and not tourists.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great atmosphere. Drinks were good. Only had the chips and guacamole. Other food was pub style food.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was alright. I asked for a specific location in my reservation when I emailed never got a reply.

Name: StephanieO
Review: Nice experience- friendly folks checking you in. Wait staff kind but slow. AMBIANCE- it’s great to drop in get one drink and get your photos and get out! If you want more than one round- you’ll be waiting a long while for the drinks to actually come out.  But- order it all on that first order- including food- and you’ll be golden!

Name: TaraF
Review: The drinks were trash. They all tasted medicinal and were flat out gross. Service was slow and we were there after 9pm on a weekday so it wasn't busy.

Name: JacquiD
Review: Fun atmosphere with yummy drinks!  Very fun for Christmas mood!

Name: ayeletk
Review:
Went for my friends bachelorette party. Was incredibly happy the drinks were outstanding, the setup service. 

Soo happy

Name: KajaV
Review:
Overprice for poor Food.
No view.
Tourist trap, 
The drink was okay byt not worth 20 dollars

Name: FancySandye
Review: Magic Hour was Magical as always. We loved and enjoyed the ambiance.

Name: GillianD
Review: Food was overly expensive for what it was - basically burger joint food for inflated price. Cocktail was only 3/4 full and looked terrible. Waiting staff were lovely and ambience was lovely but the food and drink isn't worth the price

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Excellent!!!

Name: EmmanuelC
Review: Cute place and good drinks, nothing more than that.

Name: Deedee21708
Review: Definitely the place to be for reat photo ops and to get in the holiday spirit! Amazing views of the Empire state building and love that the roof is retractable! Beautifully decorated and the ambiance was very nice. Great music, good service and delicious (but very expensive) drinks! We loved the pink s'mores and the chips with guac. The chicken sandwiches were so hot we couldn't eat them, so we were a little dissappointed we couldn't eat our man meal. Overall, highly recommend for the ambiance and views alone!

Name: RvRod
Review:
We came for brunch to celebrate birthday. Great location and great views of NYC.

A bit pricey but worth it for special Ocassions

Name: jasonp
Review:
Dirty place ,worst food ever 
Overpriced rubbish and nothing like it’s webpage

Avoid  avoid avoid

Name: kayla
Review: It’s a nice place to go to but we waited pretty long for our food

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Gorgeous place. Decent food. Drinks were a little underwhelming, but I personally was expecting more of a craft cocktail experience. The drinks were good just didn’t seem to match the level of intricacy that you’d expect from such an elaborate space.

Name: ShadaeB
Review: Honestly the view and decorations are beautiful, the food is horrible and very salty, they need a better menu. The DJ was so boring he basically played elevator music.

Name: Michelle
Review: Over rated. Trying to be cool  with the black paint hallways , but not.  Drinks served in plastic glasses  and  too expensive for what you get.  Tacky place

Name: Jewels
Review: I went for my birthday. I got the rose drink it was very pretty. I got sliders and fries. I got the s’mores and roasted them at the table

Name: LisaE
Review: Really disappointing. Overpriced drinks, mediocre food. Ordered the hot pretzels and got 2 bland, Luke warm from the microwave pretzels. Ordered the sparkling donuts, and there were 2 small ones. Not worth the hype.

Name: GuilleP
Review:
The experience was not good. The place smelled like all pubs, the food was not elaborated, and the beer was expensive and came in a can! 

I was expecting much more

Name: anon23231
Review: DO NOT GO! They overcharged my friend and I even though our receipts were for the amount our bill was- when I checked my bank statement the next day they had charged me for the whole bill plus charged her card half! I’ve been trying to get this rectified going on three weeks and they don’t respond! Diners beware of this con!

Name: AmandaM
Review: Amazing outstanding excellent environment safe clean

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: This restaurant costumer service bad  hostesses was a super rude person and the manager is a young person he dont know how to treat costumer no recommend this restaurant ever

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Not my kinda place to be honest. We found the service to be poor and the food was mediocre, seemed to be more focused on a younger crowd. More power to them but we won’t be returning.

Name: Joshua
Review: Nice, lively bar! Fun (verging on tacky) decor with an interesting mix of characters - great spot for people watching! The cocktails were… interesting, I asked for a spicy margarita and instead just got raw tequila which blew my head off in the wrong way! Service was great though, would go back, fun vibe.

Name: BrandeeN
Review: We were very underwhelmed!! I came here with friends for my birthday and I wish we would have went somewhere else! Our waiter and staff was extremely rude!

Name: djh85
Review: What a fun place for Brunch! The service and food were excellent.  A great place to celebrate the winter season.

Name: VictoriaC
Review: Great brunch spot. Sunday funday with a bunch of photo opportunities

Name: CarmenR
Review: Always a vibe! Good food, good service! Great decor.

Name: RachelM
Review: Very tacky decor, full of people taking selfies for Instagram. Expensive prices for not great food, not good service.. had to keep asking again and again for things.

Name: Toni
Review: It was nice but I expected a table. Overpriced but we had fun and drinks were good. Service was good.

Name: Foodiegoddess
Review: As soon as we walked in through the door, we felt uneasy. The bouncer is very stern but polite which is good but the woman checking us in was rude and not being patient. Not with us but the two groups before us. Once we was on the roof - it’s super cute. Definitely meant for pictures for the ladies, great place to do it at. We got our food and I was disappointed with my steak Cesar salad. The steak was hard to chew on (I ordered my steak medium) and the salad was just soggy. NOW THE DRINK! I got the momager and 10/10 I recommend this drink. I wish I could have took the stiletto shoe glass with me! The waitress seemed like she was in a rush and wanted us to get out of there. We had just finished my salad and she came and shoved the check at our table…at that point I was over it and we paid and left.
