I wouldn’t recommend anyone to come here unless you want to take pictures- then it’s worth it but otherwise…go enjoy a roof top gathering some where else.

Name: JosephS
Review: Overpriced. Bad service drinks bad security rude… also had to wait past reservation time

Name: LexiV
Review: Went with my girl thought it was gonna be awful but it was type lit!!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great destination for a photo on a special occasion. Very gimmicky food options that make for very instagramable pictures.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was great overall

Name: larryH
Review: Food basic to bad. Contacting the restaurant is impossible. Wanted to add one more to the group. Cannot call, can only eMail. Never responded. Wait staff was kind and attentive unfortunately that’s often the case. A restaurant you go to offers more. They didn’t.

Name: IanS
Review:
Sent notification beforehand and almost like nobody had even taken any notice of any requests.

Waiting staff were great.

Shame as it’s a nice place.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: La Mejor!!!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I normally don’t make comments, but this was pretty awful service. I was there for a work function and my supplier had picked up the tab and had to leave. As we were finishing up, the staff told us they made a mistake and had brought the wrong bill.. and I was then forced to pick up the tab which was a delta of $50 from what was paid. This was a first for me, pretty disgraceful for a Tao restaurant.

Name: YousraY
Review:
I was really surprised by the place, not like their instagram profile totally different,
At least when u r moving those decorations which made the place fine to visit, 
Make something different, indoor 
That was totally shock for me and my friends 😒

Name: TheTruth
Review: Everything was very Nice, I totally enjoyed it all besides the service. I literally had to get up and find my waitress every time I wanted another drink; only Bummer

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
I had booked a table for 6 for a birthday celebration and the table provided by lousy by the carousel and very small.

Me and my friends requested a better table elsewhere since we wanted to order food and no one helped us eventhough there were empty tables in both the lounge areas.
They were very rude and didnt help with multiple requests and since we couldn’t sit we were taking pictures and in the meantime they moved all our coats and bags to some where else without our permission and later came and said they have reserved that table for someone else now .
Worst service i have experienced even if we requested it was for a celebration!
Never 👎 going to go there again because if the rude service .
The ambiance is beautiful but the people ruined our experience.

Name: LeidyAgu13
Review: Great place, food and ambience 😍 I would go back

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Came to celebrate my birthday here .
service was not very attentive
waiter brought us our champagne & appetizer shortly after being seated and returned to us about 40 minutes later . By then our drinks were past due to have a beverage with my sandwich .
brought it to her attention when she finally approached our table that i was already highly unsatisfied with my service and the performance of a server should be much better than that, she giggles & apologizes to then walk away and still not ask for my order . Shortly after I’m given a different server which wasn’t much better than the first . Lack of training is what seems like . The decor & view of the Empire State Building was the highlight to my night
Other than that the place is highly overrated
And needs better service management.
I really wished my experience here was better

Name: Purple4Na
Review: This is not my first time visiting this venue however my most recent experience has made it my last one!   The food was horrible - over cooked & dehydrated !!  …and all the decorations were off the rotating carousel & adjacent walls… this place is more about the ambience than the food and if you take the ambience away and still give horrible food it’s a no-win both ways!  The managers could care less about accommodating any of our request for seating.  Tried to put 13 of us at a table for eight - Despite our reservation booked well  in advance AND a phone call AND email sent to the venue to confirm.   I’m reaching out to the corporate management group so this doesn’t happen to others!!!  Shame on you!!!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Walk to roof top was great but …..service was not very attentive waiter never checked on table an when we asked for more bread it took so long we already ate everything at the table. Food was bland I was disappointed just wanted the check so we could pay an leave

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great atmosphere and pretty views. The only thing I would say is the music couldn’t have been better

Name: Cookie
Review: I visited this restaurant because of social media hype; however, I was extremely disappointed with the service, food, atmosphere.  It's basically a bar, nothing special.

Name: AlexandraB
Review: Food and drinks were very mediocre. The decor and partial view of the Empire State Building was the best part. It’s nice but definitely over rated.

Name: TopPick
Review: Wish I got to enjoy my food on birthday. Got over charged.

Name: Joselyn
Review: Beautiful view of the city from the rooftop and great drinks

Name: MissWFR
Review: Birthday ocassion

Name: Nicole
Review: Very overpriced and limited menu, the table and seating areas were very small, the quality of the food wasn’t as a I expected and non flavorful.

Name: Isacarolgenlibby
Review: I would appreciate if the website say when they’re in between transition themes. I went on a Saturday and it was bare. It felt off because of the transition process. Magic hour could do better with advising customers.

Name: edlarybeth
Review: Loads of fun, creative drinks! Fun crowd!! Will visit again.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: False advertising with the pictures posted on their site. Servers were rude, wouldn’t recommend

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: They make you check-in bags and even cameras

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: La pase genial. Fui a celebrar mi cumpleaños y todos mis amigos y yo estuvimos felices. Muy buen lugar y servicio

Name: SarahL
Review: Went for my birthday with high expectations based off seeing Tiktok videos.  It was surprisingly underwhelming.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Farewell! Excellent time we had!

Name: AlexandraMacleod
Review: Good food, bad drinks

Name: Simone
Review: Beautiful decor and exotic. Very nice ambiance. The food was delicious, except for the chicken strips, it was very salty. We asked the waitress to changed it, but she didn’t. She stated that since they didn’t get a complaint about the particular dish, she wasn’t allowed to change it. Another than that hiccup, my friends and I enjoyed our night at Magic Hour

Name: JaclynB
Review: This was a really beautiful spot and the view was wonderful. But it's a lot of hoopla for a small roof top bar, like 3 security checks and elevators - it's a bit dramatic. It's not Studio 54.  Also, you can't actually get a person on the phone - they tell you to email and then don't respond to you.

Name: kimberlym
Review:
Great for teen girls and instagramming
Food is blah

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We got there 20 minutes before our reservation time and there was a line outside of probably 20-25 people. We only stood in line for a max of 5 minutes. Our party was 6 people and they put us at a round table ideal for 4 people. They were very accommodating though and gave us another table for extra room. Food was delicious and staff was very pleasant. It was very cute to see young adults, teenagers, and even kids pose on the carousel for their pictures and it did not disrupt our brunch at all.

Name: DxjxnxhB
Review: The vibe was very nice. Good music, great service. It was a lovely experience. Scenery was everything

Name: SpecDining
Review: If your 40 and over crowd not for you ...good place to drop by for appetizers and drinks..

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Came here for my birthday and ambience was incredible! Very busy and packed if you want to take pictures on the carousel. Food was surprisingly great and so were the drinks!

Name: Vidya
Review: Booked for the first time in November for a birthday and it was nice but much more crowded than I expected it to be. The food was okay but the drinks were nice. I would consider going again but at a different time.

Name: LexiC
Review: At the time we got there, our server was very sweet. The menu choices were limited because the time was a little late, I believe. We got the sliders and curly fries which were delicious (drinks are a little over priced). However, It was very dark where we were seated I couldn’t really see the food. The lighting in the restaurant was a little too dark for my liking. I recommend going earlier in the day, especially if you want to get cute pics, I would like to try going there for brunch one day.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It is nothing like shown on the picture. Food is completely tasteless. Looks nothing like what we expected. Highly overpriced. Cocktails were very tasteless. Disappointed. Expected a lot from this place

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The food was not a big deal non-fresh. The service for drinks was not the best, and not to mention the bill so expensive for horrible food and service!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Food and drinks were overpriced for what we got. Cocktails were poorly mixed, unless you look for your cocktails to taste like shots.

Loved the ambiance , loved the rooftop, but I probably won’t be back here again.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was out first time here and the ambiance was too cute! Loved it! The drinks were great, the little dishes were just enough for a great time with besties! The DJ had great beats for a sweet Saturday social!! Will be back definitely!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Simply amazing.

Name: Michelle
Review: This place is really cool. They played great music and the view is amazing. The decor was amazing. I’d love to return.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was a fun, hip vibe. Cute flower decorations. Get the Moira Rose drink!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Essen war qualitativ nicht gut, schlechter Service!

Name: ValeriaB
Review: Todo súper bueno! Súper amables recomiendo al 100%

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It’s something I will do again 😆 amazing drinks on the menu

Name: BameM
Review: I went for after work drinks with a friend. The two seater tables are in a dark corner near the bar not the best when there are some great spaces avail in the restaurant, I saw multiple people request to change their seat from this area so they should definitely look into revamping. Menu was limited and just average in taste. Ordered the frozen margarita and it was all sugar. I would go back to take a tourist since most people come for the Instagram shot.

Name: SoniaH
Review: We had a good time during our visit. The only thing was that the waiter kept dissappearing and not once came to check if we needed anything. We had to ask the guys picking up the dishes for what we needed and they would go look for her. Other than that the food was good and so were the drinks. The place was beautiful!

Name: LilC
Review: It was just ok for me-the best part was the picture spots and DJ was amazing!

Name: RB10
Review: Poor Service, Bad drinks, poorly presented drinks, Error in the bill.  Great View and Music.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Honestly, the service to get upstairs and checked in was great. We had to ask several times about our server coming to our table. So the service was nothing great at all. The food was fine you don’t get a lot for your money. The ambiance is very cool.

Name: CoryH
Review: Food was horrible service was trash drinks was watered down

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: My experience was great!!! Great music, great people, decadent atmosphere, and well crafted drinks. Definitely a good time.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: My girlfriends birthday. Service was great and prompt. Our waitress was very helpful & provided suggestions as to where we could get an exceptional view.

Name: ClaireL
Review: Great experience, beautiful decor great view and nice atmosphere

Name: CassieS
Review: Loved the atmosphere and the ambiance. The food in general needs an upgrade. The desert choices are superb. And I loved my waitress.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I was honestly hoping for more like what you see in social media but it was a small place. The service wasn’t that good, food was okay but you don’t have a lot of options. In all I will say I won’t go back.

Name: CammiG
Review: It is a really nice place.  Drinks/food were good. Our server was not good at all. The vibe was everything.

Name: ShaneakA
Review: Food and place is amazing enjoyed my night staff were nice and polite

Name: MiguelinaR
Review: The person by the elevator was rude and disrespectful and ruin my night

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I had an amazing time overall for my best friend birthday

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Love love love this place. Not only the ambiance but the food was top tier!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Had an amazing brunch, celebrating my birthday

Name: JennaC
Review: Social medical made this establishment look grandiose and when arrived the room we were in was very underwhelming. We were one of the first reservation time slots so it wasn’t super busy yet service was pretty slow with drinks and attentiveness. The extremely low lounge tables and hard bench seating didn’t add to a pleasant experience.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I had a wonderful time and the drinks was awesome!

Name: AthziriB
Review:
Food is great, the ambiance is spectacular. 
I just wish they’d be a little more welcoming since we’re paying to be there, but overall it’s a great experience.

Name: Nia7C
Review: Great views, DJ was awesome played alot of good music. I enjoyed my food(shrimp tacos), however some of my friends were not pleased with the taste of their food and that it was overpriced ($18 for chicken fingers). We were a group of 8, our waiter was really nice, food came quick. We went on a Sat so at 2.5 hrs they were ready to get us out of there, which was expected on busy night, Mgr came over and was polite about it lol. Overall we had a great time, able to dance, and got really great pics.

Name: George
Review: Everything was nice and the alcohol drinks I believe are unique, I should have done research though on the food menu due to the limited options.

Name: Mayelin
Review: Not enough food options. And I don’t think it look how it does on Instagram

Name: Lili
Review: Sat at the table with no menu for 10 mins before we had to wave someone down for it. Then another 20 mins before anyone came to take our order after we flagged the waitress down.

Name: DoraL
Review: The only positive thing I can say is that the flower stairs and the carousel makes the whole restaurant. Food was absolutely tasteless and bland even the chicken fingers served with 2 weird sauces that wasn’t good. Also they were overpriced for something that wasn’t even made in the store. Chik fil a chicken tenders is a million times better and reasonably priced. The service was terrible and wasn’t check on after we got our drinks nevermind the food came out before the drinks. It’s just a terrible experience. The ambiance is cool but the music is better. Would not recommend this place.

Name: MaritzaB
Review: The Magic Hour did not disappoint!!  Had a fantastic ladies night out, great ambiance, incredible drinks and service.  Will definitely come back!

Name: GeenaP
Review: They were still very accomadating with me arriving late for my rsvp

Name: AshleyV
Review: Absolutely loved the vibe and all the photo ops.  The food was not very good, if wasn't terrible- but the environment totally made up for it!

Name: JayffaG
Review: It was an amazing experience from their administrative assistance helping me out via email to when we got there everybody was so welcoming and the service was awesome from the bartender to the waitress. The food and drinks were amazing so I would recommend for brunch they made my mom birthday special I love that. My mom wanted to come here for the pictures and they didn’t disappoint since my mom loves floral scenery.

Name: Finediningonabudget
Review: Went for brunch with a reservation but they sat us at a low cocktail table instead of the side with dining tables. Besides that had a good time.

Name: Sellis
Review: We waited 15-20 minutes after being seated to even see our server. When she arrived to our table she was curt, cold, and came off as bored and stuffy. Then it took quite a while to get our drinks and water. Refills were few and far between. I've worked in the service industry and I understand the staff can be swamped on a Friday night, but I've been here during happy hour when there were even more people, and the bartenders were on top of it and friendly. This place is for tourists to get sweet drinks and photos. Not really for NYC locals.

Name: cleow
Review: Great for a girls night out or birthday celebration!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We met up with our high school friends after 25 years. We had a blast. Thank you for your hospitality. One of which is a blogger from Canada (denupzter) one from Jamaica and others from NYC.

Name: AlexiaGrey
Review: A New York must see. Stunning decor, fun ambiance, delicious cocktails.

Name: MadelineB
Review: Fun experience

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Came for a date night while visiting NYC. Cozy atmosphere, we wanted to play the mini golf but was still closed due to COVID.

Name: AnaFlavia
Review:
I was completely disappointed with my experience in this establishment. Firstly, the main room was closed due to an event and no one let us know in advance. This is a place where they sell the image and their instagramability. So they should let people know if their main area is closed in advance by email.

We were also sat on a table that was wobbly and it took a waiter 10 minutes to notice and fix it. Only after our drinks were almost spilled.

I chose this date because I would like to go to the place before winter and the intense cold… I also had a chance to go on a Tuesday or Wednesday, days that usually tend to be more empty.

Name: GaelleH
Review: Food was amazing  ... customer service  is  💯  for me . Thank you for a great experience  I will be going again.

Name: NicholasR
Review: took my friend here for her birthday. it was a good vibes. food is ok

Name: Betsy
Review: Horrible food and service! Only redeeming quality this place has to offer is the photo opportunities which was still underwhelming…

Name: JhonathanM
Review: Great Place but the food options were limited and not exciting. drinks were great!

Name: ErinQ
Review: The views and the space were beautiful.  The drinks were delicious.  We did not have any food ourselves primarily because the service was BEYOND slow.  Our reservation was 8:00 pm.  We got water delivered right away...then we sat for 20 minutes without a soul speaking to us.  We thought we had to go up to the bar to get our drinks, but guests next to us said no - there is service, but it's just slow.  We flagged down our Busser and we told him what we wanted to drink, and he said he would bring it.  Around 8:30 we were greeted by our waitress.  She asked, "Is everything OK?"  we said, the water is fine, but we haven't gotten anything else yet.  Then the Busser delivered the drinks.  We asked the waitress for the check as there was no way if drinks took 30 minutes, we could attempt to order food.  We had a show we needed to be at by 9:30.  Still no check....until we chatted with the Busser again.  The Busser was FABULOUS!  And very helpful.  I truly hope he got the tip and didn't have to share it with the waitress. I am sure this was just a fluke and I know everyone is understaffed.  The drinks were delicious....and the spot very beautiful and dj spun great sounds.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Worst service I have ever experienced.  Waited 30+ minutes for our drinks.  Drinks were wrong.  Could not get waitress to take our order, even though restaurant was not busy.  Literally had to walk over (twice) to hostess stand to ask them to send someone for us to order food.  Unbelievably bad!

Name: Shan
Review: This place is awesome!! So beautiful and fun. Would 10/10 recommend for girls night or date night! Will be back for sure

Name: Angel
Review: The aesthetics are fun but I requested to sit outside with a month anticipation, that request was not honored they sat me inside on one of the first tables as soon as you walk in. I didn’t get greeted or water for about 10 minutes until I stood up and talked to a manger. It was a special occasion and I had noted it on my reservation but yeah in the end nothing special about this place.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Do not go here they ruined my daughters 15 the birthday they gave us a bar table and said they couldn’t accommodate us even though we had a table booked. Cheap tacky and loud

Name: KarelysL
Review: If you’re looking for good food… definitely not your spot. If you’re looking for some good drinks and a nice ambiance then I would recommend however, this is a one and done for me.

Name: ChloeC
Review: Amazing vibes! Great decorations, the carousel was so cool, food was great and music was awesome.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Super cute spots! Drinks and ambiance are on point. So was the music, I highly recommend and will plan to be back

Name: khamm
Review: We were seated and ordered a drink and then our server did not check on us for 45 minutes. I was there for my birthday and the service was terrible…. We got the check and went to the bar. The bartenders were very nice and bar service was great.

Name: ClaribelOr
Review: I had a reservation and they sit me in the sun, so there were plenty of tables available to sit me and the hostess say no because they were reseved, but i ALSO MADE A RESERVATION. So i left.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Cute place, just wish it was more lit

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I thought it was a restaurant but it's more appetizers. Make sure you eat at the restaurant before going. The drinks were too childish looking. The only thing is ambiance to take pictures. The only thing that was interesting.  Literally stayed like 16 mins took pictures and left. We didn't like the DJ and wasn't putting interesting music. Very disappointing!

Name: Ximena
Review: The music wasn't nice. The DJ did not know how to mix the beat of the music. He was rookie

Name: Foodlover12
Review: It saddens me to write such a nasty review had a reservation at 9:45 got seated around 9:55 and ordered 2 drinks to start off the worst part was our waitress Jasmine by 10:50 still had not served us our drinks. when we reminded her about the drinks she said they’re on the way. 20 mins later 11:10 still no drinks… we had been seated for over an hour with not even a glass of water. when we complained to jasmine she seemed to be very bothered by the fact we were upset and decided to bring the tables next to us their next refill and guess what!? STILL NO DRINKS. Jasmine had a terrible attitude and magic hour sucks. please do not give your business to them bc they simply don’t care.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Horrible customer service and rude workers

Name: NaomiE
Review: Stunning location with great opportunities to take pictures at this rooftop bar. We visited for lunch/dessert before work. The vegetarian options was extremely limited. Dessert was incredible. So tasty and the ice cream sundae is a showstopper. Service from the bell boy was great; he sat us down and greeted us, continuously ensured we had everything we needed and even took pictures of me and my friend. The waitress had good recommendations for our dinner, however, she wasn’t very friendly. Having someone be kind and happy while serving you makes experiences and I would say she didn’t bring any value to our experience. The hosts at entry etc were all great, just a shame our waitress wasn’t the most friendly.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was such a wonderful experience! Planning to go every time we visit NYC !

Name: NicoleK
Review: I love the ambiance of this place. It’s such a pretty rooftop and so girly I love it. Perfect place for a girls night out or to celebrate a special occasion. The service can be slow sometimes and I wish they had a larger food menu. I mainly come here for the atmosphere and to get good photos.

Name: AubrieM
Review: The drinks were very syrupy and not very strong for the price. We told the wait staff we were not satisfied with the drinks and she told us she’d bring a round of tequila shots for the table. After waiting for 30 minutes she brought 2 shots for 6 people. The atmosphere was great but the food and drinks were lacking.

Name: StrappyShoes
Review: First of all, social media does not depict the closet sized “roof top”.  This confined establishment offers mediocre food with outrages prices.  Freezer Burn Curly Fries with sour tasting ketchup and a spoonful of guacamole with a few tortilla chips as an appetizer; and four unexciting sugary drinks for a total of $140 dollars. Thank God we had reservations at Nobu to end the night well.  Thanks but it’s for me.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: My girlfriends and I were celebrating MY birthday. We were a group of 8 and service was great. Ambiance and the views were awesome. Drinks were delicious, one of the best lemon drop martinis I’ve had in a while.

Name: Claud
Review: Love it ! Had so much fun

Name: DeniseI
Review: 13th Birthday

Name: Meandyou
Review: Beautiful view, special like who like pink 💓our server she very friendly and helpful, food is good drink is so pretty we enjoyed, it was a great experience overall. I very much recommend this place.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Good times. Went with my wife for brunch on a Sunday. The food was delicious, the service was great, the music was outstanding. The rest of it was good too, it’s a good place to take pics and post on Instagram. It’s a place we enjoyed and prob would not return but if friends and family visit we would gladly bring.

Name: JessicaW
Review: Amazing night, good vibes, good food, lots of people but not crowded, great drinks

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Always love going to Magic Hour. Our waitress brought out sparklers for my friends celebrating their birthday. She happily went to double check if other foods were gluten free for my gluten intolerant friend.

Name: Denise
Review:
Drinks were really good, service was nice, but the music was a little loud so it was hard to have a conversation. More disco feeling than bar ambiente 
But we had a good time and met nice people. 👍🏻

Name: Tray
Review: The ambiance was amazing, the rooftop that actually closed if it rained was soooo unique. However, the food/menu was garbage. It came off as snacks for when you’re drunk, the drinks were OK. If you’re going for aesthetic amazing, food no and drinks OK.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I had such a great time. The drinks were really good! Such a vibe

Name: JazminT
Review: Great set up. Wish there were a bit more food options. Overall, good time!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Luogo bellissimo e molto curato, personale molto gentile e premuroso

Name: AmberG
Review: Amazing vibes beautiful view we loved it!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Would be 5 stars if they didn’t have displays sexualizing animals

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Not as nice as I imagined

Name: DDelaney
Review: Fun atmosphere. Great location near MSG. Ended up being rainy and the first real chilly night of the year so everything was closed in. Feel like we missed out on a bit of the aesthetic but what can you do. We wanted to see the naughty bunnies lol. Went with a group of girlfriends before a concert. They all enjoyed their drinks, being pregnant I wish there was a small section with some “mocktails” for those who can’t or don’t drink. Food was decent, we orders more than half of the selections with no complaints. Would def go back during nicer weather.

Name: Carnisha
Review: The was a beautiful location. Only downfall is the service was a little slow, as far as getting drinks, but the drinks made up for the way. Drinks were good and strong. My only critique is to have more servers tend to the people who didn’t reserve the carousel, because it seems like all the servers cater to the people on there. It’s perfectly fine, when you pay to rent it out, but also make sure you tend to the other guests.

Name: KevinB
Review:
This is possibly the worst service I've ever gotten in an establishment.

My friend and I arrived and were sat. The server, who also appeared to be working the bar, came over and made sure we got water. We then didn't have our order taken for close to thirty minutes. We had to ask multiple times for someone to come check on us. We got our cocktails about fifteen minutes later. The food did not show up for another hour. The server/bartender was actually very nice and I felt bad for her. She was clearly left on her own to work that entire area of the bar/lounge. She definitely needed more assistance, but there multiple people walking around who seemed to be doing nothing at all. We couldn't tell if they were meant to be security, managers, etc?  Either way, they weren't needed, but the server definitely needed back-up and should have been provided with it. We should have had the bill waived at the end of the night due to the service and delay, but instead, we were just given shots, which we did not ask for. I would never go back here again.

Name: Jpcz
Review: Food was ok, drinks were great, atmosphere was nice but the service was super slow. We sat for 20 minutes with no drinks or food. And there was only a 90 minute limit on the table.

Name: Amyh
Review: Went for my birthday and had a great time. Food and drinks were good!

Name: Yudy
Review: Honestly I feel like this restaurant lounge was too hyped by the reviews. The food wasn’t great at all the only great thing about this restaurant is the decorations besides that they have uncomfortable seating feels like they put you in a certain spot next to people so they can keep and eye on you unless you have blonde hair and blue eyes…. Didn’t like the vibe the waiters were not friendly at all and brought us the bill like I’m a way they wanted us to leave didn’t like it at all.

Name: TaraR
Review: My daughter Dacia 17th Birthday!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I had been here once before and enjoyed it. This time the crowd was very unsophisticated and the drinks sucked. Much better options throughout the city.

Name: JudithC
Review:
Couldn't pick a better place to celebrate my birthday! Service was great n super nice. All the securities were friendly n profesional.
The rose prosecco was cute n refreshing Mini burgers and tacos were good.
I'll definitely be going back but for brunch next time. Can't wait. 
Thank you for everything!

Name: TomS
Review:
Just flew in from UL so popped to the hotel rooftop bad. 

Wonderful service and staff. 

Wish we stayed here rather than wondering down to PHD

Name: AlyshaK
Review: The place is definitely really nice, I just wish I knew that the mini gold and carousel were on one side of the venue and we were seated on the other side. I wasn’t sure how to access it. The drinks were pretty good & the food was delicious. Everyone who worked there was super nice.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Food was blah. Drinks were blah. Overpriced shots. Great for pictures.

Name: Nola
Review: The worst experience ever, the waiters kept ignoring us, the food was horrible.

Name: KimC
Review: The rooftop bar was nice, but the side windows were all foggy and we really could not see out unless we went on the other side of the bar.  We ordered another round of drinks which never came but were delivered to the table next to us instead. The drink with the cucumber was my favorite part of the whole night and I did not get my 2nd one, overall, it was a little disappointing.

Name: DeniseS
Review: AWFUL SERVICE!! Staff is EXTREMELY RUDE!!!! Terrible way to spend my birthday.

Name: Jonv
Review: The service was dreadful. It took 20 mins to get our drinks upon ordering them and it was a cocktail and a corona. My partner and i waited 50 mins total and werent even asked what we would like to have as our entrees, to the point we were fed up and asked for the check and ate somewhere else. It was a nice looking place with TERRIBLE service.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I guess I expected more from the place and the food menu was ok… nothing out of ordinary

Name: StephanieR
Review: Awesome!!!!

Name: GerryB
Review: Very different and fun atmosphere. A bit loud for 5pm drinks. But lively!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very loud, other party was crowded into our table space, view was pretty

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Amazing!! Can’t wait to see bring my kids for brunch!!

Name: MommaF
Review:
We only went for a drink at the Magic Hour. It's quite "funky" especially for us older folks. Great view of Empire State Building. Seats were terribly uncomfortable. Music was blaring. 
But if you are a young cool person, you might like it .

Name: Danielad
Review: Una mierda. La comida y el servicio es deplorable!

Name: TamannaS
Review: Amazing and beautiful place to be on a Tuesday night ❤️

Name: GlenysD
Review: Amazing location and the food was delicious , the drink os excellent

Name: JodiM
Review: We made a reservation and sat down but both waitresses walked past us twice. We also felt rush when the waitress brought the check. Not sure what that was about

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
The food was really good 
The place is nice 
The service is amazing 
I highly recommend

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Birthday brunch

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Cute spot to take pictures and maybe a rooftop drink, but definitely a tourist trap in terms of a restaurant. Vibe wasn’t as classy as pictures portrayed. The “table” we booked for brunch for 10 people was a patio sectional with two small end tables maybe big enough for 6. Staff was very nice & Luckily they let us cancel our reservation with no questions asked, but this was not the “brunch” experience I was looking for. The place didn’t even serve coffee!

Name: DomJ
Review: Fun atmosphere with lots of cute photo ops. Drinks were great and perfect for brunch with friends.  Food wasn't great and hostesses were a bit stuck up but other than that a fun experience

Name: SaadQ
Review: I celebrated my 30th here ans it was a such a good time the enrgey and music were amaizng and I would recommend thsu place to anyone.

Name: EKCroffie
Review: Great time for a girls night, date or group outing. Drinks and apps were good

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Birthday dinner and drinks! Food was amazing. Just wish it was a tiny bit quieter !

Name: YvetteJ
Review: We arrived and the staff greeted us with a smile 😊 and everyone was nice and polite, the food was amazing and we had a great time

Name: FancySandye
Review: Magic Hour is definitely the place to be. We love the food,  the ambiance and the decor.

Name: SarithaP
Review:
It’s looks like very old fashioned 
Old seating.  You needs to upgrade the furniture

Name: valrates
Review: Took forever to get service and very expensive! I do not recommend

Name: FahteemaT
Review: A group of ladies decided to treat their bride-to-be out before she ties the knot in Las Vegas next month. The scenery was lovely and great for out photo ops for the evening. We also appreciated the fact we were able to relocate our table as it became quite windy during the evening for our reservation. We had two orders of shrimp tacos that had way too much garnish and not enough taste. When one lady advised she was just not happy with her order of sliders, the waitress was made aware of this which she then replied ' o you left it out for too long'. Again, the photo ops were greatly appreciated for the evening.

Name: DIANAS
Review: very instagrammable place, very instagrammable place

Name: Tanya
Review:
Magic Hour was a fun space for photos! The carousel was exceptionally charming!! Love taking photos and sitting on it very much. Service was great but I did have to wait awhile which was not so nice. At least bring a glass of water over while we wait considering we walked to get to the location. The food was delicious but the late night menu option was extremely limited!! Can you please add wings, nachos, and a vegan option! It would make a huge difference. 

DJ was great and had fantastic music selection. Every time I am in NYC (3 times a year for work or pleasure) I always make a stop to Magic Hour. Keep up the good work guys😊

Name: CelineN
Review: A cute place for photos and a girls night out. Drink and food menu are extensive and pretty good.

Name: Nette
Review: I went to celebrate my birthday. The ambiance is beautiful but the service was horrible. I had reservations. A waiter never came to my table. After over 20mins of waiting, I called a waitress over and she said that she’s wasn’t the waitress. I told her that we’ve been waiting for over 20 minutes and that’s when she took the order. When I asked if I can move to another seat due to a better ambiance she said no because the table is reserved like I was a walk-in. Later on I asked the actual hostess to move to a better seat due to the ambiance and she didn’t even know what ambiance meant. I explained to her that when I originally made my reservations I stated that I will like to be seated in a nice area due to it being my birthday. I was eventually moved to a better seat with beautiful ambiance behind me. Overall the customer experience was just bad.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was my sisters bday her first time coming here . This is my third time here. She loved it . She took a lot of pics . Everything was great.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The decor was super cute & nice seeing the view of the city, however service & food was alright

Name: ChristinaL
Review: It was ok. Not quite the hype people made out. Kind of disappointed.

Name: VeryAshley
Review:
I went on a Monday night. It was a great experience. Not busy at all. The menu was your typical bar food. But it was good. The drinks were delish. 
Overall, it was a great way to spend the last night in NYC. And the ambiance is top tier. Every angle is picture worthy. I look forward to returning for brunch the next time I’m in the city.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Somehow people are able to go to the bar without a reservation. I wouldn’t have an issue with this if they would actually have a drink and spend some time away from the photo settings. However, they spend no money and take 20/30 minutes to take photos. 

The staff was very unprofessional and unresponsive I found myself walking over to the bar to get items I needed and the attention of staff.

Name: JohannaA
Review:
Food and drinks were good. The place is even more beautiful in person. 
But the waiter took long and confused my drinks.

Name: GlennysC
Review: I love it the food was great and the experience also

Name: TheBrunchQueen
Review: This was my second time going and unfortunately I won’t be back. Way to expensive for the amount of food that was given. The host at the front annoyed me. The waitress didn’t have any answers. Everything was “we don’t have it “ or I will ask. Annoyed.

Name: Rachelli
Review:
Overall was good, the food tasty really good.
My only complaint is that it was really HOT. they need to put some fans or something.

Name: Kelly
Review: Great experience for brunch for a 16 year old birthday celebration! Highly recommend it!

Name: Ashley
Review: Fun brunch atmosphere for sure. Food was pretty good, decor was awesome, had a table right away with making reservation. only complaint is the service. Our severe was very slow at coming over to take our order and bringing us our check, and never checked in to see if we wanted more cocktail. Food wait time was great otherwise.

Name: Ahath
Review: The atmosphere and music were perfect. The drinks were fantastic! They must be severely understaffed though - a reservation gets you a table but not really any service. Luckily, the experience was saved by a staff member named Steven. He went above and beyond to ensure our table was happy. I would go back here again.

Name: RobertaT
Review: It was a nice venue n view, the food options was blah n over priced . Everything was over priced to be honest at least it could hv tasted good, the people that works there were very nice. The highlight was the steps w the flowers.

Name: SheLove
Review: Celebrated my friends birthday but the waitress got our order wrong several times and the kitchen closed so we had to wait an hour to get food based on her mistake. Overall the ambience was great, awesome for social media and drinks were pretty good. Food wasn’t worth it

Name: TracyB
Review: The place was beautiful! Service was a little slow. Drinks were good and everything priced reasonable.

Name: Visitor
Review: Food was nothing special. Staff were rude. Wouldn’t return or recommend. Was very expensive for the standard that it was.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Friends bday and we had a blast!

Name: Ojitosverde
Review: Customer service was amazing but the food is not worth the price and the drinks variety is not as diverse, great for pictures tho.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I booked this place for my friend’s birthday. I had a reservation set but when we arrived our table was not ready. It was ok because the wait wasn’t too bad but once it was ready, they did not give us enough seats to fit everybody at the moment. Once we got that together, we all were shocked that the brunch was not bottomless but when we read online, it said it was. ( Which is why I booked here in the first place.) We couldn’t decide what we wanted to eat because the options were minimal. Once we finally ordered, our food took forever to come. Our waitress barely checked on us to make sure we were ok. And it was also bad for her because we were a group of 12 and she was working by herself with several other tables in our section. The food was ok but the amount they are charging for a basic brunch was outrageous to me. The mimosas were not that great so I’m not sure what type of champagne it was but it had to do for the moment. The music gets a 3/10. It was not versatile enough. The ambience oh the whole place was an 8/10. The aesthetic was very pleasing to look at. The rooftop area was very nice and pleasing to the eye. The area where you can take pictures around the flowers and steps made for great photos. Also on the other side of the the restaurant, it had a carousel that was pink and white with pretty flowers around it as well. All great for taking pictures and the carousel actually did go around as you were on it. That was our favorite part of the whole place. My personal opinion would be for aesthetics, 10/10 but anything else… 3/10.

Name: Breanne
Review: What a fun space! I was so impressed with the ambiance, beautiful and so fun! I enjoyed my breakfast sandwich and the cotton candy pancakes even though I’m not a sweets gal. It was so fun and I would recommend to anyone wanting to take cute photos and have a super fun time!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Entering is exciting and staff at the entrance are very nice. We had a reservation so we were seated immediately.  Music is great. We waited for 35 mins before the waitress came to our table, an hour before we got our drinks, with one order being wrong.  After and hour and 20 minutes, we ask our waitress where our food is, and she realizes she never put our order in. She may have realized sooner if she actually checked on us, but never did. It is also advertised as an open roof top location with large installations to pose with and photo ops. It is not open, it is closed and and only has the bedazzled merry go round. We cancelled the order and left immediately. Great ambiance, place has a lot of potential and they need better wait staff.

Name: TracyG
Review: We did not eat as the place was dirty and expensive

Name: kaylac
Review: Ambiance was great, music was cool, food was mid but the desserts are over priced for what they are. Don’t order the jewelry box it’s a waste of money and ugly ☹️  Service is also mid. Great photo ops.

Name: Rachel
Review: I had a fantastic time celebrating my birthday on a Friday night at Magic Hour with six plus ladies in my group. The staff was very accommodating and inviting. The energy  was fun. The place was was not overpacked so you were able to easily move about, take pics and receive timely service on a Friday night.  The music had you singing and moving. The service was very attentive.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: They gave us an unpleasant table despite having others available, the food is bad and the cocktails are far from good.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Dope atmosphere very good food and excellent view!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Tacky! We left before ordering. The interior is abysmal, don't be fooled by the photos as we, unfortunately, were ...

Name: GenessyR
Review: Loved the area, the music it’s just right and you can hear yourself talking. The drinks were great. It’s more about the pictures and views.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Ni había nada bueno ni interesante

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The vibe was nice. Drinks were pretty good. Food was okay. Had some sliders but they were kind of dry. It was all about the vibe and taking pictures in at the nice decorated areas.

Name: Lexi
Review: It’s overrated. Workers weren’t welcoming and there’s a time limit so they try to pressure you out. If the food was good, I would be okay with it being overpriced but that was not the case. Overall disappointed.

Name: RicardoH
Review: this location was very fun. they had to shut down the rooftop cause of the rain but had fun being seated on the carousel

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Had a lovely time. The host was very nice and the service was excellent.

Name: Frannie
Review:
This was my first time at the restaurant. The scenery was beautiful.
From the start to the end. The greeter and the hostess was very welcoming. 
I had the Jersey hamburger sliders. My friend had the curly fries and chicken strips both dishes was delicious 😋
I will definitely visit this establishment again.

Name: TriciaM
Review:
We ordered the salmon salad the chicken fingers the chicken sandwich The curly fries shrimp tacos and everything was extremely salty!! 

The drinks were the best thing on the menu. Also they waitress was not Attentive

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Magic Hour is beautiful! We went on a rainy and still enjoyed the rooftop which is a covered awning. We sat at the carousel and had a great time! Definitely a great spot for cute pictures  drinks with your girls. Drinks weren’t too strong and the curly fries were good.

Name: Mspainful
Review: Our server Kamilla was just rude. She walked over no salutations and just stood there staring with a pen and pad. I had to say hello first . So weird. We ordered a bottle of Prosecco she brought it over put it on the table and walked off. Every table in there, the server filled their glasses. But not ours…. There was something on my glass and she kept saying that’s the glass I had to literally scratch the glass to tell her it’s something brown inside the glass. A good server would have brought another filled glass of Prosecco considering the first was not drinkable. Other than feeling cheated out of good service. It was a good vibe.

Name: AmikaH
Review: The overall experience was great. The staff and the ambiance was wonderful

Name: JohannaQ
Review: Service was terrible, server spell champagne overcast didn’t bother to clean up the table

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Love the theme. Really nice place to visit for my birthday.

Name: JoyceR
Review: It looks nice very crowded looks better on the pictures than what it really is a little bit expensive

Name: Chitown
Review: Service very slow and when we ordered a Malibu and coke they came back with captain and Coke. Send it back and asked for Bacardi and the drink came back tasting like vodka. Third time we went to the bar and it was corrected.  service needs work. Ambiance and music were good.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was pretty

Name: MonaG
Review:
Super fun unique 90 minutes limit per reservation
So good for in between or happy hour type of short visit
Maybe better after dinner time experience…
Service slow
Minimal food options
-Snacks only

Name: MediaM
Review: Our waitress was absolutely horrible! She took forever with our drinks! It was three of us 2 of us received our food the 3rd person didn’t until 45 mins later we all ordered at the same time. I had to make a complaint to the manager. The waitress asked us to keep one of our IDs so we didn’t skip out on the bill I felt she did that because we were black! When it was time to pay the bill she left my credit card in the machine and couldn’t find it at first! She barely spoke English! Terrible waitress!!!!

Name: Alphaleague
Review: We pulled up to Magic Hour for a nice happy hour. As always, the energy and vibe of the space is great. Service is fair but as we all know what’s not why we come. I’ll be back.

Name: Victoria
Review: Not a bad place, but very hot during the day, as there is no ventilation or at least sun shades. And very loud music for lunch time. And absolutely bad brunch menu.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
The busser and waitress Dana was very attentive; drinks were great; hostess didn’t read request on reservation for carrousel table; the sliders were delicious but chkn fingers in the other hand were like any $5.fried chicken combo;
Decoration of flowers on carrousel for nice pictures is the only attraction to visit this place.

Name: MichelleG
Review: Nothing like what is posted online. I thought I was doing rooftop instead We were seated In an enclosed area with no roof top views. So much security just to have brunch with my 16-year-old daughter they even made her throw out a water bottle that was in her small backpack (we’re touring the city and had water). The food was awful. I got a chicken sandwich that had so much sauce on it the bread was soggy and falling apart. My daughter got a  salad and steak which also was drenched  in dressing even the steak had dressing. The small tables over big chairs force you to lean hunched over just to eat. Food is silver price and not worth it. Definitely did not get the experience I was expecting. Honestly my first bad review that I’ve ever written anywhere.

Name: Jessicar
Review: Food was not good at all. Drinks are okay

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Service was a little slow, but very friendly and got everything right. The truffle dipping sauce with the fries was fantastic. Ambiance is more party than sit down dinner, which was what we wanted. Overall a lot of fun and perfect for my birthday and our girls night!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: All drinks are pre-mixed and expensive, def price gouging and not very good. Got the sliders and they were so dry I had to douse them in ketchup. Waitress forgot she had us as a table and when I asked her if she was our waitress (even tho I knew she was), she said no and to ask the hostess who it was… (which was her). Very very very loud with speakers everywhere. The only saving grace was the view of the Empire State Building, fun sculptures, and the spinning carousel was cool but good luck getting on it when the insta influencers are there.

Name: SuzHill
Review: Celebrating NYFW & birthday

Name: ScottG
Review: Nice place but kind of expensive for the choice of views.  Still a cool place and the tapas were good.  Just expensive drinks is all.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great spot for photos. Food and drinks are good. Might have to chase after your server for service.

Name: SenijaM
Review: Amazing food. The dessert were incredible.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: A little overrated.  Looked nothing like the picture on Instagram. Got sat in the corner & saw zero view. Drinks were pretty good

Name: PierreH
Review: The view and cocktails are fine, but the food is disappointed.

Name: HannahLee
Review: Magic hour is worth the ambience in going for a drink. The service was absolutely terrible for the prices.

Name: GraceG
Review:
The place was nice looking but I was expecting more. 
The tables are very low and not comfortable to eat in, we also had to ask to be moved because our table was right under the sun. Food was okay but way too pricy for what it was.
The location had flowers around but no music and nothing else more than that. The empire view is cute. 
Overrated in general.

Name: RodrigoR
Review:
Place was really nice, beautiful decorations and view of the empire state.
Food was not great, it was okay.
 workers were really nice and providing support at all times.

Name: sandig
Review: Went for my daughters birthday. It is nothing like the pictures at all. Outrageous drink and desert prices that were not worth the price. The high heel drink says serves 2-4 people it tastes horrible and it’s two drinks too. The $32 jewelry box is super small and just a bunch of balls. Not shareable. The place is small. Don’t look through IG pics as they don’t have anything they show in the pictures. Would never recommend. Extremely disappointing. Service was good manager voided check but we didn’t drink or eat anything we received.

Name: TierraT
Review: Aesthetically  pleasing but not the place you go if you want to eat very limited menu

Name: MelanieD
Review: Took a while to get service. Fun atmosphere.

Name: MariaculeB
Review: My husband & I had a good time. Food was good. Drinks was good. The ambience was very nice & we enjoyed ourselves.

Name: FrancheskaW
Review:
Its just a decorated bar. Its too loud for a conversation. All that was attractive was the ambiance. 

They need more training for their mixologist. Popular mixed drinks were ordered and it was just liquor.

Could not enjoy a sip as a social drinker.

If bored and nowhere else to go, go for it.

Very OVERPRICED!!!!!

Name: Anth
Review: Great music, food, and service! The decor was beautiful for pictures and good vibes!

Name: TaylorR
Review: Sat there for 30 minutes and was never served. Went to go to the bathroom and came back and our water was gone

Name: Ericka
Review: The experience was great, but I wished it was much cleaner - the seats and the dishware! Overall, the waiter/waitress was lovely, and the food was enjoyable.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Birthday, they didn’t give us the table we had asked for so it was a slight bummer and it’s extremely HOT in the facility….they could use some fans

Name: ChristineC
Review: Extremely  hot 🔥 very small space especially  if your a party of 4 or more the table was very clusters because it was so small  and they need to have a open menu throughout the day so customer can have a preference

Name: MariuxiO
Review: It was really hot . Food was alright. Drinks really good .

Name: KateB
Review: Pretty rude staff, had to ask for things multiple times. We had a reservation for 7 people and they put us at a table that seems to normally be for 4 people. Food wasn’t very good for price and view wasn’t as good as I was hoping. Wouldn’t recommend.

Name: StephenE
Review: Alba was very accommodating for my group. Everything turned out wonderfully. I would definitely visit again when on a trip to NYC.

Name: NadineV
Review:
This is not a place to have a nice romantic dinner. It is far to noisy to have a decent conversation while eating and we sat next to the carrousel which is always full of screaming youngsters taking selfies.
This is not a place for older people who want to enjoy a rooftop bar.
Kind of dissapointed that we chose this hotel for his rooftopbar but we couldn't sit on it to enjoy the scenery due of the much too many people and noise.
The food and service was also dissapointing. I feel so sorry because the rest of the hotel was very very good.

Name: Mass
Review: Music started out great but could have been better throughout the night. Incredible rooftop, very spacious, food was good, drinks were stellar esp Mr Pink and Moira Rose! Definitely a must go for sure.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We had a good time, very organized not crowed

Name: lisal
Review: Super cute bar with great drinks!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Birthday. Pretty place. Service was meh. Food so-so

Name: Amazing
Review: The ambiance and aesthetics were fantastic however the service was lackluster. The wait staff took away my drink without asking if I was do e. The food was mediocre at best. I saw a TikTok posting that really made me add this to our agenda during a recent NY trip. No thank you for the future.

Name: LukeF
Review: Hostess was on her phone and gave us no indication process of being seated. After she realised we had sat ourselves she was extremely rude and very hostile when she approached the table. The rest of the staff were nice and the food was great but this ruined my partners 30th birthday meal.

Name: JayleneH
Review: Was not happy with their drinks at all. My daughter had a green juice & said it was disgusting. I had a mock drink. The worst ever. They sat us right in front of the carousel which was a bad idea. People literally were making lines by our table to take pictures on it. It was so annoying. The food was just ok. This place should not be hyped up at all like people do on social media platforms. For crying out loud not even their cotton candy was tasty. I mean how can you go wrong with cotton candy. It wasn’t even sweet. Very unhappy customer.

Name: KarlaSsssssssssssssssssss
Review: Everything was amazing the entire staff was bomb I would recommend anyone to go there

Name: Gabs
Review: Went for Golden Hour and they barely played any 1D songs. The You’re So Golden drink also made my friend and I have the worst stomach pain. We were having to frequent at the bathroom before and after the concert because it upset our stomachs that bad. The service was also very below par. Only checked on us once and did put us on separate tabs.

Name: Eeshboo
Review: Just need server to pay attention to us more like us not having to get their attention for our dining needs

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The rooftop isn’t a true rooftop experience as they try to sell it. We were wanting more rooftop ambience and were very disappointed.

Name: TessB
Review: Food and drinks were decent. The drinks came in plastic cups. And the service was terrible. We had empty drinks and plates and our waitress ignored us.

Name: Barbiaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa
Review: I had an amazing time last night. The lighting, the drinks & the finger foods was perfect. I would definitely be back. I enjoyed my time there!! Thanks so much! The Dj was nice enough to play a song I requested. I’ll never forget this birthday!!

Name: LaurenciaW
Review: The overall experience due to the food & drinks was mediocre but after encountering a discrimination issue with management it killed the entire vibe. If you want good food & service , this is NOT the place.

Name: AvidDiner
Review: We didn’t get food so cannot comment on that. The host downstairs was very sweet! Ambiance was great, the way it’s designed is different than imagined but wonderful. Service was really bad. Unfriendly, slow server and drinks were too sweet. $40 for 2 drinks we left full. Good for photos, but won’t be back.

Name: ilianab
Review: Met with friends for some drinks and food. We had a large party, the food and drinks were served fast and everything was delicious.

Name: tanial
Review: Other than the hostess being a little short and not honoring a preferred seating choice, everything was great.  The DJ was excellent, food was good, drinks were good… atmosphere was great.  We had a great time!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: From the greeting until you sit down, they make you feel they are doing you a favor. The waitress was great but honestly not worth it. The view …from any building you will get a better view.

Name: Erika
Review: Sat for 20 minutes without anyone coming to our table. I had to go and grab a waiter to ask how much longer before we’re served a glass of water. Very small food selection and the drinks were horrible. The seats we were filthy and stained. Definitely not worth the hype or money. I won’t be coming back or recommending.

Name: MariaG
Review: Excellent place and wonderful view! Very cute spot

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We got no service for over 40 minutes I had to get our own water

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It is a great restaurant. But I would but it to just get a bite with friend. Not a restaurant that you will feel fully satisfied.

Name: TaliyahQ
Review: Very slow & poor service. Food was mediocre. Beautiful aesthetic & great drinks tho.

Name: TatevA
Review: Everything was great, but they need a better set up for the tables. The tables are too small and everything is falling out.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Not worth the hype. Save your time and money. There were so many things that went wrong with today’s experience, I feel that it’s not even worth listing everything as it will just raise my blood pressure again. You may get some cute photos and it ends there. Service was beyond terrible and food was less than mediocre. Tourist trap, not worth it. Expected more from the Tao group.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We had bottle service it was great time

Name: LaurenH
Review: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE!!! Service was terrible. All for show

Name: TeeBee
Review: Came here to celebrate two birthdays. It was a cute set up. A little smaller than I thought and one side (side with pink animals) was cuter than the Elephant Room side. We waited 30 min to order and then 30 for the food.  The order was wrong and they had to redo it. On the plus it was back in about 20 min instead of 30. Had the grilled salmon Caesar salad and it was delish!!! Way better than I thought. Drinks definitely gave you a buzz however we were with someone who doesn’t eat sugar and 99.9% of the drinks had syrup, liqueur or some other sweetener so there were few options for them. Service could be better. Waitress didn’t check on us often, we had to beg for water, our waitress’ shift ended in the middle of our meal so we had like a total of 3 different waitresses. There was also an issue with the machines so my debit card was held and run back and forth more often than necessary so I didn’t like that. Everything that requires service was slow including drinks. Our reservation was 5 and it wasn’t very crowded so I don’t understand the delay. I will be honest they didn’t enforce a 90 min time limit with us. We left after 8pm! So we were there 3 hours and we definitely didn’t feel rushed. I was concerned about that being that their service was slow but I didn’t need to be. As we were leaving at 8ish that is when the crowd started to arrive so there began to be waits to take pics at the various areas (ie carousel and pink animals). Overall it was cute. Some things were awesome (food and ambiance) some things need work (service and communication). Ranking 3 stars but would go back again.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was fine except we were seated next to the carousel so we were constantly surrounded by people taking pictures, asking us to take their pictures, moving because they were leaning against our table to take pictures, getting hit with bags while they moved with the turning carousel to take pictures. All of the tables around us were empty but “reserved”. Staff saw the issues we were having with at least 2 large parties crowding us but did nothing.

Name: GEORGIAG
Review:
It was our first time my friend and I and we loved every minute of it. The view as amazing but the roof top itself was spectacular. The decor was unbelievable beautiful. We took amazing pics. The vibe and the people just wonderful. Everyone  dressed beautifully, drinks were good. I had the chicken salad while my friend had chicken fingers. It was delicious.

We will definitely be going back and with more friends. 

Thank you for a great experience.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Hostess had her face glued to the phone upon entry, not friendly at all. You almost didn’t feel welcome to come in. Being enclosed, yes-you are on a rooftop, there is ZERO air circulation. Least a few fans would do them some good. The waitress didn’t come to us for over 30 minutes once we were sat down and we had to ask the runner for water several times throughout the meal. The menu is set up for brunch in “courses” first, second etc. however, you receive ALL the food together which would have been nice for them to tell you upon ordering. It was overwhelming having all the food delivered at once. The atmosphere was beautiful, but it didn’t make up for how ridiculously hot and stuffy it was. Waitress barely came back to see us during the meal, thank god for the runner who kept bringing us water…not worth the experience. Overall, food was good though.

Name: Munch
Review: Curb to curb, an amazing experience. A MUST!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The workers were very rude

Name: Food4Thought
Review: Went for 25th birthday celebration. Booked a month before arrival and needed wheelchair assessibility seating. The two doormen were pleasant and friendly as they escorted our party of five to the elevator.  Elevator escort was also pleasant.  Once on floor of Magic Hour the hostess was not inviting and had rude attutide. She walked us to our table which resembled a small low coffee table with chairs and a low couch which didn't make any sense to me; she left and then we waited and waited for our waitress. I had to get up and take our cake to the hostess and practically insist on having the the bday caketo refrigerated becaue the waitress 20 minutes to come to our coffee table. The waitress was not attentive -worse service.  Little plates and drinks just okay. Music was okay but extremely loud. Nice decor for photos. Carousel was reserved so you could sit on it, Reserved for who because no one arrived the whole time we were there. Not worth the hassel....

Name: KenaL
Review: I really enjoyed myself. The aromatherapy was great. The pretty lights kept my attention. I really liked that I could y take picture a lot of selfies in this place

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: My friend and I had a great time!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Not worth the hype

Name: Shadylady
Review: Very nice atmosphere but no air circulation. Excellent drinks and snacks. The donuts were out of this world

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Good experience.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: My bday very happy special

Name: Emily
Review: I came here for a birthday celebration having drinks and lunch. Drinks are good. Food is ok.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: My birthday!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Our server took so long we ordered drinks from the bar despite having reserved a table. Music and ambience was great. Drinks were just ok. Cool for the experience but the actual restaurant I would not return to

Name: Olly
Review:
Service was terrible. That wasn't my first time in Magic Hour but I've not ever experienced such a service before. After placing an order for drinks and receiving them it took our waitress over 45 min to show up to take our food order. Even though we told her upon placing a drink order that we are about ready to order food. We were on the verge of finishing the drink and walking out. Finally after getting food we haven't been checked on even once. She only showed up to bring us a check. 
Also the bag check-in is ridiculous. This is not the airport, you know. There was a huge line to check in the bags, and even though I had a tiny shopping bag I was kicked out of the elevator to check it in. The personnel at the coat check was rude, and overall it was a humiliating experience. 
Music was getting louder and louder, everyone had to scream their lungs out. I loved this place before but now I am not sure if I'd recommend this place anymore.

Name: AndrewH
Review: Drinks & ambience were great. Food was subpar & over priced

Name: Nope
Review:
SO HOT!!! We were seated at a four-top table just as you walked in from the hallway on the merry-go-round side. There was literally zero breeze and they had the roof 80% closed (it was a sunny 80 degree day, no clouds). They need to install some fans ASAP. We had to ask for water three times, which given how hot it was you would have thought the waitress would have came to the table with it, and when we finally got the still water it tasted like dirty glassware. 

We were going to eat but we were SO uncomfortable we left after having one round of drinks. Such a shame because I was there the night Moxy opened and wanted to bring an out-of-town friend. Will probably never go back after this experience.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Wir waren zum Abendessen gekommen während unserer Flitterwochen für die tollen Cocktails, das super Ambiente und die tolle Aussicht. Alles sieht wie auf den Bildern aus, Moira Rose ist ein Wahnsinns Cocktail, der nicht enttäuscht.

Wer etwas außergewöhnliches sucht wird hier fündig!

Name: Birthdaygirl
Review: After dinner theatre drinks/bites. Drinks were great-loved the Moira Rose. Food was okay. Live the decor and revolving carousel.

Name: AshleyC
Review: Server was standoffish and rude to food runner

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Went for a bday celebration on Tuesday night. DJ was great. Good was tasty. Cocktails were on point!

Name: Momo
Review: Staff was rude. The greeter didn’t make eye contact and the waitress ignored me

Name: EstefanyU
Review: I ordered the Mr. pink cocktail and was more ice than drink you can barely taste the flavor or it. Also we got some donuts but they came super saggy and cold. Regarding the ambience they have good music and service was nice.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The hostess was terrible

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
I had the anniversary and my wife’s birthday last night we booked for a table they just put us in the ones that they spin. Definitely not what we booked while other people doing just walks in were getting tables. So frustrated left after 20 minutes.
Definitely will not come back and I will spread the word to all my friends how messed up this place is.
The bartender/server she was amazing , other than that If I could give a 0 I would , and this is affiliated with Tao which is crazy how bad this place is compared to Tao Restaurants or the Nightclub which are top notch.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: 35 minutos esperando y nunca me atendieron, estuve sentada en el carrusel hasta que me canse y me fui

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Not our kind of place but others were enjoying very much.

Name: Crissy
Review:
First, the drinks weren’t good. It’s poor in alcohol content and has no significant taste. 
Second, the price is mad high for the portion size. 
Third, the customer service sucks! It’s an aesthetic environment so obviously customers would want to take pictures together (if in a group). The servers aren’t willing to take pictures of their customer - claims they’re too busy.

Name: AracelisR
Review: servicio al cliente horrible son groseras las muchachas que trabajan ahi, el menu solo dos comidas ,las vevidas super caras,, no avía aire acondicionado sentia que me iva a derretir me estube que ir porque el calor era demasiado,,llame ala manager para quejarme y me innoro, este lugar solamente es para ir a sacarse fotos y ya .. 👎 👎 👎

Name: MichelleF
Review: Very expensive for what you get. Service wasn’t great, but vibes and views are cool.

Name: rouge
Review: Drinks & food fantastic, great view. Good vibes! 🤍

Name: Familyof4dontgo
Review:
Family of 4 we made a reservation a few weeks before.   When we got there the male host put us at the back of the bar in the blazing hot sun and told us that every empty table (several) were reserved.  I felt completely discriminated against. Treated poorly because we were not the demographic they were looking for.   Finally a female hostess named Mariah moved us to one of the “reserved” tables.   The table beside us remained “reserved” for the entire time we were there. 
I would not recommend this place to anyone -particularly families or if you’re not planning to wear a bikini to brunch.

Name: JLo72
Review:
The food was ok but very expensive for what it was. 
The view was amazing though.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: So fun, very interactive & fun!

Name: JayGee
Review: I personally love this place. Your Hostess Mariah was amazing and overall, we had a great time!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was okay. Not memorable but not bad. Will probably go again. Thank you.

Name: Honestlytruelyfo
Review: Music sucked wasn’t loud enough, service was ok A/C barely worked food trash overpriced tbh I’m happy I went but it was t magically & I wouldn’t go again tbh

Name: CharleneS
Review: Made a reservation a month in advance to sit in carousel room. Wound up in other room next to the doorway! Very disappointed ! Wouldn’t go back

Name: JulieR
Review: Cool place. Went at 3:00 when they open. Lunch menu is small but ok. Not a place for food. Nothing special. Desserts are fun though.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Good drinks, small menu. They don’t have cheese with pretzels just mustard ._.

Name: ClaudiaM
Review: The service was very bad, the server was unfriendly and very rude. I am visiting from Florida and I chose the place because it looked nice but really the food is very bad and the worst thing is the bad attitude of the server

Name: TiffanyG
Review: Such a great vibe! Love the overall ambiance, great photo opportunities. Great place to dress up and be on a cute date.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Went for my birthday, food was good, restaurant is cute, and the views are super nice too. Great for pics, cute drinks!

Name: TiaraC
Review: Need better food and drink options, & air condition

Name: AnneA
Review: Love it definitely a place to go get drunk and catch with the girls. Definitely recommend it after 6pm due to the sun

Name: JennetteA
Review: Ambiance was nice, but overall service was not that great. Good spot for pictures with a view.  That is all!

Name: Anon
Review: Service was slow. Whilst it probably looks amazing at night, everything looked a bit worn. Not really the incredible rooftop experience we were hoping for.

Name: Lilytoby
Review: My 15-year-old daughter and her friend have been dying to go to Magic hour for brunch . The experience did not disappoint. The views and the Decor were absolutely beautiful. Although the reviews of the food were terrible, we were pleasantly surprised with our meals. Everything was delicious. Although the kitchen was backed up and delayed, the staff were extremely attentive and provided great service.   Kudos to Arcy our server and a man named Parve (spelling ??) who were wonderful

Name: TiffanyP
Review:
The waitress was very rude, she took our food from our table to serve another table that arrived after us. 
We also ask for drinks and our order was wrong

Name: SamiyaS
Review: Table set up wasn’t well planned with patrons waiting and trying to take pics of spinning carousel. They were bumping into the tables and people (my party) trying to enjoy our time there. aside of that it was great! Good food, music, etc.

Name: KendraM
Review: Worst customer service ever. From the beginning to the end. Waitress super rude. Attention to detail ZERO. The food on the tables without napkins, like what?

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Went for my birthday! Everything was so nice and beautiful it’s just our server was not kind. She acted as if she didn’t want to be at work. Other than that everything else was great!

Name: Maxine
Review: Staff has very bad customer service. The service is very slow as well.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I was extremely disappointed with this place, I was convinced by tik tok that this was a great place to visit… they gave us no silverware or napkins. Our drinks were poured in extremely ugly plastic cups! They charge about $18 per drink … photos speak for themselves. Guacamole was ok but you get more chips and barely any guacamole. Donuts were good, and pigs in a blanket were okay. Service was extremely slow on a Saturday afternoon. Please don’t waste your money coming here

Name: Maizie
Review: I was super excited to go here for brunch but that was ruined quickly. Service was terrible, the host and waitress would pretend they did not hear you speaking to them. We also waited on our food for a while and the server only checked on my table one time throughout the 90 minutes we were there. We had to flag the server down, the experience was just terrible all around. I did however, like my food and my drink.

Name: AshleyP
Review: Had a great time for my hubbies birthday - manager w the glasses I think he said his name was zack not sure was amazing …. The other manager on - not so much , very cold and dismissive, but overall this was a great experience

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It was so amazing! The staff was very helpful and prompt and not to mention the great food and drink options! I will definitely come back and experience it during the day but I give it a 11/10

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
I loved the decor with the flowers. The spinning tables is a very novel idea as long as you’re not on it too long.  It’s a great place to take pictures.  

I just wish they had more food choices but I understand the concept is more for socializing than dinning.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It’s was nice

Name: Cindy
Review: The drink selection was very limited. The cocktail drinks we ordered weren't very tasty and all you could taste was the hard liquor and nothing else. The ambiance made it very difficult to converse with everyone in our party of 5. The lighting was very poor and made everyone look very pink. The images shown of the venue online were nowhere to be seen at the actual venue. And we did not appreciate being rushed to use the restroom by a male staff standing right outside of the restrooms.

Name: Izzle
Review: Our waiter could've been more attentive. Never came back to see if  our drinks needed to be refill or if we wanted anything else.

Name: margaretc
Review: Made it up to the 18 floor with no problems. Then we met the hostess who didn’t take her face out of the phone even when she sat us down. Then it took 15 minutes to get water and another 10 minutes for the waitress to come over who was not very friendly. It was extremely hot they had no fans, then it started raining out and no one came to help us move the table from getting rained on, we had to move our own tables. Told the waitress and the manager that it was my daughter‘s birthday and I would like a sparkler in a cupcake after we ate. After waiting 10 more minutes after we were done eating I told the waitress we were done with our food, never asked if we wanted dessert and never bought the cupcake with a sparkler in for my daughters birthday, just bought the check. I was very hyped up based on all the pictures I saw on Facebook however very disappointed. I would never go back and I would never recommend this restaurant to anyone. The carousel of flowers was pretty but that was about it. Food and drinks and service very disappointing. All the staff needs an attitude adjustment

Name: OpenTable Diner
