Review: The ambiance is very pretty however people  are seated on  top of you to the point of being uncomfortable. The hostess was rude and the service was poor. Several plates placed on the table were not clean. The rest  rooms were extremely dirty. Overall disappointed - and probably won’t  return . Unfortunately A completely  different feel from when we were there last year and everything was fresh, friendly and fun.

Name: Michie
Review: Next time I would just come here for a few drinks and take pictures with their fancy decor. Otherwise, everything was just OK.

Name: LatriceG
Review: The service and food was horrible would never recommend this place to my worst enemy!!!

Name: bijalm
Review: I don’t normally leave reviews. Went there for a brunch and service was horrible, we never received proper table setting, napkins, kept asking the server so many times. It was extremely hot and not sure why they wouldn’t seat us in the other side where it was cooler. We were pretty much seating the whole time we sat there. I had heard this place was really amazing and it’s all just for show. I would not recommend this place and service and food is horrible.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Sowohl das Essen als auch der Service war miserabel. Kein freundliches Lächeln von den Service Leuten. Eigenständiges Denken unmöglich. Keine Sauberkeit am Tisch. Es war nur für 2 Personen eingedeckt obwohl wir für 3 reserviert haben. 
Das Essen selbst war mittelmäßig bis schlecht. Nicht appetitlich angerichtet. Lahme braune Salatblätter als Dekoration. Unmöglich. 
Löffel wurde vergessen. Have Champagner Rose bestellt und Prosecco Weiß bekommen.
Nie mehr würde ich da hin gehen. Kann es niemandem empfehlen.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Interesting restaurant, but absolutely terrible food. if you want to go because you wanna take some fun pictures then that’s fine. But don’t expect anything really edible. and the service was so harried.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great so much fun it was beautiful. Definitely going back with my girls

Name: SylviaT
Review: It’s was a great experience, The food was excellent the service was excellent the drinks was definitely on point. The only thing is trying to get a photo on the steps were all the roses are or trying to get a photo on the rolls carousel I’m guessing is what it’s called but overall the place is definitely beautiful it’s a great place to go on a date hang out with your girls. I definitely give the restaurant two thumbs up 👍🏾 👍🏾

Name: KayLove
Review: Great rooftop 10/10! I really enjoyed the aesthetics, drinks, vibes, music etc.

Name: HannahG
Review: Came from London to celebrate my sister’s 25th birthday! Loved all the photo opportunities. Would definitely come back again!

Name: BogdanaK
Review:
Horrible experience 
Poor food choices 
No AC 
Dirty

Name: MichaelR
Review: Wife’s Birthday

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The food was kinda lack luster for the price and the drinks were ok. You really are there for the pictures.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Good experience, food was good. Loved the drinks and aesthetics.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Really nice place to have drinks but the food is overpriced for some nuggets and tacos that wasn’t that good it wasn’t even average

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great rooftop view of Empire State Building! Great atmosphere!!

Name: MArangoPie
Review: We went in the middle of a heat wave so the rooftop was super hot and muggy with no source of relief.  We asked to be moved to a table with shade and that helped a bit.  Service was excellent - the staff there is amazing. The food was not so great - dry and not a lot of flavor. Drinks were excellent.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Beautiful view, drinks are so cute and delicious. Finger food top notched. Staff was very helpful and happy to help.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: This place is cool. That’s really it it’s definitely nothing special there’s cool lights super loud music pretty poor service. Good drinks but they’re pricey and not particularly strong. Go once try it out have fun take pictures but don’t need to go back again after

Name: AdrianeT
Review: Great experience everyone was really nice and helpful and the ambiance was amazing

Name: Debbie
Review: Very fun and interesting way to spend an evening! The staff are all amazing and we were well taken care of. It was a horribly hot day in NYC and almost unbearable, but kudos to the staff who persevered to make guests comfortable. We appreciated everyone! It would be great to have an improved menu without so much fried food if that can be considered.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Over rated. Food and drinks weren’t good. They’re only charging for the ambience

Name: MartinaF
Review: It was really hot and noisy, the view isnt so good.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: drinks and food are very good, a place for good photos

Name: LorenS
Review: To say we told them it was our honeymoon- we had a congratulations at the door. Not that we was expecting anything fancy but maybe a free drink? Or why ask if it was a special occasion? Music was SUPER loud for 6pm

Name: KelseyL
Review: Enjoyed the aesthetic and the cocktails, food menu is just elevated bar food but planned going to just grab some cocktails and a snack, worst part was the service. Ordered the curly fries and never received them, had empty drinks for about 20 mins before our waitress finally came back around to order another round and ask about our fries.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Bellissima serata, cocktail e musica con una vista pazzesca!! Consigliato!!

Name: Yahvonna
Review: I had a wonderful Time for my birthday, my waitress was nice and good music

Name: GinaR
Review: We loved the Magic Hour Roof Top bar.  Decor was fun and the carousel was a fun photo opportunity!

Name: BrittanyT
Review: The service was atrocious. My husband and I came here for his birthday dinner as we were staying at Moxy and I was appalled that I had to get up every single time I needed something. I had to walk to the waitress stand to order food, a new drink, etc. I had to go ask to have our original drink order taken as well. Also, when we first got there the woman outside before going up the elevator literally finished sending a text message before even addressing us at all. The view was amazing, food was great (should have come with some sort of side for $20, but the shrimp tacos were phenomenal), carousel and decor were awesome. However, the music was so loud it felt more like a club and everyone around us seemed to be staring at their phones instead of talking to the people they were sitting with because no one could hear, yet there was no dance floor to be seen. Music choices were great, just way too loud for the environment. Overall, your wait staff needs more training and professionalism, and please turn the music down a notch.

Name: ChrissyS
Review: Thanks to tik tok , I came across Magic hour & decided to go for my birthday. Everything was Amazing. The staff were professional & welcoming. The drink was beautiful & tasted good. I had the chicken fingers… they were crispy , hot & good too. I highly recommend magic hour for a nice night out or birthday celebration.

Name: ShantyR
Review: I really Love this place was amazing the food and drinks are so good omg

Name: IvanA
Review: The service was not good.  Drink explanation was poor. She does not provide guidance or recommendation.  was not good.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Service is horrible, I’d never go back there.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Such a cool place, staff was very personable and check in process was easy , loved all the spots to take pictures.. food and drinks were great .. service was excellent..

Name: Passion4food
Review: Service was really slow and our server was not able to answer simple in-her-opinion questions. We had to ask for silverware and plates twice, to which we received plates and asked for silverware again twice. Finally, I went up to the bar and grabbed roll ups for myself and my friends so we could dig into the pastry appetizer, which was the best part of your meal. It was hot and humid on the roof. The carousel was fun to watch people enjoy. Vibe was low, music was low, energy was low. I don’t think I’ll be back. One and done experience.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Both my husband and I’s meal were tasteless. If there were any seasoning or let alone salt, it would be better than what we have. The sauce I asked for never came. The drinks were laughable to be called cocktails. I understand people came for the ambiance but there’s no substance. 

This is the second Moxy rooftop experience in two different cities, really disappointing.

Name: Neeta
Review:
Great place and great vibes. 
Beautiful scene. Okay food. 
Drinks were bomb!

Name: DariaM
Review: It took 15 minutes for a waiter to take our order, otherwise we really enjoyed the ambiance and the overall experience. The food was ok.

Name: RBNY
Review: Food menu is very limited and tasteless. Much better rooftops available in NYC.

Name: AlihaW
Review: Love love love. I came here for my birthday brunch. I love the atmosphere. I took so many pictures. The food was good. I got the crispy chicken sandwich that came with french fries. The fries were great 😆 but the sandwich could have been better. Overall I’m glad I came here for my 19th birthday, I was literally smiling the entire time 😊.

Name: Rtopnyc
Review: The reason I wanted to come back here was for the Empire State Building view. During covid the rooftop was wide open so you can have great photos. Last Saturday was a disappointment because the rooftop was covered in plastic cheap windows blocking this view. It did not feel like a rooftop bar at all. The decors are great but I wish those ugly cheap plastic windows were not there! I cannot see the Empire State Building clearly because of this. What a letdown! The service and hosts were great though!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Molto comodo per noi che soggiornavamo al Moxy Hotel che si trova sotto il rooftop.
Atmosfera magica è molto buone anche le proposte della cucina. Da consigliare!

Name: Samia
Review: Great ambience and decor. Good tasted great but limited food options for people.

Name: GloriaB
Review: Yes, I would recommend it to my friends, it’s a beautiful rooftop, decorations were amazing, I love every detail.

Name: Mike
Review: I had reservations and my table wasnt fully ready when I got there. So I had to wait a bit. One of the pictures area were closed for a private party, I think they should advise on their social media when that's happening.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We didn’t eat, but all the drinks we tried were great, service was attentive, DJ plated good music, and the actual venue is so cute

Name: Trendykulturee
Review: The dj sucked the food was horrible very blaned  the glasses where dirty not enough food to pick from on the menu bad customer service drinks were over priced and watery the Cesar salad had no tomatoes cucumbers just lettuce and dressing it was my birthday my friends didn't like it and it was embarrassing they where very unorganized

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Awesome! Great food and music!!!!!

Name: KacieMirisaAlmond
Review: I came here for my birthday with my best friends and it was really nice. I just wish that I could’ve taken photos on the pink stairs they have but was told we couldn’t go on that side. But otherwise, the drinks were good and strong. The food was good too. I will definitely come back.

Name: StereotypeRebel
Review: We didn't actually have food, just drinks. It was a great time overall, but I highly recommend making reservations.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Food was horrible and overpriced. The servers never asked if we needed additional drinks. The music was extra loud.

Name: MichelleG
Review: The place is lovely, but it is too expensive and the waitress are unkind

Name: GregoryM
Review: I didn’t order any food but I had to give it a rating in order to proceed

Name: kanzaH
Review: An absolutely  delightful rooftop ambience with a gorgeous floral decorated carousel for all my girls who appreciate  picturesque spots. COOL animated statues, good music and great views to cherish Summer evenings.

Name: NathalieP
Review: Drinks and food are really good. Beautiful decorations. Great place for a date or friends get together

Name: CarolynR
Review:
First the website says for the brunch reservations is "recommended". It also says all ages 11:30-3pm. Nowhere does it say that if you do not have a reservation you cannot enter with child as you would have to sit at bar and child not allowed. So turned up after driving hour and half to be told I cannot enter for brunch with my 19 year old. Now prior to going I had tried to get the "recommended" reservations but no open spots. Realizing my dilemma the security (brightest part of my visit...he was so gracious and helpful) advised me to try again for a reservation which now was suddenly available. Only now I had to almost 2 hours wait. If not for my daughter obsession with pink I would've left.  so again my friendly security suggested I go next door and relax until my time. 

My time comes and now I'm told they only have seats on the carousal...at this point its whatever. Now for the meal. First I literally had to send twice for someone to pay attention. Ordered and waited a bit. The salad was horrible...lettuce bitter and old. Everything else was just ok. Had to remind them of my cotton candy order when I was asking for my bill. Attention was just lacking.

Otherwise the ambiance was not what it looks like on the internet .. actually heard that comment made be a couple persons. I guess props are seasonal...flowers needed more pink and I'm guessing the lighting shows up better at nights.

All in all very disappointed. Did not meet my expectations. Shout out to the security...he was the best

Name: Laura
Review: Went for brunch. Fun Insta pic, but that’s about it.

Name: ZahavaS
Review: It was a party of 7 celebrating my daughters bday/graduation on Sunday July 24th at noontime. It was a 95 degree day. The rooftop magic hour was extremely hot and uncomfortable. The AC was not enough to cool the room and they had NO FANS whatsoever for air circulation. We could not sit still or eat and many times left to take a walk indoors to get some AC relief. It was disruptive. The food came out before our drinks. We would have liked to have our cocktails first.  We waited 20-30 mins to get our drinks after food arrived. Not acceptable. It’s a pretty place but highly overrated.

Name: FrancesS
Review: Food and service were great. A bit overpriced but I get it …paying for the flower decor which was really pretty. It was just sooo hot. They definitely should have opened more windows on that hot day. Our server was great. Very attentive. Would try it again in the colder months.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Reunión Familiar

Name: AmyG
Review: It’s summer and it’s unusually hot so fans or other cooling features would help and be a nice addition. Ambience and photo ops were cute and fun. We had exceptional service once we entered the restaurant. We enjoyed Sunday brunch (first seating at 11:30) and indulged in the Pink AF pancakes with pink cotton candy. We also enjoyed the frittata with egg whites, Mushrooms and spinach. Generous portion. Mimosa? Yes please!!! Bathroom attendant was a very special touch. She had everything one may need to freshen up. You have to check large bags prior to going up to the restaurant-which was fine-but it was very confusing how to retrieve them upon departure. We had to ask several staff members how to find the checked bags which were behind a black curtained off area and then around and down a hallway. Down the rabbit hole! Not in a fun way. That could be a fun feature instead of a confusing mess. That and check-in could be improved upon. Check in attendants weren’t very welcoming and seemed rather irritated that we did not know where to stand. There was no signage and they expected all of us to stand on the grates on the outside of the sidewalk (most guests were wearing spiked heels so this was impossible for them). All in we were happy we had this experience.

Name: CamilleR
Review: Cool atmosphere, food is ok, it’s good but nothing special… drinks overpriced and watered down. All in all go there for a special occasion for a couple hours and move on. The service was good though!

Name: Wendy
Review: The service was bad everything was great until we talk with the waiter

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The carousel requires a reservation (max 2 people) although no one gave us any trouble when we took pictures at an empty table. If you go when the suns out just know there are NO fans on the rooftop. We went at 6:00 and stayed for one drink due to the heat. Although when we explored the left side of the rooftop (by the flower steps) it was a lot cooler. The sun had gone down a bit but I think it was because the doors were open to an air conditioned inside bar so you would catch a breeze there. My recommendation would be to ask to sit on that side and get up to take pictures on the other side if you would like a photo op AND the cute drinks. I would go ag

Name: pineapplemangocherry1234
Review: Aesthetically pleasing. Food was ok. We ordered fries, chips and dips and shrimp tacos. It’s a nice place to take pictures, have appetizers and drinks. If you want a full course meal, I wouldn’t suggest it. But overall, Great service across all staff (i.e., elevator staff, bathroom staff, server). One of the staff came to our table a few times to make sure we were comfortable and all our needs were met. I don’t know his name but I think he introduced himself as the manager. It was a little hard to hear. But he was pleasant. I also liked that we didn’t feel rushed to leave our table. I would go back again.

Name: CarolM
Review: 7/23/22 We went for a Birthday it was a very nice atmosphere the aesthetics were very beautiful! Pictures came out great the food was OK More of quick bites than a full menu the drinks were excellent we really enjoyed the indoor bar our server was a bit slow didn’t come to our table that much but I think it’s because she was handling all the tables in the outdoor section we were sitting at? Not to sure. It was a very HOT day maybe fans would help? The bartender at the indoor bar was very nice and gave us some recommendations on cocktails to try.

Name: ErikaR
Review: Best rooftop for food and pictures in NYC!! I am definitely going back!!

Name: Mecho
Review: The place is beautiful obviously is a roof top in NYC. Reason for my poor rating is as follow, I am understand is the summer however AC or even fan needs to be available for guess and employees.   My sister almost faint because of how hot was during brunch.  When I ask the the hostess, her answer was “is a rooftop” what can you expect.  I work for customer services and a better answer need to be available.  Their employees were dying because of the heat, they were great however it is unethical to have them work under those conditions.  Food was great, location perfect. However is the summer, it was hot. They need to have at least a fan or AC since the rooftop was cover available for their client.ma.  Hostess need to be retrained. Department of labor needs to be involve.

Name: KaheliaA
Review: The atmosphere was really good and the food was amazing it was just super hot.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Everyone was so nice and helpful and sweet such a great experience for our time in NYC!!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Busy night

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great Atmosphere and amazing service. Enjoyed being seated/served on the Floral Carousel and the beautiful decor. Lively music and people.

Name: LuandaL
Review: Such a beautiful location and yummy cocktails!!! The music was great and so was the views!!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Love this lounge and hope to go back again soon!

Name: marcusm
Review: My visit was just ok . Very limited food options . I would rate the food a 4 out of 10.  Service was very slow . Temp outside was 102 they had no fans or Ac . Desert was st

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Was great everything an view an the site wonderful, definitely will recommend it and will be going again

Name: GabyS
Review: I really appreciate the service and the help they provided me to change my table.

Name: Kassandra
Review: The service from the waitress was the worst we ever tried.

Name: KLBaze
Review: Great location, delicious food, awesome cocktails and lively atmosphere.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Went to see the carousel nothing special. Sat down on the table it was so sticky we asked them to clean it it was still sticky. Not many food options ! Drinks where not so good

Name: KimS
Review:
Everyone just focussing on taking selfies on the "carousel". It is really annoying when you wanna eat and you have the table just next to it.
But the view is quite nice at sunset.

Name: Judith
Review: This place looked great in pictures, the food and drinks were alright. The service, not that great. I asked for some cutlery because I ordered food and it took almost 5 minutes. NY has so many good rooftops, I'd go somewhere else

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: This was a HORRIBLE experience. It was extremely overpriced, hot and humid, and very slow service. I made a reservation for my birthday but i wish I hadn’t. They made things 10xs more complicated than it needed to be. The waitress was terrible, so slow and basically absent. She clearly did not want to serve us but was so attentive to the groups around us. Then she out loud called me the B word to a bunch of her coworkers at the bar and in front of guest. Why would she do that you ask? Because after 30 minutes of waiting and not checking on my table i went up to her at the bar and asked for the check. Very kindly, after she had Ignored my table all night on my birthday, might i add. Then when i turned away to walk back is when she said it. And My whole party say her do it. We were shocked. I have never had that experience or heard of that happening in my life and i have worked in service for years. It’s so unbelievable, unprofessional and unacceptable. I went to tell the manager what happened and she was awful to deal with and not helpful in the least. She would not even apologize and said to me, “well I wasn’t there so I can’t apologize for her. I’ve never had this happen before so how should i handle it? I don’t know what to do. I didn’t hear what she said so I just can’t apologize for her. Should I get you some water?” This manager handled it so horribly, was absolutely useless and unhelpful on my birthday. I clearly didn’t matter to them as a customer or even as a human being. I will never return and none of my guests will either. Disgusting and unprofessional people work here.

Name: KJshares
Review: Saw this place on IG and wanted to check it out! The space is beautiful, with a lit merry go round that is totally Insta-worthy, floral walls, and views of the Empire State Building. Unfortunately, that’s where the good experience ended. Our waitress brought us water - and there were lipstick stains on the glasses. When we brought this to her attention, she didn’t apologize but merely replaced the glasses. The food is “cafeteria” food at best - dry chicken tenders and plain sliders. The fries were tasty. We were so disappointed, we left before we even ordered drinks. Won’t be coming back again.

Name: MarlynJ
Review: Worst server ever 😒😒😒😒😡 food is too 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Anniversary

Name: ClarrissaM
Review: It was my birthday and I enjoyed myself the entire time. Great ambiance and food.

Name: Christian
Review: The chairs are so dirty, we didn’t like that. They need to get clean. We not recommend this place

Name: MojoP
Review: If you are into ambience and an Instagram worthy venue, then this spot is perfect. It took about 30 plus minutes before a server came to our table. By that time we just ordered drinks, paid the tab and left without ordering food. Too much selfie takers which got in the way of the servers and busers! Real flowers would’ve been better decor wise but I guess that would be too hard to maintain. Will try again on a less busy and less humid day!

Name: SanFort
Review: The drink I had was tasty. The ice cream was yummy!

Name: CherlyGyrl
Review: Omg this place was amazing 5stars. Very professional and I’m very happy with how they handle my birthday 7/17!! I was able to seat 9 of my friends including myself. Big shout out to Elizabeth Tenzyk, she reached out to me and helped at the last min. Thank u guys soooo much!!!! ❤️❤️❤️

Name: Jmw95
Review: It was an ok experience. Good for tourists.

Name: MelissaG
Review: Had a great time celebrating my birthday at Magic Hour! Our server was so sweet and attentive. Only issue was that we were somehow sharing a table with another party who was super rude to my guests, so I'm unsure if they were really supposed to be there or were just trying to take up space.

Name: AnthonyS
Review: Really loved the time at Magic Hour rooftop. Our waitress was on her A1 game. My only disappointment was the food, it was just dry.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The menu very short, need more waiters Music was good after a certain time wish we was able to walk around without my card being charged. Not a place i would come to again

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Beautiful place !! Horrible over priced food . I’m glad I ate before I got there . The place nice for pictures

Name: DonnishaJ
Review: If you're looking for the ambience, this is the place. However, if you looking for good food, you should skip this place.  Food was not seasoned,  Guacamole was bland and the pricing of food is outrageous based on the taste. Good music.

Name: AsiaShay
Review: Me And My Friends Had So Much Fun For My Bridal Shower Dinner. The Place Was Beautiful!!

Name: EugeneM
Review: Food was okay, nothing special especially for the price point. Service was practically non-existent despite the place appearing to be overstaffed. Table service should have been better and can definitely be improved. Cute spot for photos but not good for much else.

Name: NatashaJM
Review:
It was very quiet on the day of our reservation, yet despite this the service was nothing short of abysmal. Staff didn’t seem like they wanted to be there, with the exception of the man who walked us to the elevator on the way out who was friendly and chatty. Our server was quite frankly miserable and forgot about us the majority of the time - had to ask multiple times for water, once food was brought to table she didn’t come back to check on us or see if we wanted to order more drinks etc. 
the food itself wasn’t great…the Cesar salad wasn’t great, and definitely wasn’t Cesar dressing. Fries were decent but not hot, the pink AF pancakes were nice but most definitely not worth the $45 for minimal toppings. 
It is also a rooftop with zero air conditioning or fans - not the most comfortable of experiences on a 90 degree day. 
The aesthetic is beautiful and clearly makes for great Instagram pics, but I think it’s a case of style and looks over substance - would not return.

Name: DeeptiS
Review: It was my first visit and I totally loved the experience

Name: Suze
Review: Attempted to go here for brunch. Difficult to find the door and then we had to wind around and stop to pass through several security and hostess stands for no reason and check a bag. Very few people at venue except several women in sparkly attire taking lots of photos in front of cringey backdrops. No one was there and no view. Very limited and pricey menu. It was broiling hot and no cool place to sit. Slow service. We left and found brunch elsewhere.

Name: Emily
Review: Service not great, took a while for the waitresses to come over and take our drinks order. We was celebrating a honeymoon and nothing was mentioned even though they asked if any special occasion on booking.

Name: KarV
Review: Went for dinner with my girls and it was such an amazing experience.  Beautiful place and the atmosphere is amazing!!

Name: JOHNDOE
Review: Got kicked out because my friend was black . And was in the bathroom too long . racist environment . Fire the manager . security was helpful though .

Name: Diana
Review: Celebrated my 40th birthday with family and friends. The atmosphere is amazing and the service was pleasing.

Name: MariahJ
Review: The customer service was great, the view was good, but I did not care too much about the food menu and the mixed drinks were interesting. I was expecting more of a variety.

Name: GSiii
Review: Food wise was ok. Style is more appetizer more than anything.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The food is a lie. The donuts just have sprinkles on them, and the pretzels only come with mustard, no cheese. No warning on either of these. The drinks were good tho!

Name: SenK
Review: Great vibes, pretty decor, amazing views, and tasty drinks! I loved that the music was loud but I could still talk at a pretty normal voice level to the person who was with me and we could hear each other just fine!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Rude employees, ambiance is beautiful. Would not come back.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Came to hang out with my friend, for a mommy’s day out and I enjoyed myself will be back again!

Name: PrettyB
Review: Extremely rude and poor service by the floor manager who seated us. We booked for our anniversary and we were seated in a corner with no view of anything. The Empire State or the carousel were not In sight. The restaurant was split into 2 parts and we were seated in the part where there was only 1 other occupied table. The to other people that had reservations were seated on the carousel side. The drinks were served in dirty plastic glasses. When we left the same hostess/floor manager did not lift her head up to say thank you or bye. Avoid at all costs! Tourist trap! And I would suggest you offer customer service to the lady seating people yesterday. I am a business owner myself and I would be disgusted if any of my customers were made to feel this way. PHD terrace is a much nicer place experience. Such a shame as we had planned our day around coming to Magic hour.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Parfait expérience top

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: It’s a cool spot with fun decor however our waitress was subpar. She was rude about taking our order. She never asked if we wanted another drink or more food. She never came to ask how everything was. We had to get up and ask her for the check because she never came back to the table. She was busy on her phone hanging behind the bar. I would hope some of the other servers gave better service because it really is a cool spot to be in Manhattan.

Name: MarthaP
Review: Not enough food items in menu. Menu should consist of real food rather than bar food. Disappointed with menu

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great experience. Although prices are a little bit high and not proportional to drink amount, loved the place, the vibe and the welcoming!

Name: TatianaV
Review: I loved it. The birthday girl really enjoyed it. A lot of nice photo spots. Will definitely go back.

Name: JaneD
Review: Fun and cheery atmosphere

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Birthday dinner

Name: NajM
Review: not what i expected. it was hot and smelly. service was okay

Name: NaveedS
Review: Ambience was way too good! there was not many options in brunch menu. You should definitely work on verity of food. We were 7 people and all ordered same spicy chicken sandwich with was not even outstanding. Fries and drinks were good. Next time if i am not with kids me and my husband will definitely visit in the evening time.

Name: UppityGirl
Review: The $20 drink was served in dirty plastic and was extremely diluted. It’s a very cheap tourist trap with filthy decor. But everyone does it for the ‘gram.

Name: Pearla
Review: The food was delicious and a bit expensive. I do wish they had more options for the brunch menu. They do not offer booster seat if you bring a child that needs one. The tables were a bit small. Overall I would go back again

Name: ElanaD
Review: Get the pink pancake stack! A fun place for a sisters brunch with great food, cocktails and views!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The floor tiles move??? And they’re really slippery, but i didnt fall , ambiance was great, views were great, food was eh, i wouldnt order food here ngl but their drinks are very tasty

Name: MERRICK
Review: Overall, very solid dining experience. The space / decor is the star. Very picturesque if you’re into that.  The music selection was nice too.  The food and drinks are good.  The service was friendly and prompt.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great for Instagram, not great if you actually want to eat

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Mi cumpleaños número 45 y fue un sueños gracias 😘

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Waited a bit for a server, but they more than made up for it… and of course, the ESB view!

Name: Fabiola
Review: Service was great, the food menu was very poor but it was a beautiful place. I was expecting a lot more. The bottle menu too expensive.

Name: CarlynV
Review: I believe that my sister and I were racially profiled as security had to ensure that we paid and kept us until I showed receipt. It was embarrassing as there were other guests but in the kindest way, i had to show all 4 security card the receipt before leaving. It was humiliating, disrespectful and without warrant. 0/10 recommended if you dont fit a certain box

Name: ChirstyH
Review: Visited at night and loved the views so much we decided to come back to see during the day. It was very hot, the cocktails were nice, but quite strong. The setting is lovely and backdrop with flowers.

Name: Jenn
Review:
The food was below average! This is more of happy hour spot, not a birthday dinner. I asked for the directions to the bathroom, came back 10 mins later & the waiter gave my table away! Threw out my food & drinks everything….. they resat us at a different table and had to reorder the food & drinks. 
The mini tacos was the size of two quarters. Glitter donuts were soft on bottom and hard as a brick on top with glitter smh
 However pictures are photo opps were great here! Very pretty carousel & good music!

Name: Lexi
Review: This place is magical. The views of the city are stunning. The service is absolutely awful, once you’re served your food and drinks there is no follow up and you have to chase down staff. But that’s to be expected, when a place is this popular you don’t have to have good service. I would still highly recommend it for the city views, the great music and delicious drinks.

Name: MauroP
Review: very cool experience, good drink, good food, Amazing view

Name: Arnel
Review: Food was  nothing special at all! Cold Tortillas and service not that nice, drinks extremely expensive.. over all really just a super expensive „instagram spot“ and NOTHING more!!! Not recommend at all!!! We paid 10$ for one cupcake that was ice cold!!!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We made a reservation because this place advertised for viewing the fireworks from their roof top. Absolutely could not see them. The view of the Empire State Building was great, but it is very loud music with only small plates on the bar menu.

Name: AliciaL
Review: This was a fun spot - Although they got my wine order wrong and we orginally went there on the 4th of July 2022 to see the fireworks.  The website stated that this was a great place to VIEW the fireworks - We could only see a sliver of a few high fireworks.  FALSE ADVERTISEMENT in my opinion.  I was quite annoyed leaving being that I wanted to enjoy seeing the NYC East side fireworks and they could not be seen.

Name: Frank
Review:
Absolutely the perfect place for some good Instagram pictures! The vibe is awesome, there are cool people, and the music is always on point.
However, the service is terrible. We waited at least 30 minutes before being able to order food and drinks. They are definitely understaffed, so I don't necessarily blame the employees, but I'm expecting a better service if I'm paying $20 per drinks.
There are sooooo many rules: I had a bottle of wine wrapped as a gift for a friend. I could not bring it with me. As soon as we checked in, they told us we had the table for 1 hour 45 minutes only. I had a plastic bottle of water that I could not bring with me, so they asked me to throw it away or drink it all. 
After 1 hour 45 minutes, I asked the server if we were allowed to stay and the answer was "yes, as long as you keep drinking." That's not an answer that I really appreciated.
I will never go back, but it's worth trying. ONCE.

Name: Bernadette
Review: Food and drinks we’re good - food menu is small & service was a little slow but overall, it was a good experience and everything was beautiful

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Didn’t enjoy the drinks- the wine wasn’t well aged and the cocktails were too sweet. Couldn’t feel/taste any alcohol in it. For a place that’s so highly priced drinks were served in plastic glasses which were dirty!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Tourist trap

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The service was wonderful. Very kind workers there that helpede make my friend's birthday special. If you want very cute Instagram pictures, come here!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Beautiful place and food was delicious.

Name: MikG
Review: yayyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy so fun

Name: Lexp
Review: Super fun and cute

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Super fun place and great for pictures! The food wasn’t anything spectacular, but the ambiance is what makes the place! Great drinks as well!

Name: HayleyC
Review:
This please is more for 21-30 age range,  I observed some quite rowdy behaviour,  young people drunk/high  and acting quite wild. 
Luckily we reserved seats and we able to keep them for the night. As the night went on the ambience improved, great setting  and service was good. Would probably choose somewhere a bit more refined next time.

Name: Stephanie
Review:
The place looks AMAZING the entire experience was super cute! However.... we sat for over 25 min before a waiter even addressed us ( sitting on the rooftop hot & thirsty ) we ordered 2 items to eat and only received one.. 
The drinks though were really good! I'd go here again for sure. Just less expectations on service

Name: SylvieN
Review: the waitress forgot all about me and my guest and we got up to take some pictures left everything at the table and she gave our table away

Name: ErickaO
Review: Maria the manager is very rude and racist i had a large group it was my birthday and she asked me was we gonna be ok with the bill they cant split it a thousand ways. etc.. I never felt racist or that type of feeling at a restaurant. I'm actually a nurse and my whole party is a group of professional women

Name: MelyRose
Review: I really love this place I had a nice time that I spent on my birthday. The food and the drinks are a little pricey. The food was good however they need more food options. But the scenery was beautiful and the rooftop bar was really nice. I wish it was a higher scenery though.

Name: NeaA
Review: It was alright overall.  It’s beautiful but the customer service wasn’t the best. I’d recommend if you want to get some nice pictures.

Name: MikeG
Review: Went here for my birthday, but the food was gross as if was laying in the sun until someone order it. My party if 5 wasn't happy either! Won't be coming here again. Atmosphere was nice though.

Name: ChristianaI
Review: Super fun place to hang. The prices are expected for a midtown rooftop bar but otherwise it’s a cool spot!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great staff and ambiance !!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I did brunch here for my 28th birthday. The place is so pretty for pictures. The food was tasty. I also enjoyed a cosmopolitan since I didn’t care for the brunch drink selections. Overall a wonderful experience and I will be returning.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Evrething was very good
Recomended 100%
Excelent service

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Will be one of our special memories of being in NYC. Fantastic roof top views ot the Empire State Building. Sri ka weee expensive but that's NYC! Definately worth a visit.

Name: JuanG
Review: Nice place; service was quite slow and drinks are over priced

Name: Nina
Review: Over hyped. I wouldn’t recommend

Name: CaitlynF
Review: The WORST service EVER! My friends and I had a 2:45 reservation and were seated immediately, but no one came to our table for 20 minutes. We finally got up and asked on waitress about taking our order and she had an entire attitude. She FINALLY came over after another 10 mins of waiting and attempted to take our orders. Everything we tried to order she told us that they don’t have it anymore and then told us that the kitchen is actually closed… even as they are bringing food out to other tables. Tables that came in AFTER US!  Overall, horrible service! Would not recommend.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Very nice view. Drinks were good. The spot to take a picture was very nice. I just wish the service was nicer and more welcoming.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Such a fun birthday! Sitting on the carousel for brunch was definitely a cool experience. I love the beautiful view. The only thing I would add may be some outdoor fans - it was a hot one! but some extra breeze would be nice if that’s possible. But no complaints truly it was a gorgeous day and the food was great!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Waitress was very rude and service was poor. I would spent more money but she was so unconcerned about serving us. So disappointed.

Name: Lexxc
Review: Best Rooftop in the city

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great place great vibes m. Great for Instagram pictures @margaret_15

Name: Astew
Review: Great for photos and vibes… drinks are good with creative names … food NOT SO GOOD!

Name: MamaB
Review: Very colorful and great atmosphere. Severs, staff were a 10.

Name: MISSMTA
Review: Awesome and cute spot for photos ! Staff is fun and pink is a must lol

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Drinks were good. Food was just ok. A little loud for our particular taste. Felt the vibe was somewhat touristy

Name: MONICAO
Review:
Wonderful place , like in a dream . 
Service not so good .
Music perfect.

Name: Uniquestar629
Review: Had a great time celebrating my birthday here with my girls. The food was good and the views were amazing! Loved the atmosphere and service was better than I expected.

Name: ReenaP
Review: We had a great time! The service was outstanding.

Name: DeniseA
Review:
Great Place good atmosphere. 
good food and drinks 
Will go again.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The food and drinks were awesome, the servers were very nice and paid good attention to their tables. Overall a good value for money. Their rooftop with view of empire state building was awesome.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Too much excitement, rules and hype at the door just to check in to your table only to get mediocre food and cocktails. The service was great! Dont get me wrong. But I don't need a list of rules when I'm trying to just eat food and have a drink.  We had to check our bags. Mandatory. WHY! I'm going to a table that I have reservations for.  Then they demanded 2 hour limit. WHY! No one was really interested in our table after we left.  Well... Honestly that's the price you pay for hanging in Midtown. I don't plan on going back.

Name: JulieS
Review: Drinks were average - especially considering the price. Not sure why they were served in plastic glasses. The ambience / photo op was what we went for.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Was super excited to go here but I was a little let down..it was over 80 degrees on the rooftop. We waited 30+ min to order and watched others sit down and get food before we even got to order. Food was ok. Drinks were ok. I was not impressed

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: PERFECT BRUNCH SPOT! I loved the vibe of this restaurant, very trendy and pretty and perfect for a mid-day brunch. This was our last stop before heading back into Boston & im glad we came here! I wish we had came here at night but it was still fun & the view was amazing! I definitely recommend the mimosa tower, cheeseburger sliders & the chicken sandwich. 10/10.

Name: TanishaS
Review:
Poor customer service 
Food was tasteless, no flavor

Name: shawntayeh
Review:
Went to Brunch 
The menu is very limited,need more variety but the ambience is everything 
So bright and beautiful 
Really enjoyed the friendliness of the employees

Name: CairaB
Review: Had an amazing time with my friends enjoying drinks and dancing. The DJ was amazing playing a mix of old r&b hits with today’s music definitely coming back

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Went there during the late night entertainment. Menu is limited so I didn’t have much to choose from. The drinks were a bit on the weak side. The atmosphere was very nice though. Our waitress Jasmine was very attentive and pleasant.

Name: JessicaA
Review: Everything was great but we didn’t like the food selection menu

Name: Leslie
Review: Good Afternoon, we came from out of town we drove 4 hours just to visit this restaurant, our waiter did not accommodate us at all, we had to keep asking for water, we were on the 18th floor with 89 degree weather, when we told her our food was cold and the order was messed up, she just stared at us and asked what do you want me to do, we also waited 20 mins for 2 Pepsi, we spoke to an supervisor that was on schedule for that day at 3:30pm ( can not recall his name ) he didn’t seem to care about any of our complaints we had. Overall the place itself is nice but me and my 5 friends will not return to the this establishment.

Name: Ally
Review: Was very Disappointed with the whole experience to be totally honest

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: had a reservation for 10:15, we were not seated until 10:45 and waited another 15 minutes to be waited on only after asking a worker passing by. drinks were great and unique and ambiance was fun

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We all had a great time. Service was great on a busy day.

Name: DDJJ
Review: The drinks were great, the food was good, the service was great, the view was amazing, and the decor was fantastic. It’s a place for aspiring nyc influencers to get content. Not all other guests are respectful that some people are just there for dinner, drinks, and time with friends.

Name: HayleyG
Review: Great place for friends to catch drinks. Very instagramable place.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great ambiance! The food was delicious! Loved the place!

Name: Arod0601
Review: I had a great experience. The waitress was so nice and the food/drinks came out in a timely manner. Definitely will return for another outing.

Name: Simone
Review: food was mediocre, had to flag down the waitress multiple times.

Name: SobaTG
Review: Beautiful views.  Very cool place.  It's a big Instagram spot so there are many many people standing around posing for extended amounts of time.  It's a must for about an hour.  Be sure to make reservations ahead of time.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: perfect place if you want magical outdoor rooftop bar and if you want insta pics in new york city👌

Name: KeiraG
Review: Everything was very nice, food menu needs some improvement and waitress was inattentive. The staff was very nice and helpful

Name: MoniqueM
Review: I’m sure as many others, I learned about the Magic Rooftop thru social media. They have a fun, inviting presence that makes you want to see it for yourself. I hosted a meet up with some ladies (total 4 of us) to have an early dinner at the Magic Rooftop. Upon arrival, I noticed the space is a lot smaller than I had anticipated given the pics, but it is still beautiful and fun. Food isn’t amazing but it is tasty. I had the chicken sandwich. It didn’t seem as high end as I expected given the Tao brand but it was fresh, hot, and pretty good as far as taste. I opted for the low battery drink which was delicious. My only issue here is that the dining staff are rude. The hostess, door man, and everyone else were great. But we had rude dining staff that came to our table, dropped the check (literally) then walked away. They never asked if we wanted anything else or if we were OK, just dropped the check on the table and walked away. We actually had wanted to purchase more drinks but that went out the window when they did that. In addition, one of the staff members walked to our table, as we were talking, interjected himself in between the two of us, to look at the signed receipt copy. No apology, just randomly grabbing the receipt to see if my friend had signed it. Another instance, was me asking about getting my reward points and the waitress rolling her eyes after I asked 3 times and she promised she would get me an answer, only to give me the wrong answer. The cake topper however, was my group and I in mid conversation, and a staff member walked over and put a reservation sign on the table and began to clean the table, as if we weren’t there. I understand there is a 90 minute dining time but we never received a warning that our time was up or even approaching. This had to be among the worst dining service I can recall. I highly doubt I’ll return in the future but thanks for the experience.

Name: YuleidyV
Review: I love the place I’m coming back again in a few weeks ❤️❤️❤️

Name: Keisha
Review: Waitress kept skipping over my table she had to be called repeatedly, wasn’t offered water but the ppl next to us was! Yeah I’ll never go back!

Name: ClareS
Review: Fantastic  afternoon at this lovely rooftop bar , we all had the best time

Name: ManyaB
Review: We love the staff, food & the vibe of this place! Must visit!!!!!

Name: FoodisLife
Review: Waitress was horrible. Took her 40 plus minutes before coming over to us. Keep in mind we only had the table for an hour and thirty minutes. Once she got our first round of drinks and food orders we never saw her again. Overall bad service.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
As a group coming to Magic Hour we loved the ambience.
The drinks were good, although the Momager could’ve been a little bigger for the price but it was strong. The food was mediocre

Name: GabrielleH
Review: Amazing atmosphere, great food, and the music choice was perfect for the crowd. We went for brunch and although the brunch menu is small everything that our table ordered was delicious!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Bachelorette

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: My birthday!!!!!!

Name: MichealS
Review:
The atmosphere and music is really good. You should add more items to the late night menu we didn't have enough choices to choose from.

Thank you.

Name: Brit
Review: A must visit if you are into rooftops and nightlife :)

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We had my girlfriends bridal shower. It was the best thing ever. From the food, to the drinks, to the ambience. The best night of our lives in NY!

Name: JanaP
Review:
The food was great but the menu is very limited. 
The drinks weren’t strong and overpriced but Mr.pink is a good selection. It’s really a place to take photos

Name: Sarah
Review: Definitely for people under 30. Very loud with Instagram photo ops. Drinks were so so but guac was good. Very hot on roof so come prepared. View is solely Empire State Building, so good for visitors but nothing New Yorkers will rave about if you’ve been here a while. Overall wouldn’t recommend to a friend.

Name: yeii
Review: The place is amazing if your going for scenery and drinks but if you are going for food be prepared to pay high prices for basic food (sliders ,chicken tenders, fries ,etc) but like I said If ur just going for drinks and for a great place to take photos it’s very nice and very friendly. Great location

Name: ShaquanaH
Review: Beautiful backdrop and background drinks was cute and the atmosphere was superb

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Food is Mediocre. Food option very limited

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Visited with friends! Loved the ambiance! It was very loud, service was slow, and food was ok.

Name: ChefCarols
Review: What an amazing experience!  We went for my birthday celebration, and we absolutely loved the atmosphere.  Sipping cocktails on a NYC rooftop surrounded by beautiful flowers?  Yes, yes, yes!

Name: ShravanthiB
Review: This place had the best vibe. Top notch ambience and great alcohol. The views from the rooftop are brilliant.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Last year when I visited Magic Hour it was great! You had beautiful views of the city which made up for the overpriced drinks. 

Our most recent visit was less than satisfying. Our server seemed annoyed the entire time and there were zero views of the city.

Name: Luna
Review: I had a reservation at 6pm and did not get seated until an hour later. Other than that,  it was a great experience with lots of photo ops. Very little to no interaction with waiters/ waitresses.

Name: Kmidd
Review: Not exactly what is portrayed on Social Media but definitely a nice spot to have a drink and people watch.

Name: TimothyM
Review: Extremely loud. Could barely speak with my partner across the table from me. Horrible service. Took forever to get our bill, over 30 mins of our waitress ignoring us.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Really beautiful concept but I would imagine it looks better at night. Feels alittle dirty in the day time but beautiful for pictures none the less. Food is mediocre and very expensive. VERY expensive for what you get. Service was just ok. We had our order taken and the waitress didn’t really check on us again until we asked for the check.  Pink AF pancakes were good and some of the drinks were yummy. Others tasted like nothing. Definitely cute for a special occasion for pictures but we won’t be back

Name: Abby
Review: First time coming here at night (as opposed to the weekend brunch). Despite having a reservation, we had to wait over 30 minutes for a table and were told to just wait by the bar. The entire area was packed though so not the most pleasant experience. Once we were seated things did get much better. The servers were kind (once they finally came to our table) though clearly a bit stressed and overworked. The snacks and drinks are good but obviously very overpriced for what they are. The ambiance and vibe of the rooftop is nice for sure, but was significantly less enjoyable than my brunch experience due to the packed nighttime crowds.

Name: TimW
Review: Had a big group, reserved a table. Great atmosphere and setting. Perfect close out to our night. Great view from the roof top and despite it being very crowded service was great. Very lively crowd. Had a great time and will go back.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: New York City’s largest indoor/outdoor hotel rooftop bar and lounge features an “urban amusement park” with adult sensibilities, epic Empire State Building views, a rotating carousel, an oversized topiary garden, and Foreplay—a putt-putt golf course populated by flirty animal sculptures. Check this one out for a fun girls nights out!!!

Name: AubreeL
Review: Food was horrible. The waitress was great but the food and the experience wasn’t all that!

Name: Sactha
Review: Very nice place.magic rooftop. Thes rose Martin. I love the magic in city.im recommended yesssss

Name: SCMTL
Review: We had to wait to be seated at a table despite having made a reservation well in advance and were eventually seated at a table near the bar which is not at all what we were expecting. We were not even given utensils, water or napkins! Do not recommend at all!

Name: laura
Review: Another overrated, over priced rooftop.

Name: Diana
Review:
I booked a table for 6.30pm and they only gave me a table at 8pm. Bad management and consideration for the clients.
I like the place and the ambience but the service was very bad.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Was excited for the carousel portion but was told on arrival that it’s been booked for private event so can’t go.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: magical place with my favorite person my babe 🥰🥰❣️❣️

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I had a blast very good play list and preety scenary.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: A nice rooftop bar with partial views of New York. Good vibe, typical NYC type roof bar. Would recommend it.

Name: KeishaG
Review: I had a great time celebrating my birthday! This place is a vibe. However, my drink order took quite a while to get to me.

Name: MoniqueM
Review: This was not what I expected. I was not impressed with the atmosphere or food. I would not recommend this place to a friend.

Name: MaritaC
Review: My bff and I made a reservation for after a Broadway musical. Service was fast and good, cocktails outstanding, food was good too. New York prices but not over the top. The ambiance is Instagram perfect and every girls dream for pics! Good music too!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Arrived Sunday @ 3 for my birthday celebration. Hostess came over told us we could still order brunch. But only took our request for water at about 3:15  and didn’t come back to the table till 20mins later to then say brunch was over and we would have to wait till 4 to then be only able to order from the “dinner menu” that consisted of about 10 items. Fries, salads, tacos, sliders, chicken tenders. I was devastated!!! Originally I wanted steak but All I wanted in the end was eggs and bacon thinking that is the easiest request. But to no avail I got nothing. I was promised at least bacon on my sliders which later was denied. Waitress offered us complimentary desserts and drinks. Which got me excited since it was my birthday… We got nothing. Music was also poor and not diverse at all. Nonetheless Food did taste good however we were starving by the time we got it and I would’ve eaten anything by that point. Place is decent for a celebration due to the beautiful Aesthetics. I would recommend Kimoto rooftop or 235th over this place for good food & music over this place

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The ambiance was chefs kiss. It  of my expectations anymore. It was for a very special birthday for my daughter turned four and the atmosphere is welcoming and the server and attendant were extremely helpful and courteous. In addition, the jewelry box was amazing. The only downside was that I wanted the cake I’m gonna

Name: Saury
Review: It was good

Name: ArelysN
Review: Absolutely atrocious experience! We were sat in the beaming sun in 90 degree weather with no umbrella, our table was too hot to even be touched. We asked the hostess immediately if our table could be moved she said as soon as another table would become available we could move. About 30 mins later, we still didn’t have our food or drinks another table became available and we asked to switch and they refused. We ended up calling over the manager Julian which was very rude and he said he would see what he could do about it. He never came back to our table. We ended up leaving without even ordering food because of how uncomfortable and rude the entire experience was. As we were leaving 7 other tables were available I approached the manager julian and asked him why he never returned to our table to assist us as he said he would. He just continued to be rude. This place has such potential but with management like this, will absolutely fail.

Name: KarenG
Review: Great food and service. Excellent views and decor.

Name: Abril
Review: Beautiful decor and nice brunch menu. Only issue, we had a group of 9 and server did not tell us until it was time to pay that they only take 1 or 2 credit cards. Would've been helpful to have known a head of time. In the end it worked out.

Name: MariaGarcia
Review: It was amazing, great food and good portions, the mimosas delicious and great for 3 people. The service was good and most important, the view.

Name: NupP
Review: Great birthday experience

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The drinks were yummy! The gluten free donuts were also really good. The atmosphere was kind of weird. People of a lot of different ages and vibes. Glad we had a table to sit at.

Name: JordanL
Review: We had reservations and we never saw a server. We had to constantly go up to the bar and fight the crowd. We were seated at a table and no one came over to us for 3 hours of us being there!!! Why?

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: My waited came once to the table and didn’t check on us since

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great !!! table was ready at reservations time food was good   And came out fast aa the drinks did also hostess was amazing very attentive and energetic… the whole vibe was amazing will definitely go back

Name: Marcus
Review: Website said “dressy” but people were up there dressed like straight trash. If I’d have known I’d have came in shorts and flip flops.

Name: MaddieC
Review: Charged $20 for waters we didn’t even order, waitress took forever to take our order. Drinks were empty for 20 min before she asked if we wanted another.

Name: NadiaS
Review: Magic hour rooftop was definitely a vibe! Amazing ambiance & friendly staff. Would recommend for sure!

Name: ErikaNoguchi
Review: Good music, nice views, refreshing drinks and good friends together. All perfect!

Name: DianaO
Review: Food and everything is perfect!!! The waitress was so nice

Name: Cherr
Review:
The ambience was beautiful!
Although the cutlery was dirty and wet.
The food quality was below average. Definitely worth improving since its a great looking place

Name: StephanieP
Review: It is an aesthetically pleasing place with beautiful decor and aura. The food was very mediocre (guac/chips and shrimp tacos), the drinks were super mediocre! But it’s really the aesthetic that is just beautiful <3

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: crazy drinks amazing ambiance!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Best night ever! Treated very well from the moment we stepped in and will definitely be back!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Young crowd and really loud music. Drinks were poor quality. Food options were very minimal. 
Ambiance was good for people in their early 20s at best. 
Decor was really pretty though.

Name: LavashaW
Review: The place was beautiful the food was horrible menu was little not much options

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Had to go to the bar many times to get our server while she was chatting

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Happy birthday

Name: A123
Review: Good vibes, nice decor and good 'rooftop' view. The food is a bit overpriced (bar food). Good for tourists / bring friends who are visiting the city, not a local go-to.

Name: nina
Review: Bit lame and tacky. Not worth the time getting there

Name: mymm
Review:
One of My favorite rooftop in New York, I just think this night wasn’t the best in service. First, half of the food was sold out, so not a lot of choices left. Second they forced us to pay on one credit card instead of divided only in 3, who I never had problem in the past. 
Just a little disappointed, I hope next time I will have a better service.

Name: SamanthaH
Review: We made a reservation days in advance for a friends birthday. Once we arrived, they seated us immediately but we did not get helped for atleast 20 minutes. Once we did get a server, we ordered one drink and then she never came back until I had to track her down. We ordered our food and it arrived timely and was overall good but she never came to check on us or to see if we needed anything else which we did. I ended up flagging down a different server to help me. There were only two of us and they would not split the check for us, so we paid together. Once she gave us the check, we noticed that we had been charged for there drinks when we had only 2. I could not find our server to help correct this so I had to flag down yet again another server to help get it corrected. Overall the price is too high for the crappy service. Go there if hire only looking for your Instagram photo and a $100 bill for 2 drinks and 2 entrees.

Name: Samantha
Review: The décor is lovely , great for instagram photos, very loud , more for drinking & enjoying than a restaurant

Name: kring
Review: I suppose that some people like places like this, but it was so loud I couldn't hear myself think.  And they were playing idiotic thump-thump music at ear-piercing volume.

Name: JasmineS
Review: We went for brunch and it was a good vibe plus beautiful setting. Need more brunch menu items but food was delicious. I had scrambled eggs with cheese, bacon, and seasoned potatoes and shared some of their mixed veggies. Overall I enjoyed the experience and will be visiting again

Name: NickS
Review: It was not as expected. The food was just okay. The decorations and seating is wonderful. I wanted to go to the Hidden Gem but it was not open.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Amanda C was our server and she was absolutely amazing she was so friendly very helpful when it came to us ordering.. we overall enjoyed everything and we’ll be back soon…

Name: FancySandye
Review:
My family and I had a wonderful time. The place was impressive and impeccable  just WoW 
Food, drink and dessert were top notch.
Definitely we will be back soon 
I tag you on IG 
Cheers,
Fancy_Sandye

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Ambience and place was great. Service was awful. Waitress took so long to take and bring our drinks. Then, after we paid, we left some cash for tip and she had the audacity to come to your table ask for some tip to be put on our tab. We were so speechless. My best suggestion is to train your employees and offer a better customer service because our experience could have been so good

Name: MadelineR
Review: Great place to have a nice evening with friends family and love ones.

Name: Iris9
Review: We went for drinks post a long day walking around and doing tours. Our waitress left to go get coffee from another shop so it took a while to get our checks.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I was really disappointed with our experience at magic hour. I had high expectations for this place and it was mortifying how awful it was. The service was terrible, the crowd was disgraceful, overall bad time. The tables were so dirty and sticky we didn’t even have silverware. Do yourself a favor and dont go here. Complete waste of time and money.

Name: SharellB
Review:
Food and service is trash but the drinks and photo ops 👌🏽

Our food came out before the water & cocktails.

Name: MrsRoman
Review: This is the kind of place you go to for the vibe and experience. Food is just okay. Not many options. Drinks are the same. It’s a place you go to once or twice for the experience and to take pics.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I traveled from out of town to patronize your establishment. The experience was horrible. The customer service was by far the worst. I spent $280 and wasn’t satisfied.

Name: JackieS
Review: The ambiance and food were superb!  We took great pictures and had an amazing time!

Name: EarlR
Review: lost our first food order, brought wrong food at second order

Name: StacyW
Review: Yeah the midnight dinner experience sucks but it's a nice place for drinks and pictures

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Absolutely beautiful venue, super fun and unique, not one to miss if you’re looking for a special venue in NYC. Could do with a little more variation in flavour for their standard cocktails - all had similar ingredients, a few of which we didn’t like. However the sharing ones are very lovely, just a bit pricier! Worth the visit and would definitely come back the next time we’re in the US.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Pink and girly. Very fun

Name: Vette
Review: This place is awesome. I celebrated my Pre birthday there with my Girls and we had a ball. The Ambiance is Spectacular, food and service was Great. I will definitely be back.

Name: DreneeB
Review: This place is a whole vibe! The atmosphere was great, the music was great, the service was pretty good but it got a lil busy so understandable. The drinks were made very well and the photo ops were awesome. I would definitely come here again

Name: JohannyH
Review: Terrible service, Terrible drinks, food was good.. I will never come back or recommend this place to anyone. It's a pretty place but you guys need to work on the service because everyone says the same thing about this place

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: That is awesome ✨ a beautiful place!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Magic Hour Rooftop bar was the epitome of WHIMSICAL 🌸 !!! I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for Instagram aesthetics and fanciful food! Even though my party and I were running a half hour late for our reservation, they still allowed us entry (with that being said, there’s really no way to contact them to let them know you are running late other than by email —but the OpenTable app will send you a text from them to inform you’re on your way!). Overall, an epic experience and I definitely plan on returning! From what I’ve seen on Instagram, their Christmas decor is also pink and MAGICAL!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The photos on Instagram are very misleading. It was okay, but not the experience it portrayed on Instagram.  We had reservations but were not sat at a table, they sat us on the lounge side.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I was coming from Baltimore and our reservations was at 12:45 we arrived on time just before the kitchen close and could not get served any food and the Waitress  was so rude it was unbelievable for my first time coming here I was very disappointed we were so hungry that we had to leave and go somewhere else to grab something to eat

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: First time and loved it I’ll be back

Name: BeckyM
Review: Really good experience. Great atmosphere. Nice cocktails. Only improvement would be if they had some vegan/dietary requirement foods on their menu.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: everything was pink which for me was awesome. Best birthday dinner ever, super cute. Must go to if you’re in New York!!! next time I come I want to try the brunch.

Name: RyanG
Review: Great environment & drinks but the food options could be a little better

Name: AllieG
Review: The food portions compared to the price was a little expensive, HOWEVER, the curated food and drinks were VERY GOOD.  The ambience was impeccable with the the rotating flower decorated seating carousel and interactive golf course. I personally had a Moira Rose Mocktail version which was recommended to me since I wasn't drinking at the time, and it was impressive for presentation and taste.  This place is definitely somewhere to revisit.

Name: AmandaZ
Review: amazing drinks, awesome staff and an incredible view!

Name: KianniJ
Review: I had high expectations for this spot. I don't think I've ever bought a 20 dollar cocktail and sent it back, but both our table and the table next to us agreed they were literally not drinkable. Same with the food. It was terrible. We took one bite and couldn't eat the rest. And don't get my started on the awful service. Save your time and money and don't go here.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Poor service and very pretentious. Got 1 drink served in 50 minutes

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Overrated, and somewhat disappointing. Felt like we put the server out by being there.

Picture you see on Instagram are really only of the carousel, other than that the venue is nothing special, and cocktail we had were if poor quality. 

Was a shame, as we were looking forward to visiting, over all the venue has potential but needs to improving and happier staff.

Name: SharonG
Review: Enjoyable time celebrating my friend's birthday. Nice atmosphere.

Name: Mooks
Review: Made a reservation which I suggest everyone does. Food was ok I wish there were more options after 5pm but I guess it’s fine. Didn’t get A server to come to us for over 15 mins and they only give you 90 mins at a table that’s what was pretty annoying especially since it wasn’t even busy. I had to call someone I saw that worked there from the bar who proceeded to ask me “do you have a reservation?” Which I replied yes and I’ve been sitting here for 15 mins. Their cocktails are subpar tbh the look pretty but taste meh. Just order a bottle of wine or champagne for your table honestly. Total rating 6/10 food is good, ambiance is good, music is good, aesthetically pleasing

Name: DebbieD
Review: Overall the experience was ok.  I have been wanting to go Magic Hour for a while because I heard good stories.  But for my first it wasn’t  what I expected.   I wish there was more of a selection when it came to their Brunch Menu.  Also drinks were warm.  I had to ask for Ice.   Because of the weather it was very warm, no Real Air circulating.

Name: Judy
Review: This was such a disappointment, i came here to celebrate my birthday with friends but this place is only if you want to take pictures and that’s it. My friend who is pregnant got a Cesar salad and my other friend got fries and lemonade to start. My friend didn’t eat her salad its was very dry and so was the fries. The lemonade tasted weird. When the waitress came we told her our order which included mimosas. 20 minutes later, still nothing. Not even the drinks. We had a 2pm reservation and it wasn’t crowded so I didn’t understand why everything was taking  long.  The only thing she was quick on was giving us a small Avian water bottle that was warm as hell when it was 80 degrees outside and it was more frustrating when we got the check and the 4 water bottles cost $20. Its not about the price, at least provide a cup with ice. The most frustrating part is when the waitress came back to check on us , i was wondering where was the rest of our order, our drinks and food???? I asked for the check so quick . We weren’t going to wait another 20-30 if I told her about the food because it seemed like she didn’t take down our order. I didn’t want to make a scene and argue. So we left. So 4 water bottles, 2 lemonades, one fries, and a Cesar salad — check was $54 for 4 people.

Name: Fernanda
Review: The decoration is amazing, but the service is bad.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Amazing place!!! Friendly staff.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great brunch. Emma was a great server. Manager very helpful in seating arrangements. Will be back. Thank you

Name: MariaP
Review: My night at the magic hour rooftop was awesome the lights and the scenery was beautiful and the music was awesome the drinks were amazing I took my mom out for her birthday and she loved it she wants to go again

Name: HatiquaS
Review: Our time at the Magic Hour was epic! It was just so hot! I spoke with security supervisor Nathan (who was awesome!) about a solution to the humidity and about 10 mins later we felt some air! The place was pack & busy so there was a lot of waiting for our waitress, but she did a great job tending to our needs. We wish the food menu was bigger, but it does the job. My party and I took so many pics around the entire roof top. Staff and music was great! Overall an amazing experience! Even in the bathroom too! The attendant offered to watch my phone & purse for me as there is no where to sit your belongings in the individual stalls. We will definitely be back! My suggestion, shelves in the stalls and fans for the outside areas that have overhead covering.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Went to magic rooftop for my 50th birthday celebration with a couple of friends arrive late table still deserve for me and had an amazing time

Name: Alena
Review: The only thing Magical about this place was leaving. Full of wanna be Instagram models and decor that resembles the Michael’s floral section. I can’t comment on the food because our waitress ignored us for 30 minutes and then told us it was too late to order off the brunch menu when she finally got to us. I paid $16 for a mediocre vodka lemonade and left before dying of heatstroke because it Is a rooftop bar with zero fans. Don’t believe the hype. There are hundreds of rooftop options in NYC- I’d rather jump off a roof than return to this one.

Name: Jewelz
Review: Great brunch with friends except for our server Michelle K. who wasn’t very attentive. We waited VERY long for drinks and food and had to ask her for items multiple times. Also, server was very rude and unprofessional towards myself and guest when it was time to collect the check. I would recommend this restaurant since the decor was beautiful and food was good. However, I would suggest that they heavily improve on the service.

Name: SadeB
Review: Aesthetics were everything. Food is delicious. Drinks could be better. Service was okay.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
pretty aesthetic & good food 
rooftop was super hot though (recommend fans for summer)

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Family was in town from Puerto Rico and wanted to experience a Friday night out in NYC & Magic Hour did not disappoint ! The music was 🔥🔥 playing a good range mix of music from hip-hop to reggaeton and our table waitress was the sweetest. Always attentive and very kind.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I wish there cotton candy was higher it melted very quickly . We work at the NYU PCC and the doctors order drink needs some improvement . Some drinks were really good some tasted like they barely had liquors in it . But service decor and the vibe was amazing very clean place and the dj was great definitely returning .

Name: LaurenA
Review: Overrated tourist trap. The restaurant looked cute for photos but was absolutely nothing special, outside of the “photo spots” it’s just basic plain tables, limited menu & sugary drinks.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Upon arrival we kept having different people telling us to go down a hallway. Apparently we were supposed to know where to stop in a black hallway with black doors and no signage. Nobody will guide you through but they should get cranky if you accidentally step two steps in the incorrect direction. We got tucked away at a table in the corner without much of any kind of view. This is a place where you’re paying in large part for the view and ambience. Lastly we had to ask thrice for water and keep trying to grab the attention of ANY member of wait staff because our waitress seemed to beelining around us without making eye contact/checking on us. This was the first time in my life I didn’t tip 20%.  I’ve been here before and had a wildly different experience, but it was disappointing to bring a guest to NYC and have had this experience.

Name: ToniToniiToniii
Review: Food was less than desirable especially for the price. The drinks were overpriced as well and were not worth it at all. The ambiance was the only thing that was worth mentioning.

Name: FancyFood
Review:
Cute place lots of spots for Insta photos. The menu scan code  wouldn’t work so we had to look up the menu online.  Paloma cocktails were week n using house tequila was bland. Gave me a hangover next day. The 2nd drink we were smarter n asked for alcohol substitute. 
Great location. Good to get together w friends.

Name: LisaM
Review: Really fun space for after work drinks with friends.

Name: Tracey
Review: Cute for a girls night out, a celebration, but make sure to eat again afterwards cos there’s not many choices for food here. Still great experience.

Name: MJSotoNYU
Review: The views are spectacular! The music was great! Loved it!

Name: RuqaiyahD
Review: Fun ladies night out and the drinks were. Awesomeness

Name: FleurD
Review: Drinks & venue were lovely however the service was so slow and it wasn’t that busy!!

Name: OpenTable Diner
