Review: The experience of the entrance to the decor and the cherry on top was the food. Everything was great. We were there celebrating a birthday. Was the perfect spot for quick brunch and drink.

Name: FrancoP
Review: I went with my girlfriend that is vegetarian and the food menu was very poor. There was only 2 basic vegetarian dishes so we left. Also when we arrived the girl from the main entrance told us there wasn’t space so she send us to the bar. While We were going there i opened the app and did a reservation for 2. I went back to the girl and told her about this and she send us to one of the tables. There we realized that a lot of tables were free.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: So I came here for my birthday and let me just tell you how HORRIBLE my experience was. First off we get upstairs there is absolutely nobody at the host stand so I walk inside and they tell me I have to speak to a host to get seated which obviously i knew but clearly there was nobody there. I go back wait for someone to finally show up just so I can get seated at a dirty corner. My waitress was super sweet but extremely slow! I ordered two martinis one with grey goose one with Tito’s & she came to the table spilling the drinks and literally as she’s passing them she’s holding the glass by the rim so now I have to put my mouth all around a glass that had your fingers all over it. I had to ask for water I was not given water as soon as I sat I literally got my appetizers and my drinks with no water no napkins and no silverware I had to ask for everything! And the fact that my original waitress said goodnight because she had to go home the second girl was a nightmare. Not attentive at all gave me attitude because I told her I’ve been waiting a long time trying to get her attention and she snapped at me saying she has other things to do mind you I was watching her the whole time doing nothing just to see if she’d at least look over to me. I wanted to buy a bottle of wine so I ask to get a taste of the pino noir then I asked her which one she poured me from the list points at a random pino then comes back and tells me she doesn’t have any of those on the list that she actually poured me a different pino noir. Listen this is an absolute nightmare! People literally come here dressed like they’re going to bed, straight up homeless looking people just roaming around getting drunk. Such a beautiful place it shouldn’t have to be this much of a mess I’m super disappointed. People go crazy about this place! I would never come here not even to sit at the bar. Absolutely disgusting.

Name: Meeks
Review: Beautiful decor, nice vibes. Good music, if you want nice pics this is the place.

Name: Erica
Review: Our waitress only came to the table once after we received our food and thats because I got her attention and called her over.

Name: nk3200
Review:
Servers were not attentive, had to ask repeatedly for my drink and for water refills. They are focused on selling the high prced items; I get that; but just because I didn't order the 45.00 pancakes, no need to treat me like a leper! 
In desperate need of a new Managerand operations. Wonderful decor! 
Good for Bachelorettes!

Name: Barbara
Review: Magic Hour is one of those places that You have to experience at least once in Your lifetime. The vibe is just so cheerful, energetic & positive. Everyone is there to have a good time. The food is great, the drinks are amazing, the views are beautiful,  the Staff is wonderful (shout out to Michelle!) & the music makes You feel like You're at a nightclub. We had an amazing time! We are definitely going again!

Name: MarcellaE
Review: It was a great experience just that the kitchen was closed couldn’t eat

Name: AWhyte98
Review: Worse dining experience of my life and I will not be returning.

Name: Tiffany
Review: I had reservations for 8, didn’t get seated until after 8:30.  When we did get seated it was at the worst spot ever. We kept getting bumped by people walking by, the servers were constantly passing to get to the register, it was annoying. A little glass of margarita was $20 and the food was even more expensive!! I’ll never go again

Name: FRNYC
Review: My table was not ready for 50 minutes and staff was very rude overall.

Name: GraceD
Review: Absolutely  stunning. On top of the atmosphere the food was delicious and hot.

Name: mana
Review: Rude hostesses, and server , overpriced drink !! Never going back

Name: Krissy
Review: A lot of fun.. good vibes.. staff were sooo nice .. ❤️

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: I’m in my 30’s and I wouldn’t consider this to be the same crowd. Mostly kid 29’s. Very cute and stylish just not my type of people

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Our reservation was given away, we had to stand around  waiting for a table to open up. The service was slow mainly cuz I think they were wayyyyyy understaffed. The music wasn’t all that good very bland basi

Name: Sarah
Review: Took about 30 minutes for the server to take our initial order and another 30 minutes to bring water to the table.

Name: EvangelinaO
Review: Not a huge menu and small portions but the aesthetic was great and so were the vibes.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
First off there was a fistfight right in front of us 
 from what I can see Management did nothing really about it
The service was absolutely terrible 
I kept having to raise my hand and try to get my service attention to get anything from her and it was very frustrating 
When drinks weren’t even good it was it was very disappointing
The actual bar is very pretty and aesthetic but I would not go back

Name: JoshelineA
Review: Friends reunion

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: We loved the location and the ambiance. Great place for young people to get together and drink. Horrible service though. We reserved a table and took 20 min before we received our drinks every time we ordered. Other than the service, I do recommend going there.

Name: CrystalB
Review: Love this place! the food was good, strong drinks, ambience!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The music was not to our liking

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: great atmosphere and great drinks

Name: mariexo
Review: It was awesome, the color thé vibe thé drink !! A Big yessss

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: The place is cool, and the decor is amazing. Great ambiance and drinks are goooooooood. But the food not so much. I love food! Love cooking! The chicken tenders were frozen, i was expecting fresh chicken. My friend had shrimp tacos and she said they were bland. Everything is cute, nevertheless…food just blah!

Name: PriyaS
Review: A beautiful rooftop bar...the 'Moira Rose' would be highly recommended.

Name: SabrinaM
Review: Very nice view and friendly staff, food was also good.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: 100% a tourist trap looking to take your money in exchange for an instagram photo op. All the decor except 1 corner sadly boring, with music so loud you can barely hear yourself speak. Not as pink as the pictures make it out to be. Food and drinks are way overpriced and the menu extremely limited. Can’t speak to the quality of the food because we left before ordering anything but drinks. After taking our drink order we were left alone for about 20 min until I had to wave the server over for the check. If you’re looking for that photo op, you should probably come after the sun has set so that the pink lights can be seen.

Name: UtaR
Review: It's a beautiful rooftop bar with direct view of the Empire State Building. The staff is great, very attentive and friendly. I was just disappointed with the cocktails, they weren't as great as they sounded so not good value for money. The prosecco was very nice though.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review:
Le lieu est canon ! 
Avec plusieurs spots géniaux ! 
Le petit plus :  une belle vue sur l’empire state building !

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great drinks and vibes!

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Maybe it was the bartender that day but the drinks were horrible. Other than that service was great & i had the shrimp tacos which were amazing. Will come back but wont be ordering any of their drinks.

Name: OpenTable Diner
Review: Great time
